Summary: We usually stay here for several trips, Disney, Knotts, etc. when we have stayed, it‚Äôs been clean, quiet and easy.  My husband is a fireman in Orange County and recently needed a layover hotel (we live several hours away), so he went to check in here one morning. Mind you, it was the middle of the week, 8am. Not only were they not helpful, they actually charged him in an early check in. He was in uniform. I‚Äôm not saying everyone needs to be fire friendly, but come on. He needed to stay for 24 hrs. Like really charge extra for a guy that works their area? We will never stay again and believe me everyone in fire and within my big mouths range will hear about this
Manager Response: We apologize for the issues you experienced during your stay. We will work to correct these and hope to welcome you back in the future for a better stay.

Summary Heading: You have lost a customer forever
Summary: My husband and I will never be staying here again, and we have been using this hotel for the past 2 years for our Disneyland trips. We checked in on a Monday, and needed to extend our trip an additional night. We were told by Le, the front desk clerk, that he was unable to extend our stay due to the site we used, and would need to make another reservation for us. He assured us though that since we will not be switching rooms, that we would not have to pay an additional deposit. Thursday morning we go to the lobby to start the process, and we‚Äôre told we would actually need to pay the deposit. The front desk lady, Rene, was incredibly rude and yelled at my husband. I asked to speak with management to try to rectify the situation, and was told he would be in at 8:30. He didn‚Äôt show
Manager Response: We are sorry about the confusion about the communication between you and our GSR in regard to your back-to-back reservation. We required a deposit for each reservation for incidental purposes. We hope you understand and give us another opportunity to serve you.

Summary Heading: The rudest "welcome" ever when arriving at a hotel as a paying customer.
Summary: Omg! We arrived at the hotel, couldn't find the entryway/lobby and drove around until we just parked and got out and found a window with nobody there, and a sign taped to the wall telling customers there was going to be construction going on daily from 8:30 a.m. Okay, well, my husband and I just left our home in Portland to take a vacation away from construction noise, after our two new neighbors spent the past four months ruining our summer with loud and intrusive ongoing construction. We did not take a vacation to California to be faced with more loud construction. The hotel didn't call or email us in advance to warn of this. We WOULD have cancelled and booked elsewhere. Anyway, as we were just contemplating the wall sign warning of noise a man came out from the back, Le, I
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. We are extremely concerned to read your comments and apologize for the issues you had at the check-in time. Our staff genuinely cares about providing an enjoyable stay for all of our guests, so this incident is not a reflection of our usual service standards. Your frustration is understandable. Appropriate action has been taken to ensure this is not repeated. We would like to welcome you back again for a much better experience.

Summary: Before the pandemic I had stayed at this property once or twice a year.  We had found our stays to be quiet, comfortable, and a good value.  This stay was no exception and we were pleased that the hotel had made it through the pandemic successfully.    A welcome, new addition was that there was now a refrigerator in our first floor King room!  I'm glad that the owners have finally added this amenity and it definitely adds to the hotel's overall value.   We used the squeaky clean microwave in the lobby to reheat leftovers from a local restaurant.   This hotel will continue to be our 'go to' option when in the Orange County area.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our valued guest. We appreciate your wonderful feedback. We're glad you enjoyed your stay with us and our location. We look forward to your next stay with us!

Summary: We have stayed at this location multiple times and have always been treated very well. The rooms are clean, well maintained and the staff is very helpful and friendly.  From check in to check out, we were well taken care of. The location is close to shopping, good food, and near freeways.
Manager Response: Thank you for recommending the Good Nite Inn Buena park. We do our best to make your stay a pleasant experience and one to remember.  We are thrilled that you enjoyed our spotless property as well as our wonderful location and friendly staff. See you again soon!

Summary: THINGS TO LIKE : Perfect location to access the attractions, the staff was friendly and helpful . It's a good place if you're looking for a cheap option , as hotels in Buena Park can be pricey. The room had a fridge. It's OK if you go there for the attractions and return to the hotel only for the night. But I would have liked something a little more upscale. NOW FOR THE BAD NEWS  :  You get what you pay for, ie., it's a cheap place in every detail (except for the pool that looked nice but that we didn't use) . The biggest issue we had was with the bathroom door that allows for very little privacy . We were given 2 tiny soaps for the 3 of us (they brought us more after I requested it), the mattress badly needs to be renewed and I woke up every morning with a back pain for lack of
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay at the Good Nite Inn Buena Park, Ca. We appreciate your feedback and we're sorry that you weren't completely satisfied with your stay. We do our best to make every stay a pleasant experience. Thank you for your business and we hope to welcome you back for a better outcome. Thanks again!

Summary Heading: Don't  expect your room to be cleaned!
Summary: We had reservations for 3 nights & expected the room to be cleaned everyday as most all motels/hotels do, even before covid mandates were issued. When I confronted management,  we stated they only CLEAN rooms once every SIX DAYS!!!  No coffee makers or microwave ovens in the room, only in the hallway.   This motel is below standards most travelers expect
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback! We have a coffee maker in deluxe rooms and a microwave for guests in the lobby area. We are sorry about the inconvenience!

Summary Heading: Great little find,  with fab location closer to major roads.
Summary: Very clean hotel,  friendly staff and great base for visiting Buena Park, Anaheim and Los Angeles.  Room wasn't fully serviced during the week we were at the hotel, however the bins were emptied,  clean towels provided and toiletries replaced daily.  Pool was a little cold but the kids enjoyed it.  Very quiet.  Plenty of car parking.  Free coffee each morning was a lovely touch.  Microwave available in foyer area too.  Would consider staying here again
Manager Response: We are thrilled to know you have had a great experience with us at Good Nite Inn. Our staff will be happy to read how much you enjoyed the service you received. Customer experience and satisfaction are our priority, and your review reaffirms the hard work we put in every day. We appreciate your kind words and look forward to seeing you again!

Summary: Room was clean, price was right and staff was awesome.  Lydia you rock!  I needed some prints for a business proposal and they were able to help me out.  This place was very accommodating and I would for sure stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave your review in regards to your stay at the Good Nite Inn. I will pass your kind words to Lydia. We appreciate your business and look forward to welcoming you back again on your next visit.

Summary: Stayed here with my family for the holidays. Clean hotel and nice rooms. Timothy at the front desk was super helpful and nice. He made check in really simple and recommended activities to do in the area.
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback! We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and our GSR Timothy was very helpful to you. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: The rooms themselves are nice, clean and comfortable. Parking is convenient. Check in was smooth. Try to get a room near the rear though as the front side rooms can be very noisy with morning traffic.
Manager Response: Thank you for leaving us such a wonderful review! We are thrilled that you loved your experience and found us to be a good value. See you again soon.

Summary: I've stayed here numerous times while I work in the area. The hotel staff are great...Imran, Ren√© and Lydia always provide professional and courteous service. They're fast at check-in time and friendly to talk too. Best thing is all the choices for food and entertainment in close proximity to the hotel.
Manager Response: We appreciate your detailed post and thank you for the kind recommendation. So glad you found our location close to the restaurant and entertainment. I will pass your kind words to our great team. Thank you for being our loyal guest at Good Nite Inn Buena Park.

Summary: Checking in today was super fast. Lydia helped me out. She is super polite, friendly, and accommodating. Seeing her really made my day. The property and room l is super clean. Parking was easy and convenient.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback! We are happy to hear that liked our clean room and easy parking. I will pass your kind words to Lydia. We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary Heading: Awesome Front Desk staff, Tim and Matt gave me a very warm welcome
Summary: Check in was very efficient and quick with Tim and Matt at the front desk. The room was clean and comfortable. We're very happy with our stay and definitely return there again when we're in the area. Thank you!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback! We are happy to hear that you liked our clean, comfortable rooms and great service. I will pass your kind words to Tima and matt. See you again soon!

Summary: I am really happy to find this place. Amazing service from KP, Rene, Imran and other staff. Definitely recommend to stay here. I will choose this hotel over any other hotels in the area. Thanks for making my stay a great stay and memorable.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time and giving us a great feedback. We take great pride of all of our staff and cleanliness we have at this hotel. We welcome you back any time you are visiting Buena Park area. I will pass down the awesome comments to the wonderful staff. Thank you again for recommendation.

Summary Heading: Lydia at the front desk is really great!
Summary: Lydia at Good Nite in Buena Park's front desk is very caring and helpful and knowledgeable. She really does a great job of welcoming you and getting you settled in and feeling at home! On a scale of 1 to 10 I definitely give her a 10.
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback! I will pass your kind words to Lydia. She is really very helpful. We are looking forward to see you again soon!

Summary: We have stayed here multiple times and never had any issues. The staff is super friendly, the rooms are clean, and the location is great. We always choose this place when we visit Disneyland or Knott's Berry Farm. Not to mention the price is good for what you get.
Manager Response: Thank you for your valuable feedback. We are so pleased you enjoyed our services,  amenities and great location at very reasonable price in the area. We thank you for being a loyal guest and looking forward to see you again soon!

Summary: Lydia from the front desk gave me 2 oranges cause I told her I was hungry and had no car. No other place open. Would be nice if they added snack machine but Lydia helped me out. That‚Äôs customer service.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback! Lydia is awesome and helps every customer.

Summary: We got a couple of good nights sleep after a long week of adventures in California we need a couple days to take it a bit easier.  We picked this place as we had planed to spend a day going around the must sees in LA area.  The room was clean, modern and comfortable.  My one small complaint was that they have a pool but it is not heated or not heated very well.    Overall it was a great place to stay for a few days while seeing the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback on your 'perfect weekend.' We appreciate your candid feedback, both positive and constructive, as both help us continue to improve our services and amenities.

Summary: Room was nice, clean, and very spacious. Definitely will stay there again. G.C. was very helpful and kind. Provided great customer service. Looking forward to seeing her there again. Recommend it to you and your family.
Manager Response: Thank you for the feedback! We appreciate your positive comments especially the comfort of your stay and we will extend to GC your great remarks. Our gratitude by recommending our hotel to your family and friends. Hope to see you on your next visit.

Summary: We stayed at this hotel because we needed somewhere to sleep for one night before our full day trip to Disneyland. This hotel was so nice for the price! The customer service was great and the representative  who assisted us with check in was great! Her name was GC! She was very efficient, friendly and our room was really clean. We used Lysol wipes to wipe down due to Covid and our own peace of mind and those wipes were super clean! The only con is that the beds are not comfy but for the price we could not complain.
Manager Response: We appreciate your good review in our hotel. Thank you for the feedback and we will extend to GC your kind remarks. The concern that you had was elevated to the upper management and we took consideration the suggestion you made. Looking forward in seeing you again on your next trip to Buena Park.

Summary Heading: Good bye Good nite Inn - Blood in Bathroom
Summary: Just a one night stay so booked a room for $100. It's close to Knotts Berry Farm and Disney so that's as cheap as you get.   The room is very basic, small TV, no fridge no microwave, no coffee, no breakfast. But that's fine.  What is not fine is the room was NOT cleaned, but the hotel left a note/card saying they cleaned the room!   There was crumbs all over the floor and blood products in the bathroom (see picture).  I can tolerate lots of stuff but when you don't clean a hotel room (during COVID mind you) that's a huge issue.
Manager Response: We apologized for the experience that you have been through. The upper management were informed about the situation and the issue in your room was addressed in timely manner. Our Queen Deluxe room on the third floor has a mini fridge and coffee maker. We don't have breakfast but a complimentary of coffee and tea serve in the morning. Thank you for letting us know.

Summary: This hotel is nice and clean. Very quiet and safe. G.C was so kind and generous. She made me feel welcome and went above and beyond. Made me feel like I was at home. Highly recommend. Great hospitality
Manager Response: We appreciate your good comments in our hotel especially the comfort of your stay. We will extend to GC your kind remarks by doing the extra mile of service. Thank you for the recommendation to your family and friends. Looking forward in seeing you on your next visit.

Summary: As been noted, this is a "no frills" hotel. That being said, what separates the GNI from dozens of others in the area is top-notch service. I cannot remember all the names of the people who helped us, but it doesn't matter - they were all excellent. Otherwise the GNI has a lot going for it. Clean, comfortable, and well-located. I have family in Orange County and the GNI has become our "home away from home".
Manager Response: The exemplary review is highly appreciated, thank you for enjoying your stay in our hotel especially the SERVICE rendered and the rooms the you feel comfortable and clean. Hoping for another reservation at GNI Buena Park as you have said "home away from home". Be our hotel your second home as you come back again.

Summary: Checked in for two nights.  This is a no frills type of hotel.  The rooms were clean and inexpensive.   Bring your own soap (they have soap but like all hotel/motels they are small), shower cap, shampoo and and conditioner.  We did not swim in the pool because the weather was too cold.  Would stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you for the feedback. We appreciate your kind review to our hotel. Hoping to see you again in the near future visit.

Summary: Always such a pleasant experience from check in to check out.  The staff is incredible and accommodating, check in is quick and property is located within walking distance of three major restaurants.  Very close to freeway access.  Most important , the greatest management team and staff, KP is a kind soul that welcomes you home not just to a hotel.  KP and his staff, provide an experience that has kept me coming back for the past several years.  Special thank you to Rene for her special attention to our request to check in early to make our dinner reservations.
Manager Response: We appreciate the good review that you extend to our hotel and  staff. We will let them know, the staff and the team especially to Rene that you had a good stay and very pleased with the service rendered. We are looking forward in your next visit.

Summary: Aly at the front desk has great service and so kind. She made us want to return again. The staff is very helpful and kind. They have a microwave.  So you can take some meals heat them and enjoy your beautiful and comfy room.
Manager Response: We certainly appreciate your feedback especially the service extended by Ally. Thank you for making your stay comfortably and enjoyed our room and the amenities. Hoping you will come back to Buena Park and once again stay in our hotel.

Summary: Very friendly service from front desk attendant named G.C. she even gave me directions to the nearest bank when I asked her she is Super sweet! Very thorough with explaining the do's & the donts from the good nite inn.  5 stars
Manager Response: We appreciate your good remarks and wonderful experience in our hotel. Thank you for the valuable feedback especially the way GC handles your inquiries. We hope to see you again on your next visit to Buena Park.

Summary: Every time I‚Äôm in Buena Park for any reason and choose to stay this is the place. Especially because G.C at the front desk is very accommodating and knows what I like when I visit! Always gives great service and is very friendly! Thank you G.C I‚Äôll be back soon.
Manager Response: We appreciate you are always satisfied with your stay in our hotel. We thank you being a Valued Guest who choose our hotel whenever you are in the vicinity. We are glad that GC extended good service and we will let her know. Hoping to see you on your next visit.

Summary: G.C the front desk was very helpful and friendly! i highly recommend! Also they are very understanding.  If you are on a budget definitely worth checking it out. I would advice to park on the ones with light.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for choosing our hotel for your recent stay in the city of Buena Park. We certainly appreciate the valuable feedback, and we are very happy to know how helpful and friendly GC was. We re hoping to see you again soon!

Summary: I‚Äôm  very satisfied with my stay, the place is comfortable and clean, close to the fwy,  the front desk worker ALY was very helpful and accommodating,  I will definitely book again soon.    I‚Äôm very satisfied.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for choosing the Good Nite Inn Buena park. We are happy your stay with us was comfortable and memorable. We appreciate your kind feedback regarding our service, and we thank you for pointing out how helpful Aly was. We are looking forward to see you again soon!

Summary: We have stayed here twice. The first time we had a "deluxe" room on the 3rd floor. Our most recent time we decided to save a few bucks and stay in a standard room on the first floor. If you just need a place to lay your head, the standard room is more than sufficient. Everything works. The AC is fairly quiet and the room is fairly quiet. BUT....if you can afford a few bucks more (literally) I highly recommend the "deluxe" room. Quieter, larger, and includes a refrigerator. Both are very clean. The only reason I gave the GNIBP four stars instead of five was that we got no maid service (we stayed 2 nights this time). Good location.
Manager Response: Thank you for continuously staying with us .  We  are very pleased to know that you had an enjoyable stay.  We just want to let you know you can contact our Guest Services anytime during your stay if there is something to be done in the room.   Hoping to see you again.

Summary Heading: The best little gem in Buena Park!
Summary: Staying at the Good Nite Inn in Buena Park, Ca is one of my most comfortable, safest, and cleanest experience, as well as hotel environment, I‚Äôve been in. And honestly it‚Äôs thanks mostly all to ‚ÄúRebecca‚Äù who works front desk. She‚Äôs the kindest and warm hearted workers in the industry  I‚Äôve met, and trust me I travel nationwide. I feel I can call her my friend. She‚Äôs most accommodating to all my needs and makes me feel so safe even when traveling alone. The best part, the establishment makes you feel welcomed at home, like a family, due also to who I highly recommend, ‚ÄúRicky, GC, Maria and Natalie!‚Äù Their location has many accommodations around as well as their pricing is well fit. Thank you again to all the staff stated as I will ALWAYS BE BACK!! Looking forward to it! üå∑
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to give us a wonderful review.  We are proud to hear that you are well taken care of by our Front Desk staff most especially Rebecca.  We do appreciate you always staying with us and it is always a great pleasure to be of service to you.

Summary: Whenever my family from Las Vegas is in town,  we always booked them in this hotel. The rates are reasonable with clean rooms and easily accessible. Rebecca and Ricky st the Front Desk are very helpful and they know already our room preferences .
Manager Response: Thank you for making Good Nite Inn as your choice of hotel for your family. Thank you as well for recognizing the familiarity of our Guest Services, Ricky and Rebecca of your preferences.  We do appreciate your kind compliments and hoping to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: Excellent Customer Service and Clean Rooms
Summary: Whenever I am in OC I generally stay at this hotel due to a variety of factors. First, the customer service is always on point. Check in is very fast and the staff knows how to treat the customer. G.C is one of the nicest customer service members I have ever met. She is always friendly, helpful and efficient. When G.C is not there other friendly staff members are there to assist as well. Secondly,  the price at the hotel is always affordable compare to other hotels in the area. Finally, the location is great since it's close to many restaurant and malls. I highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us.  We are glad the  impressive service provided by our staff most especially G C always makes your stay an enjoyable one.  Kudos as well for you recommending us and hoping to see you soon.

Summary: Good Night Inn Buena Park is a great place to stay at, I‚Äôve stayed at this location more than once because the rooms are always clean and the rates are great, not to mention the staff are very friendly. Staff GC, Ricky, Natalie, Becky and Maria are always helpful with my stay and very attentive to my needs.  Thanks! Lisa Hernandez
Manager Response: Thank you for always staying with us. We do appreciate your loyalty and wonderful feedback about your experience here.

Summary Heading: Helped Us In A Crazy Time
Summary: My BF and I booked this hotel for a week because we planned to be in the area for work. But when our work event was cancelled, we were worried about being fined for cancelling. The staff were so understanding and accommodating. The room was clean and everyone was so friendly. Because of the cleanliness and their kindness, we will definitely book here again when on work trips. Shoutout to Rebecca at the front desk. She was so helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. We do understand the situation and we are happy that we were able to help you on your cancellation.  Thank you as well for recognizing the service provided by Rebecca and we will definitely  share  your kind words with her..  Hoping to see you soon.

Summary: WE have stayed here before and the front desk people weren't so nice last time but when we came back the front desk guy named ricky did everything in his power to make us feel very comfortable. He was very nice and got us our room with no problem.we will be coming back!
Manager Response: Thank you for always staying with us.  We are glad that the service provided by Ricky made a big difference on your stay.  We do appreciate your feedback and we can't wait to welcome you back.

Summary: We stayed for 2 nights, the room was clean, friendly staff, looked like a safe neighborhood,next door there are 2 places to eat and another one just crossing the street. We were on a 1 day Disneyland trip and we payed about 35% of what we would have payed on the cheapest hotel close to Disneyland and it's less than a 10 min. drive.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us.  We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed everything we have to offer .Thank you as well for your kind words and intention to recommend us .  Hoping to see you soon.

Summary Heading: Good location, good price, bad housekeeping...
Summary: Booked Good Nite Inn based on the reviews here in tripadvisor and the price compare to other hotels which is quite phenomenal.  I had a positive experience with GC as she updated our room that has the fridge which I was not even aware of until the day of our trip as I was looking into the room details and noticed that microwave and a fridge was not listed.  Location is great for nearby eats (for example, McDonalds is literally a walk from the hotel while Porto's bakery which is a MUST if you visit SoCal is roughly a 5 minute drive).  It's unfortunate that we have a poor experience due to housekeeping not cleaning/vacuuming the carpet and not taking out all the trash. The trash was put on a plastic bag next to the trash can as it was full so I'm not sure why left it.   Also, as a
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. I am happy that our Front Desk staff (GC) was able to provide exceptional service. I was just concerned that our housekeeping missed a trashed during your stay. I understand your dismay and I am sorry. I will let our housekeeping team know about this so they won't miss anything next time.  Again, thank you for the review and for staying with us. I hope that you would still consider staying with us again in the future.

Summary: I have stayed here on multiple trips to So. California, always well taken care of. The hotel is clean and in an area that is convenient for most everything. The staff is always friendly and helpful. The worst problem I have ever had is the iron not working in the room. :)
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your great review of our hotel.  We are pleased to hear that you have made the Good Nite Inn your go to hotel when visiting our area.  Thank you for your continued business.  We look forward to seeing you on your next visit.

Summary: Upon checking in we were greeted FABULOUSLY by Ricky! He was so friendly and welcoming! We stayed for 4 nights and had the third floor. The rooms were very clean and spacious. Beds were comfy. We didn't experience  loud noises or issues. Parking was always available and the AC worked great. Check out was a breeze and Rebecca was friendly and efficient! She wanted to make sure we left happy. We will DEFINITELY be back soon for our next Disney trip. Thank you good nite inn.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to give us a wonderful review.  We are thrilled to know that  the service provided by Ricky and Rebecca went along way to make your stay a memorable one.  We will share your kind words with them and hoping to see you soon.

Summary Heading: Always back for the great service!
Summary: I‚Äôve been to this hotel plenty of times and every time I‚Äôm going to be in that area I always go there. There‚Äôs always a room available and very accommodating to my needs. G.C. at the front desk is always in a great mood and now knows me by my name. Always provides great service and is very polite! I‚Äôll keep going back there every time.
Manager Response: Thank you for always staying with us.  We are happy to know that you always enjoy your stay and at the same time were well taken care of by G C.  We hope to welcome you back soon.

Summary Heading: Good cancellation policy and nearby restaurants
Summary: Trip had to get cancelled last minute and the hotel was very helpful in issuing a refund for the remaining days of the stay.   Some nice Korean restaurants open from Breakfast till late within 5 minutes walk of the hotel. - Ham Yang and the Soft Tofu place.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. We are glad that you like our cancellation policy as we understand our guests different situations.  We do  appreciate your feedback and hoping to welcome you back when you are in the area.

Summary: The Good Nite Inn is our choice every time we visit Disneyland. We receive the best service from the staff. They are friendly, recognize us as frequent guests and are always helpful if we need something besides the basics. Whether it's Marie, Rebecca or GC checking us in, it is always with a smile and a friendly greeting. Natalie always welcomes me in the morning when I get my coffee (free and  tastes wonderful) and Ricky makes sure our stay is going great. When Kathy arrives for the day, she comes to our table and chats for a few minutes with my sister and I before she leaves to do the excellent job of a housekeeper.  Everything has been great all of the times we have stayed at this motel for the past 8 years. we don't even consider a different motel.
Manager Response: Thank you for always staying with us.  We love knowing that the attentive services provided by our staff went a long way in making your stay  always an enjoyable one. Reviews like this means the world to our staff and will surely shared with them.  We are looking forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: Small in size but top notch service and  cleanliness
Summary: 10 out of 10 in service. Rooms are always clean and ready. The staff is very warm and responsive even when they are busy. Good location with plenty of parking. I'd recommend for business travelers and family. Front desk clerk GC is the best!
Manager Response: Great Review!!  We are pleased to hear you truly appreciate our hotel and especially our warm, responsive customer service and clean rooms.   These are the most critical attributes of any hotel along with competitive pricing within the market.  Thank you for mentioning GC by name, we will be sure to inform her of your nice compliment of her continued efforts and great service for our guests.  We look forward to seeing you again upon your next visit.

Summary: I've stayed at the Good Nite Inn Buena Park many times and I always continue to come back due to the great service I receive and the friendly faces I meet at the desk. Everything is professionally handled and well tended to. The rooms are clean, fresh, and quiet. Big thanks to Ricky and Kirit for helping our specific circumstance.
Manager Response: Thank you for always choosing Good Nite Inn Buena Park as your home away from home. We appreciate your loyalty and wonderful feedback about your experience here.  Ricky and the rest of the staff do appreciate your feedback and we can't wait to be hosting you again.

Summary: What a fantastic place to find to stay in.. After a rather long flight we got to the hotel and were warmly greeted by a very nice man at reception!! A very smooth and quick check in..  Our room was perfect and so clean. We were on the third floor and we had a fridge in the room and that was helpful..  A great Air con too :-)  The beds were very comfortable and that's a must in any hotel!!!  The local area was safe and there were a few eateries very close by.. A Mcdonalds and Paul's diner. We didn't use them though!!  On checkout we asked if they had a left luggage area which they didn't but  Rebecca was super... She said we could store them for a few hours and she was so helpful even though she was busy!! A super friendly lady.. Our overall experience of staying here was amazing
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to give us a wonderful review.  We are delighted to hear you enjoyed everything we have to offer.  Your kind word will go along way most especially to Rebecca in recognizing her hard work .  Hoping to see you soon.

Summary: This hotel had been remodeled and did a very nice job. We stayed on the 3rd floor. Maria was the best at the desk (ask for her). The price to stay was PERFECT. Hard to find a good place decent price. Excellent restuarant right in front of the hotel. RUN DO NOT WALK to get to this place
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us.  We are glad that you had an enjoyable  stay. We love knowing that the attentive service provided by Maria went a long way in making your stay a memorable one.  We will share yo kind words with her and we can't wait to welcome you back.

Summary Heading: Peace, quiet, and quick access to freeway
Summary: Well... my last review of this "hidden gem" was back in August of 2019. It is TIME FOR AN UPDATE! As you can already 'put together', I have clearly still been coming here since my last review in 2019. I became a regular! And I wouldn't change that for the world! The reason why I keep on coming back so much? Location, budget-friendly, extremely accommodating and spacious rooms always clean, and of course, THE STAFF! ALL OF THEM! Maria in housekeeping, one of the handful of gals here who are always attending your room with top priority and service. The maintenance guy, even when he's just I passing, he always stops to greet each guest he passes on by in the halls; and of course, the STELLAR front desk staffing. GC, and Ricky have been the most accommodating for me within the past
Manager Response: Thank you for always choosing Good Nite Inn Buena Park.  We are pleased to hear that you always had a memorable stay .  Your kind words go a long way in reinforcing the hard work by everyone here at GNI to make every guest stay as pleasant as possible. We can't wait to welcome you again.

Summary: We stayed for 3 nights in a very comfortable room. Would have liked to have a refrigerator. There was a microwave in the coffee room so we could make our own breakfast. Right across the street is a great restaurant Black Bear Diner. We ate there 2 nights out of 3. Great food, nice music, great atmosphere. Would gladly recommend this hotel.

Summary: were great and friendly and helpful. Quite accommodating as well. Hotel was clean and quiet during my stay. The bed was comfortable and clean. I would highly recommend staying here as it was a good hotel. GC is very nice two thumbs up  Read more

The hotel provides ample free coffee in the morning, and free parking.  The location is excellent - right off of the 91 freeway exit at Knott Avenue. There are several restaurants on the same corner (McDonald's,
Manager Response: Thank you for continuously staying with us.  We are delighted to hear that you always had an enjoyable stay.  We do appreciate your feedback and we can't wait to be hosting you again.

Summary: I‚Äôve been staying here for five years on and off. This is my go-to place to stay in this area, when I come out to Disney. They renovated the rooms a couple of years ago. The rooms are clean, and the beds are relatively comfortable. The rates are fair, and I would say this place is a step-up from Motel 6. No breakfast in the morning, just coffee.  The employees are nice, with a special shout out to Natalie who works overnights. She is always friendly. David, Rebecca, GC are all great as well.  The one thing I don‚Äôt like is they lock the lobby at 9pm till the next morning. You can‚Äôt heat your food up then, cause the microwave is inside. Wish they would stop doing this. The area is pretty good, I‚Äôve never had any problems parking my car here.  Anyway, if you‚Äôre on a budget, you
Manager Response: Thank you for your loyalty. We are glad that we are always your choice away from home going to Disneyland.  We do appreciate your  kind words with our staff and we can't wait to welcome you back.

Summary: Second stay and I'll definitely stay again.  I book a deluxe room on the 3rd floor.  I like the inside access, which seems quieter to me. The rooms have been clean and has plenty of towels.  The customer service is fantastic.  Super friendly staff.  I booked direct, which was less than any of the travel sites.  The location is near Knotts but not in the main line of traffic. Good Nite Inn Buena Park is all of those and so much more. In just 5 months I‚Äôve already stayed 7 nights and I have another 3 nights booked next month. I‚Äôve only stayed in the deluxe rooms on the 3rd floor and they are always clean, quiet and beds are comfortable. The front desk staff upon check in or check out are always so pleasant!   Thank you Good Nite Inn for allowing me to visit my baby girl often!
Manager Response: We are pleased to hear we are able to provide you with all the criteria and requirements you expect from a Hotel.  Thank you for your positive feedback and loyalty.  We look forward to seeing you back again the next time you visit your daughter.

Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. We are delighted to hear you enjoyed everything we have to offer.  Thank you for your kind words and hoping to see you next time.

Logging into the wifi is a problem (had the same problem logging in last visit), but going to the front desk will take care of you logging into their wifi. Coffee and tea is offered in the morning, restaurants are a short walking distant. Plenty of parking and is a short distant to the freeways to major attractions. I always enjoy staying here.

We were happy to receive the precise type of room we booked and when we got to the room, we were so pleased to see it was so clean and tidy. The same for the bathroom/toilet too. The beds & pillows were so comfortable, and with cable TV, you could stay in the room all day & not complain. We liked the card access only entry to the upper floors - gave us assurance for our security. The housekeepers were very friendly and kept asking us if we needed anything. Our 7 nights stay was most pleasant & we will most definitely choose to stay at the Good Nite Inn Buena Park when we next return to LA/Anaheim.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to give us a detailed and a wonderful review.  Your kind words go a long way of reinforcing the hard work by everyone here at Good Nite Inn to make every guest stay as pleasant as possible.  Hoping to see you soon.

Summary: This is my fourth stay at the Good Nite in at Buena park. It has become my regular stop off for the NAMM show. The staff are friendly, the bed is comfortable and the room is always cleaned daily.  My one criticism of the facilities is that the base of the bath was heavily stained in my room (227) compared to other rooms I have used on site in previous years and this meant I was unable to have a bath but the shower is fine and I trust this company to fix these issues as it is clear I am not the only person to give them regular repeat business.  Good job team.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for continuously staying with us.  We do appreciate you choosing us yearly when you attend the NAMM convention.   We do apologize for the inconvenience you had and we will refer this matter to the department concerned for rectification.  Hoping to see you again when you are in the Buena Park/Anaheim areas.

Summary: My family and I are frequent visitor's. And we won:t stay anywhere else! It's clean, quiet and the beds are to die for! Soooooo comfortable! Staff is amazing and always takes care of us. Summary: The customer service is the best you can find. I‚Äôm a frequent visitor and wouldn‚Äôt think of staying anywhere else. Summary: Me as a tour leader of travel agency. knowing GC the receptionist was very helpfull. She knows what i need and make the process with the check inn very fast when i brought 20 participants of group. Keep up the good work GC. Love Mitha.

Summary: Good Nite Inn Buena Park never disappoints. I travel extensively for my job and I am often surprised by hotels that promise much more than they deliver. The people here make all the difference with check-in and daily service. The location is closer to residential areas, so in my opinion, it is quieter and safer than busy Beach Blvd. There are also three restaurants (Paul's Place, Black Bear and McDonald's) adjacent to the hotel. Retail shopping (Target,
Manager Response: We thank you for your continued loyalty to our hotel and especially for your kind words about our Staff. Manager Response: Thank you for your overall very positive review.  In regards to the mini refrigerator, just for your knowledge, we do have mini refrigerators in our QQ Deluxe rooms.  We do hope to see you again the next time you visit our area.

Glad to see they took my inconvenience into account.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your recent experience with us. It was never our intention to disappoint you and we are glad that we were able to take immediate action to rectify the situation. We do value your business and looking forward to welcome you back .

Summary: We stay 1 night and woke up early to go to Disneyland. It is 25 min away, depend on the traffic. I pick up some coffee at the lobby. There is a McDonald‚Äôs across the parking lot, so we walk to McDonald‚Äôs for breakfast.
Manager Response: Thank you for your favorable review.  We appreciate your feedback and positive comments.  We look forward to seeing you again upon your next visit to our area.

Summary Heading: Nothing special but worked for Disneyland trip
Summary: Good Nite Inn was a little disappointing but worked for our trip to Disneyland. It was easy to get on the highway for a short trip to the park and the McDonald's next door was handy for a bite to eat. Knotts seemed really close though we didn't go there.  The room smelled a bit musty and the shower didn't look clean but other than that the room was fine. We arrived after the hotel after the lobby closed so we had to checkin from the small checkin window which was hard to hear through. The layout of the hotel was a bit odd too. The elevator lead to an outdoor balcony upstairs which had a door to the hallway. The stairs were only on the far side.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and your feedback.  We will work harder to resolve some of the issues you mentioned.  We certainly hope you enjoyed your visit to Disneyland. Summary: The place looks and smells nicely refreshed . Check in late at night could not be easier. I love the minimalist furniture, as it gives a modern air, and not a cluttered appearance. Really courteous Desk lady that was patient with my hearing difficulty.
Manager Response: Thank you for your most favorable review of your recent stay here with us at Good Nite Inn.  We will share with our Front Desk staff your appreciation for their patience upon check in.  We look forward to seeing you again upon your next visit to our area.

Summary: I arrived at this hotel after driving down from Oregon with three tween boys, and check in was fast and easy! Pillows were on the harder side, which I had read on previous reviews, and we came prepared with pillows from home. Kept cereal, milk, and plastic bowls/spoons for the kids to eat in the mornings before heading to Disney. Some days we walked across the parking lot to the McDonald's and got breakfast there. Housekeeping did a good job cleaning the room, though we did notice that if one of the kids left
Manager Response: We thank you for your detailed and most favorable review.  We are pleased to hear you and your three boys truly enjoyed your recent stay here at Good Nite Inn. Summary: Really great customer service by GC.. she knows her patrons and is very accommodating.  Location is excellent,  rooms are good and comfortable. Summary: I stayed here for 4 nights on my road trip and found the hotel to be very nice.  Check-In: this was quick and the staff were very polite and welcoming. Location: I didn‚Äôt feel too scared walking about at night (over to McDonald‚Äôs or Paul‚Äôs Place) but not sure if I‚Äôd venture too far by myself at night walking wise, nothing to do with the area I just don‚Äôt walk around at night by myself. Special mention to GC, she was great, she remembered my name every time I spoke to her on the desk and always had a smile on her face, she was very welcoming and a true asset to the hotel. Thank you  Something that might help someone: even though the lobby closes at 9pm, you can
Manager Response: Thank you very much for staying with us.  We are pleased to know that you had an enjoyable stay and likewise impressed by the exceptional service provided by GC. We do appreciate your feedback and we can't wait to welcome you back.

Summary: Good and reasonable place to stay, hotel staff was miraculous ask for shabhna she is very warm and welcoming and answered all my questions and concerns patiently :) and was very helpful, will be staying here again

Summary: Price wise reasonable very clean old hotel good location to visit disney land hotels nearer  We are very impressed. Quiet, clean, and great price. I've stayed in hotels costing $80+ for the price we paid here   more

Summary Heading: Excellent Hotel for a group with an economic price
Summary: This hotel has received me and my group of 30 persons during 3 continous years bringing us excellent services, fast communications and good rooms quality. Rebecca is certainly an outstanding asset to our hotel and we too appreciate all her hard work and attention to our guests and their needs. Summary: G.C and Jonathan was so nice to us. They were really approachable and friendly. The room is so clean. Overall we enjoyed our stay and would definitely comeback. I will definitely recommend this hotel to my friends and family who would be visiting orange county.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your positive review.  Especially we are pleased that you mentioned two of our employees.  We will be certain to communicate this most favorable review and thank them for their extra efforts in making your stay most memorable.

Summary: We went to the US for two weeks and this hotel was our main base. We arrived around 8pm but the receptionist was helpful. We got to our room which was nice and clean though not as warm as in the pictures. Our room was 333. I immediately noticed a strong smell - kind of a mixture of an old house and too many cleaning products. I hoped that it will go away if we open the window or give time to it. Unfortunately it didn't. We even bought some products to reduce the smell but it was in the furniture too.  So, we have asked for swapping our room to something else. The receptionist was understanding and really helpful to do that. Room 329 was much better, the smell wasn't as strong but unfortunately it came back if the window wasn't open. The beds were comfortable though, the room
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to give us a detailed and wonderful review. We do appreciate you staying with us and hoping to be hosting you again when you are in the Buena Park area.

Summary: The rooms were clean, the staff was friendly. Shabhna was very accommodating when we inquired about the place. Good restaurants within walking distance. It was also close to Disneyland, and Knotts, and also very close to Seal Beach and Long Beach.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us.  We are glad that you found our rooms clean with a reasonable price. We are glad as well that you like the service provided by Shabhna and we will definitely share your kind words with her.  Hoping to see you soon.

Summary: No complaints here!  I‚Äôm very pleased with rooms, service is excellent. G.C & Rebecca are both awesome in guest service.  Centrally located and facility clean, housekeepers are nice and give reasonable time before check out. Pure awesomeness!!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us.  We are pleased to know that you have a pleasant stay and at the same time impressed with the awesome service provided by G C and Rebecca. We do value your business and we can't wait to be of service to you again when you are in the Buena Park area.

Summary: I am never disappointed when staying at the Good Nite Inn in Buena Park. The rooms are well kept and the area looks inviting and well maintained. It is always a pleasure having you as a guest and we can't wait to welcome you back here at Good Nite Inn Buena Park.

Summary: My family stays at the Good Nite Inn every time we go to Disneyland and we have been doing this for almost 10 years. They have good rooms, WiFi and the best coffee every morning in the lobby. The staff is the best including Natalie, GC, Rebecca and Kathy. We are made to feel special and I will continue to stay at this motel as long as they let me!! I just made another 3 day reservation today!!

Our staff is truly the secret to our success.  Again thank you for time and review and we look forward to seeing you very soon!

Summary: The property is very clean, cozy and safe. front desk girl shabhna was very helpful and kind. she just gave excellent guest service and Our King sized bed was very comfortable and the water pressure and hot water in the shower was great! I would definitely stay again. i'll recommend this to all my friends and family
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your recent experience with us. We love knowing that the attentive service provided by Shabhna went a long way in making your stay a memorable one. We will share your kind compliments with her and we look forward to your next stay with us.

Summary: Everything was good. They should have better vending for snacks and drinks. Plus they should take prepaid debit cards because I made the reservation with one but couldn‚Äôt use it for the 25$ deposit which could‚Äôve been a problem but they honored it anyways.

Summary Heading: Excellent Service , Great Staff , clean rooms and quiet surroundings !
Summary: I have been coming to this GoodNite Buena Park , regularly atleast once or twice a month .  The staff is always friendly , Lately Maria at the front desk has been very pleasant, very professional at all times .

Summary: Love this hotel! It never lets me down.. same parking lot as McDonald‚Äôs. I have stayed in both the deluxe rooms on the 3rd floor(includes fridge and hallway entry) and the standard room. I have stayed here numerous times and she is always in a great mood.

Summary: Great And Friendly customer service...Clean Rooms Enviroment...great pricing Nice Location...Recommended..Been Staying There When I Visit Family For Years...Never Had An Issue With Pricing Staff Go Out Of Their Way To Meet Youre Needs...

Summary: Friendly staff...ask for RICKY...very accommodating...quiet room...for sure will stay there again!!!! Great location to all tourist attractions   You can walk to McDonald‚Äôs when you get hungry in late evening...
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to give us a detailed and wonderful review.  We are glad that you had a memorable stay and acknowledged the services provided by Ricky.. We love your intention of staying with us again and we can't wait to be hosting you soon..

Summary: The staff were friendly, facilities was good and for the price- you can‚Äôt go wrong! Easy access to freeway, McDonald‚Äôs just steps away and so many restaurants close by. Will recommend to family and friends.

Summary Heading: Our First Choice when Staying in the Area
Summary: I have stayed here several times over the last 7 years--mostly during the summer for an annual event we attend. The updated rooms are a plus, but the consistency in the efficient staff and the overall quality of the property is why we come back each year--and will continue to return.

Summary: GC was a great host and made us feel welcome during our stay. We stayed for one night and had no issues with billing, registration, or our keycards! We've stayed at different hotels in the past and have not encountered such friendly staff.

Summary: Very clean! Friendly staff and quiet property. Close to everything! I always come here when I'm in town. It is my favorite out of all the ones I have stayed at in Beuna Park. I highly recommend Goodnite INN for a good night!

Thank you for noticing and taking the time to submit your most favorable review and high recommendations.

Summary: This is the place where we always stay and never disappointed. The staff are great most especially Ricky who is always accommodating. Paul‚Äôs Place is just walking distance as well as Macdonalds. Rooms are clean and with a reasonable price.

Summary: We booked 6 rooms for our family trip to Disney.  Rooms were all ready when we arrived and check in time was quick!  Stores and gas station all in walking distance. Great hospitality & definitely will be staying here again!

Summary: We have stayed here many times.  The staff is awesome. The rooms are clean and the beds comfortable. Walking distance to good food. There are lots of restaurants just a short drive away as well. Driving to Knotts berry farm and Disneyland is close and quick.  Freeway access is quick and easy as well from here.

Summary: Everyone I met wished me a good morning or good evening. The lobby, corridors, room and bathroom were sparkling clean. The bed was SO comfortable! I would stay here again and again.Special shout out to Rachel who gave me all kinds of sight seeing tips.

Summary Heading: Very good hotel in fantasyic location
Summary: Very clean room,staff bery nice and helpfull.no breakfast but location fantastic.few good restaurants in.  front of hotel few minutes drive from buena park downtown lots of stores and good prices few minutes drive from knotts berry farm
Manager Response: Thank you for  staying with us. We do appreciate your detailed and fantastic feedback and we can't wait to be hosting you again.

Summary: Well.. where shall I start? Before I was finally able to find my very own apartment, I had to live with my parents. It was 2 years worth... of, misery. In those 2 years, I stumble upon this little Gem. And quite HB frankly, I was hooked after my very 1st visit. The customer service is beyond OUTSTANDING. The staff at the front desk are always smiling, and in a good mood. They're always eager to make you happy and meet all of your needs during your stay. The hotel rooms are ALWAYS clean, and the prices... just absolutely PERFECT for my tight budget. With that said, its been almost a year since I had last stayed here, and let me tell you, THE MADE ME FEEL LIKE I WAS MISSED EACH DAY THAT PASSED BY US. It instantly felt like family once again. The housekeeper always had the room
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to give us a detailed and wonderful review. We are very pleased that you always had a memorable stay with us.  We do appreciate you acknowledging the services of our staff and we will definitely share your nice words with them.We will be looking for your Staycation part 3 and onward.

Summary: Had to kill a couple spiders in my room. But other than that it was good. Nice staff. Quick to get my room key. Accidentally left a shirt behind but no big deal. Overall it was a good stay and at good price.
Manager Response: Thank  you for staying with us. We are glad that you had a great overall experience and found us with a reasonable price.  We do value your feedback and we can't wait to welcome you back.

Summary: I was staying at this place with my 2 children 15/18. It was perfect. The nicest staff,  friendly, helpsome and efficient. Clean rooms, good beds and the location was perfect. We will be back as soon as possible :-)
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. We are glad that you had an overall great experience. We do value your business and we can't wait to welcome you back.

Summary: Mc donalds right infront, gas station, near knotsberry. Plenty of free parking. Receptionist REBECCA, is very accommodating and helpful. We had prob in checking in and she really made it possible with a warm smile. Room wise, clean but dated. No fridge, microwave and some cigar smell. Their door lock malfunctioned we can't get in.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. We are thrilled to know that like the services provided by Rebecca and at the same found us close to restaurant and Knotts Berry Farm.  We just want to let you know that mini fridge and a coffee maker is available on 2 queen deluxe rooms and Microwave is located in the lobby. Hoping to see you again.

Summary: This hotel has a great location in a safe neighborhood.  It is quite convenient to Disneyland, Knotts Berry farm and all the related attractions.  There is no free breakfast only coffee served in the morning.  The halls and rooms have newer carpeting and the building seems well maintained.  The staff was friendly and welcoming.  Our only complaint was the poor quality of pillows.  They were hard as rocks and when we requested replacement pillows we got the same poor quality.  Without a quality pillow, getting a good night's rest was difficult.  If you plan to stay here bring you own pillow!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. We are glad that you found us clean and close to major theme parks.  We do appreciate your feedback and hoping to see you again.

Summary Heading: They are Awesome, my stay was wonderful and they will be my go to next time.
Summary: Rebecca was wonderful, Room were very clean inside and out. Great price for our stay. Will be staying again and recommend the Goodnight in to all. Thank you all for making is feel welcome and comfortable for out first family trip.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us.  We are thrilled to know that you found us with a reasonable price and at the same time impressed  with the great service provided by our staff most especially, Rebecca.  We will share your nice words with them and we can't wait to be hosting you again.

Summary: I enjoy staying at the Good Nite Inn if it‚Äôs for a weekend get away or just to be closer to knotts & Disneyland . GC and Ricky are always so welcoming at the reception when checking in and they answer all my questions & concerns.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for staying with us.  We love knowing that the attentive services provided by Ricky and G C went a long way in making your stay so memorable.  Reviews like this means the world to our associates and we will share your compliments with them. We are looking forward on your next stay here at Good Nite INN Buena Park.

Summary: The property is very clean, cozy and safe.  Our King sized bed was very comfortable and the water pressure and hot water in the shower was great!   I traveled with myself and daughter. We felt very safe. The price was awesome and for what this hotel offered they get a 4 out of 5 from me.   We typically prefer a room with fridge and microwave, however there is a microwave available in the lobby and we just brought our cooler.  Many convenience store and places to eat in the surrounding area.   I would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for staying with us and highlighting some of the key features of the property.  It is good to know  that you enjoyed all the aspects of your stay and we can't wait to be hosting you again.

Summary Heading: Takes the impossible out of LA area accommodations
Summary: Quiet, safe and clean. I checked in on a Sunday and checked out on a Friday. Repeat on following Sunday. The weekends necessitate my departure because the industry has its implacable standard of raising rates for the purpose of gain from the weekend crowd of vacationers. I suppose that it is perceived that weekend vacationers happily disregard budget considerations, because they are vacationers. Some hosts, in more remote parts of the country maintain  a steady room charge, finding that for them, it is more to secure to avoid playing the market.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. During the busy time rate goes up for all industry and especially hotels. Although rate goes up, we have the best rate compare to our competitor. We do appreciate you choose Good Nite Inn during busy time. We are looking forward to see you again!

Summary: Very good hotel, the staff were incredible especially Rebecca she was really helpful and went above and beyond. The management were good, the hotel was clean and it was a very comfortable stay overall. Would definitely stay there again and would recommend the hotel to families or anyone in general who wants a relaxing easy going and friendly stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recommendation and kudos to our amazing staff especially, Rebecca.  They truly do go above and beyond for our guests.  We do appreciate your feedback and we can't wait to be hosting you again.

Summary: I came here in May and July and it was the same lady at the counter both times!  She was very busy (over worked and possibly underpaid) both times I came in to check in, but she still provided us with awesome service!  She was also very helpful in suggesting places for me to grab last minute items and informed us they had a pool!  (The website said no pools)
Manager Response: Thank you for continuously staying with us.  We are glad the the impressive service by our Front Desk staff always goes a long way with you.  We will certainly share with her and  looking forward for next stay with us.

Summary: Excellent location with clean, comfy rooms and wonderful staff!  G.C. made the check-in process smooth and seamless, answering all of my questions and providing great recommendations as well.  My room was on the second floor, near the downstairs pool which had lots of commotion during the hot summer day, but had settled down towards the evening as I got a good night's rest in.  Safe at night, and close to fast food restaurants.  Highly recommended!!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your 5 star review of our hotel staff and clean and comfy rooms.   We appreciate you mentioning GC and her smooth and seamless guest service.  We certainly look forward to seeing you upon your next stay here at Good Nite Inn Buena Park.

Summary: The third floor room was very quiet, it meet our requirement that we could get enough rest. It has enough parking space. It close to fast food restaurant. The check-in serving ones are very polite and considerate.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. We are glad that you had an enjoyable stay.  We do appreciate your feedback and we can't wait to be hosting you again.

Summary: G.C and Ricky were very helpful! Helped us transfer between rooms with ease and was happy to help us with anything. Very friendly welcome and housekeeping. Sets a good standard for what it means to be a good inn. Shoes that were accidentally left were returned.

Summary Heading: Comfortable room, great staff, great staff.

Summary: This Hotel has always been my go to when I go to the Amusement Parks in that area. The Customer Service provided by G.C is always the best. Summary: The room was neat and clean , the bed was comfortable, the staff was pleasant, and courteous. After attending a wedding we didn't want to drive at night back to Barstow.so the decision was made to spend the night. The price was just right!

The location of this area is great with amusement parks and water parks you name, this hotel is centrally located to vacation sites. The thing I love most about this hotel is the great staff, Ricky in particular stands out since he easy to get along with and is very nice. Summary: Hotel staff was miraculous , they are very warm welcoming & always available when needed , Fantasia answered all my questions & concerns in a polite manner & was very helpful , will be staying here again !!!! :)

Summary Heading: Thanks for the grear accomodations Natatie & GC.
Summary: I checked in very late and Natalie helped me. The room that was given to me had a wierd sour smell to it when I entered. I called down to the office and Natalie immediatly moved me to another room. I was not going to bed yet, because I had stuff to do still, so I just grabbed the keys to new room and didnt go upstairs to check it out. When I did go to the room at 7am, I went straight into the bathroom and found a few roaches. I took a shower and called back down to tell front desk about the issue. My daughters were extremly tired since we had been up all night so I just told them to be aware of the room, and that we were too tired to get into another room, although it was offered to me. We left the property and when I returned, I went to the desk to ask for a key and was greeted
Manager Response: Thank you for your most recent review of our hotel and services.  We appreciate your honest feedback with the unfortunate issues you experienced in your room.   Please accept our apologies for those issues.  Our team strives everyday to offer the cleanest and friendliest hotel in our market.  As you can see by our many many reviews our team has been very successful through the years.  However, on occasion guests can and will have issues.  Mostly, we appreciate your focus on the way our team reacted and handled you situation with a sense of urgency and in a professional manner.  We believe you experienced our greatest asset... our Staff.  Natalie and GC are two of our most experienced guest service representatives and they both exhibited exceptional guest service.  We will be sure to thank Natalie and GC for their exceptional efforts.  We look forward to your next visit with us here in Buena Park, and again thank you for taking the time to give us your feedback and a positive review.

Summary: My go to place when I visit Buena Park. The property is well maintained and the customer service from Fantasia and Ricky was very welcoming & lovely as always!!! They make you feel right at home . I‚Äôll definitely be back, thank you! :)
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your 5 star review.  We especially thank you for mentioning Fantasia and Ricky as well as the cleanliness of the property and your room.  All of our employees strive everyday to be the friendliest and cleanest hotel in our area.  Again we appreciate you taking notice and giving us a rave review!  We look forward to seeing you on your next visit.

Summary: Hotel staff was amazing Ricky and G.C couldn't have been more accommodating... it's great to have such friendly people when your away from home.  Rooms are very clean and maid service is great...David is also very good at making sure your stay is perfect.  Thank you to all the great staff !! JESSICA üíñ
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to give a wonderful review.   We take pride on all the work we do and we are happy that   our attentive service went a long way with you,  We will share your nice compliments with our staff and we can't wait to be hosting you again.

Summary: My recent stay at Good Nite Inn was amazingly delightful. First and foremost, Rebecca the receptionist made me and my family feel welcome and genuinely cared for. I planned a two day visit to Knotts and this hotel was in very close proximity. I would highly recommend staying here.
