We do value your opinion and couldn't be happier to be of service to you again when you are in the Buena Park area.

Summary: I‚Äôve stayed here about 10 times already the staff is very accommodating Rebecca at the front desk is always very friendly the rooms are always clean and smelling nice quiet peaceful place to stay and always affordable!
Manager Response: Thank you for continuously staying with us. We are very happy that you always had an enjoyable stay and at the same  impressed with the excellent services provided by Rebecca.  We will share your nice words with her and we can't wait to be hosting you again.

Summary: The have very nice staff. The rooms are clean. It meets our budget. Best price around. There is food on site, McDonald's and Paul's Place in the parking lot. Very close to entertainment and shopping. Disney and Knott's are within 10 mins. if not closer.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to give us a detailed and wonderful review. We are glad that you like our clean rooms and took advantage of our proximity to the places of your interest. We do value your business and we can't wait to be hosting you again.

Summary: Always a great stay, whenever I visit in the area. The grounds are always nice and clean. The staff is attentive and helpful. This has become my ‚Äúgo to‚Äù place to stay. I recommend to my friends, family and even coworkers, that they stay here.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us.  We do appreciate your loyalty and wonderful feedback about your experience here.  Thank you as well for your recommendation and Kudos to our amazing staff .  They truly do go above and beyond for our guests.

Summary: I always go here anytime I need a place to spend the night in. G.C. from front desk always help me find the best deal for the hotel and makes sure that my stay will always be great. Thank you again, G.C!
Manager Response: Thank you for continuing to choose Good Nite Inn, Buena Park. We love knowing that the attentive services provided by GC always goes along way in making you stay so memorable. Reviews like yours means the world to our associates and we will surely share your compliments with her.

Summary: We love this place and stay here every time we go to Disneyland. The short drive is worth the money we save not staying closer to the park. My only complaint is the beds. Some of the ones we've had here were comfortable, but the last couple rooms, and this last trip in particular, we had beds that were very, very hard and uncomfortable. If they'd just upgrade the beds, I'd give them five stars.
Manager Response: Thank you for always choosing Good Nite Inn Buena Park.  We do appreciate your loyalty and sharing your feedback as it helps us identify the areas we need for improvements so we can better service our guests.  Again, Thank you and hoping to see you again when you are in the Buena Park/Anaheim areas.

Summary: I stayed here for 6 nights. Part of the time it was just me and a 15 year old girl, later we were joined by my husband and another 15 year old girl. We arrived a bit late the first night and when I called, I was assured it would be fine, we would have both a room and parking. We checked in about 11:30 PM and easily found a convenient parking space. The parking area was well lighted and I felt quite safe. We unloaded our luggage and were happy to find there was an elevator to take us up to our second floor room. We entered our room and while the reviews I had read were pretty good, the price we paid was low enough that I was worried what I might find. To my surprise (and delight!) we had an immaculately clean, reasonably spacious room. All furniture was in good repair and the
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your most favorable review and especially for taking the time to express in detail all your delight in our hotel and service.  All of our team members here at Good Nite Inn take great pride in all of our work.  It is especially gratifying for all of us to read a review that appreciates each and every area of our hotel and reassures us that our guest do take notice of a job well done and all of our efforts.  Our goal is to provide the cleanest and friendliest hotel in our market with the best price and a great location.  It appears you experienced all the secrets to our success.  Again, thank you, and we look forward to seeing you again on your next visit to our area.

Summary: Good Nite Inn has become our go to place when we need a little staycation. G.C. was wonderful as always during check-in!  We stayed a total of two nights this last time around, and the only issue we encountered was the unwarranted leaf blower in the McDonald's parking lot at 6am on Saturday morning which is out of Good Nite Inn's control (we called front desk to check). Other than that we will still be returning guests. :)
Manager Response: Thank you for continuing to choose Good Nite Inn Buena Park. We do appreciate your loyalty and understanding and at the same time acknowledging GCs impressive customer service.    We do value your business and we can't wait to welcome you again.

Summary: Overall, the room and service are good but I did let the front desk know they should probably have the room fumigated ( not bed bugs, but some other crawling insects throughout the week I was there).  Did not find them in my luggage when I got home.  Also, food and other debris under the beds.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and the detailed review.  We do appreciate your feedback and rest assured your comments  will be referred to the department concerned. Hoping to see you again when you are in the Anaheim/Buena park area.

Summary: Service at this location is great! G.C at the front desk checks me in every time and she always is so friendly, helpful, and welcoming. Clean hotel, great quality for a great price. I always enjoy my stays here.
Manager Response: Thank you for continuously staying with us. We do appreciate your loyalty and at the same time acknowledged the excellent service provide by GC. We will share your nice words with her and we can't wait to be hosting you again.

Summary: I travel to Buena Park from out of state several times a year and I wouldn't stay anywhere else while I'm there. The entire motel is clean and appealing and the staff is exceptional. They consider themselves as family and it shows. I give 5 plus stars to the desk staff of Natalie, Ricky, GC, Rebecca and Fantasia and to Caty in housekeeping. I call this Good Nite Inn my home away from home because that's how they make me feel.
Manager Response: It is a pleasure for us to read how much you enjoy your stays.  Our front desk staff are all excellent and they each take great pride in their positions and in taking care of our guests.  Cathy in Housekeeping is excellent as well.  We do appreciate you taking the time to give us a most favorable review of 5 stars.  Again, thank you for your time and we look forward to your next visit.

Summary: We had a great stay at the Good Nite Inn! The guest service was amazing. All the staff were so helpful, gracious and friendly! A special thank you to Rebecca and how she serves people!! We also liked the location. It was great access to anything in Orange County. It was a good time for us as we celebrated our son graduating from college. We would definitely stay again!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. We are glad that you had a great stay and was impressed with the service of our staff most especially, Becky.  We will share your kind words with them and we look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: We have stayed there for almost a week. It has been a nice experience overall. My family also enjoyed the stay. Would certainly like to visit this place again. We would also recommend this place to others.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. We are happy that you had an enjoyable overall experience.  Thank you as well for your intention of recommending us and hoping to see you soon in the near future.

Summary: My family & I stayed at this hotel & it feels amazing for its cheap price. It was also recently renovated so it feels like a newer hotel. Only downside is there is no free breakfast, but there are a lot of restaurants right next to it as well.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for reviewing your stay with us. We are thrilled to know that you had a great stay and we can't wait to welcome you back.

Summary: My family and I had a long stay at the Good Nite Inn in Buena Park. We are very pleased with every day of our stay there. The hotel is very clean & nicely kept. Our room was located in the 3rd floor of the building & we enjoyed that very much too. We felt safe and were able to sleep very well as it was calm and tranquil at night. The staff is super friendly: Front desk is very welcoming, housekeeping is too. You're always greeted with a smile & a hello. We are beyond grateful for how accommodating & helpful Ricky & G.C were. They were very understanding of the needs of my family. They are AMAZING!! Thank you =) Overall, we had a wonderful and very positive experience and stay at the Good Nite Inn in Buena Park. Not only was the hotel a good price, a super deal, clean and safe
Manager Response: Thank you very much for the detailed and wonderful review. We are thrilled to know that you had an enjoyable stay and appreciate the impressive services provided by our staff most especially Ricky and GC.  We do value your opinion and looking forward to welcome you back in the future.

Summary Heading: A better than usual budget hotel
Summary: We booked 3 rooms for 4 nights for a family vacation, rooms were updated and very clean, no issues to speak of. Although off a busy intersection there was no noise to speak of, grounds were clean and well kept. Has an elevator for easy access! Front desk personel were wonderful, alwsys friendly and accomidating. Will deffinately come again.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing Good Nite Inn Buena Park. We do appreciate your detailed and wonderful feedback and we can't wait to be hosting you again .Hoping to earn a 5-star next time.

Summary: I was actually quite surprised to see how nice this place actually is. Staff is super friendly, I‚Äôve dealt with G.C and Ricky both of whom are very polite and friendly and super helpful. Ricky helped me check in early when I arrived the first day and G.C gave me information that really helped and for that I‚Äôm grateful. I was surprised at how clean I felt the room was as well. Most comfortable place I‚Äôve stayed in where I felt safe and clean (though I use my own sheets and blankets EVERYWHERE. The ladies that do the housekeeping are also very friendly. I always make it a point to talk to them not like they‚Äôre staff but like they‚Äôre actual people because that‚Äôs exactly what they are. Friendly staff and the room üëçüèºüëçüèºüëçüèº. Happy with my stay and the pricing as well
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your 5 star review and we are pleased of your great satisfaction on your recent stay here at Good Nite Inn.  Thank you for mentioning our employees and how they were most friendly and helpful of your accommodations and needs.  We certainly look forward to seeing you again on your next visit to our area.

Summary: Customer service was excellent but the noise in my room late at night was terrible. My neighbors next to me were loud and the ones above me kept running back and forth til 2am I barely got any sleep and had to go to work the next day. Also, there were flies in the room. I will not be returning.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. Please accept our apology for the inconvenience you had. It is never our intention to disappoint you in anyway. We wish you could have contacted our Guest Services at that time so we can remind the other rooms to keep it down.  We do value your feedback and we hope you will give us a chance to redeem ourselves.

Summary: It's a nice place. All workers are kind and helpful. The room and bathrooms are clean. Good place to stay for a short while. The only thing is that we don't have our own mini fridge and microwave.....
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us.  We just want to let you know that mini fridge and coffee makers are available on 2 queen deluxe rooms and microwave is located in the lobby.  Hoping to see you again.

Summary: Ive been here three times in the past year. Since my first visit, this hotel was great in my eyes. Staff is very attentive and will try to accomodate people's needs.   Only downfall this time, I was very shocked to find out they had no ADA double QQ rooms. Since I am in a wheelchair and traveled with three daughters, it was something I needed. Maybe in the future.   Thank You GNI Buena Park.
Manager Response: Thank you for continuously staying with us. We do appreciate your loyalty and your feedback which will be referred to the department concerned . Thanks again and looking forward to be hosting you again.

Summary Heading: ADA review of Buena Park GN Inn
Summary: Overall, I had a very nice stay @ GN Inn Buena Park. I still feel many hotels have a way to go to answer the needs of the Handicap person. They need longer shower hoses for one. I liked the barn door for access to the bathroom. Clever design. The ironing board and iron are mounted on the wall across the room from any outlet. The rooms was clean. Good location. Safe.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us.  We do appreciate your feedback about our amenities and we are looking at it to improve the stay and comfort of our guest.  We are looking forward to welcome you back.

Summary Heading: A great place for a business man on a budget. Its clean, quite and the clientele is mostly working men and women.
Summary: While very slim on amenities, This motel, is clean, relatively quite and I was never concerned about me or my vehicles safety. Black Bear Inn just across the street provides great meals at a reasonable price. This is my go to place in the LA basin when ever I travel
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. We are thrilled to know that you found us a great place to stay.  Hope we earn the 5-star in the future.

Summary: We shopped around and landed here, price was right, distance to Knotts was reasonable, clean room, quiet hotel, and free coffee! The staff were all very nice and helpful. The only negative coming from a family of 4 was the bathroom door. although rooms were clean and nicely remodeled, the bathroom door wasn't private enough for us. Other than it was a great stay!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to give us a detailed and wonderful review.  We are glad that you had an overall good experience and hoping to see you soon.

Summary Heading: Great Place in the Area to Stay
Summary: My overall experience at this hotel has always been a positive one, room service to checking in, Ricky especially is one the best people at the desk. He is a vet nice guy to talk to and always there to help. I recommend to stay here with it‚Äôs clean rooms and nice staff to check people in.
Manager Response: Thank you for continuing to choose Good Nite Inn, Buena Park .  Thank you as well as for  your recommendation and kudos to our amazing staff, especially Ricky.  They truly do go above and beyond for our guest.

Summary: First time using good nite inn. We love the place. Clean , very pleasant and friendly customer service . Very quite place to rest after long day trip and we will come back again . The room was clean and neat . The towel and pillows are clean .
Manager Response: Thank you Mr. Nguyen for sharing your experience with us and the wonderful review. We hope there was no more delays on your flight back.  We do appreciate your feedback and we can't wait to welcome you back.

Summary: A great base for a family trip to Disneyland,Clean rooms, happy helpful staff. Great location with good eating places within a very short walk of the hotel. Sadly breakfast not available and no fridge in room but ice and coffee available in lobby.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us.  We are happy that you found us with a strategic location close to famous eateries and Disneyland..  We just want to inform you that mini fridge and coffee makers are available on 2 Queen deluxe rooms and we can't wait to be hosting you again.

Summary: Very friendly staff and rooms are nice and neat. Only place I stay in Buena Park area. Eating establishments across parking lot and the street. Rooms in hallways that need key to get in makes for great security.
Manager Response: Thank you staying with us and the 5 star review. We do appreciate your loyalty and wonderful feedback about your experience with us.  We look forward to your next visit here at Good Nite Inn.

Summary Heading: Great location. The front desk person (G.C) was very welcoming!
Summary: Took our little girl to Disneyland for her 6th birthday. We didn't want to spend a lot on a fancy hotel since we figured we wouldn't be there much but we also didn't want to be too far away from the theme park. We're from a small city in Canada so we aren't used to driving on freeways. The location of this hotel is perfect for the price. About a 10 min drive to Disneyland and it's an easy route I might add. The hotel was very clean and fairly quite during our stay. The lady at the front desk (G.C.) was fantastic. She made us feel very welcome and gave us all the details we needed to have a good stay. I would 100% recommend this hotel if you're looking for a clean, reasonably priced place that is close to Disney.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your wonderful experience with us. We are glad that you found us close to Disneyland and at the same time taking notice of the excellent service provided by GC.  We will share your kind compliments with her and we can't wait to be hosting you again when you are in the area.

Summary Heading: Great stay for a great price!
Summary: Took a mother daughter trip to California and stayed at Good Nite Inn. Had a room closer to the pool and found it semi quite at night. Felt safe during our trip. There‚Äôs no breakfast but McDonalds is in the same parking lot. Enjoyed not having to pay for parking. Bed comfortable but pillows are not. Would stay here again. Overall great stay.
Manager Response: We are happy you had a most memorable Mother daughter trip to sunny So Cal.  thank you for your most favorable review.  We do appreciate when our guests take the time to let us know how they enjoyed their stay.  We share these reviews with our staff in order to enhance our own awareness of how well or not we are doing.  We do hope to see you again on your next visit to our area.

Summary Heading: Thank you for a wonderful stay
Summary: My family and I are from Denver Co...  We where searching for a place to stay and found this place close to all the theme parks we where visiting...  Rooms where clean and staff where friendly..  The great restaurant next door was a plus!!   Thank you all for a great 3 days!! See you all again next year...
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. We are thrilled to know that you had a wonderful stay and found us close to major theme parks and eateries. It was nice to be of service to you and we can't wait to welcome you back.

Summary: Excellent hotel, very comfortable, very nice people working there, there is nothing I don‚Äôt like from good Nite Buena Park, Every time,I am at L.A, I stay there and I will continue doing it. I reccomend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for recommending us. We do value your opinion and couldn't be happier that you enjoyed your stay with us.  we are always looking forward to welcome you back in the near future.

Summary Heading: Please include microwaves in deluxe rooms.
Summary: The room was nice very close to Disneyland.  It had a mini fridge in the deluxe room. Only down fall was no microwave in the room. Had to go to the lobby to hear food and lobby closed at 9pm. Other than that great stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. We are glad that you had a great stay and took advantage of our proximity to Disneyland. We do value your feedback and we can't wait to welcome you back.

Summary: I've been using this hotel almost exclusively for my LA trips for the last 7 years. The staff is always courteous and very helpful. You can't find any better for the price, and 10 minutes from Disneyland makes it an ideal location without the premium. I've stayed here at least 40+ nights over the years and will continue to do so.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time for sharing your pleasant experience during your stays with us and the wonderful review.  It is of great pleasure to having a guest like you and we are always looking forward to welcome you back.

Summary Heading: Comfortable, Clean, Great Value & Friendly Staff!
Summary: I stay here frequently for business and try to be as cost-effective for my company as possible ... this place has a great location, is secure, and C.J. at the front desk treats you like family, she is awesome!! When you‚Äôre a regular visitor they even have your paperwork done ahead of time to make check-in all that much easier. Clean linens and rooms, upgraded TV, big room and bath and well insulated meaning quiet! It‚Äôs a really nice place!! This is a smaller company than the big names but still has the higher quality. It was a great surprise when I initially found this place and have been staying here when in town ever since. I highly recommend it for a great place that can save you some $$ to spend at the parks ... Knotts is just a couple of blocks away.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time and give us a wonderful review.  We do appreciate your loyalty and acknowledging the services of our staff most especially, GC.  It is indeed always a pleasure to have you here .

Summary: It is quiet most of the time unless work is being done. They are very propmt to let guest know when they are working on anything that can effect the visit. Everyday guest are greeted with a smile by the staff. The staff makes you feel at home. If you stay often they try to remember if you need a special room. Rooms are deep cleaned often as well. I LOVE IT HERE!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us.  We do appreciate your loyalty and we always like to welcome you here. We do value your business and it is of great pleasure to be of service to you.

Summary: I‚Äôve visited this hotel multiple times in the past few months and every time it‚Äôs a great experience! G.C at the front desk is always so welcoming and she remembers me every time, she‚Äôs so helpful and meets my needs for a room. There‚Äôs always lots of people there since it‚Äôs very convenient for the theme parks in the area. You can find a good room for a good price.
Manager Response: Thank you for always staying with us.  We are pleased to know that you always had a great stay and at the same time acknowledging GC's impressive guest services. We will share your kind compliments with her and we can't wait to welcome you back.

Summary: I stayed at Good nite inn, in Buena Park,Ca. Rebecca helped me with the room and was the sweetest and most helpful for my stay. She was very nice. I really enjoyed her, and was really happy she was there to help as other motels I had gone to people were really rude.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. We are glad that you like the services provided by Rebecca and it went a long way with you.  We will share your kind words with her and we can't wait to be hosting you again.

Summary: This is the only hotel I love coming too. The rooms are always clean and the customer service is great. I've been here a couple of times and G.C. has always made me feel welcomed. I would recommend this place to anyone traveling to the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to share your pleasant experience.  We are thrilled  that you like the services provided by GC and we will surely share your kind compliments with her.   We value your business and we can't wait to welcome you back.

Summary: It was a great hotel and I love my experience with the staff especially the front desk woman named G.C. she was a wonderfully host and she kind and respectful and funny and she was filipino which was a plus. The hotel was outstanding and beautiful.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. We are glad that the services provided by GC went a long way with you.  We will share your kind words with her and we can't wait to be hosting you again.

Summary: I've been staying at this Hotel for a while and the hotel is always very clean as well as the rooms. Good prices for the area.  G.C. has been incredibly nice and very helpful every time I‚Äôm in town. Parking is adequate. Overall a great place to stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for continuously staying with us. We are happy that you always had a pleasant experience and sharing it with us.  We are glad as well  for acknowledging the impressive service provided by GC.  We will share your kind words with her and we can't wait to welcome you back.

Summary: I have been to this hotel before, so I knew what to expect as far as the quality of the room goes. It's pretty great for the price you pay, but what really impresses me is the staff. When I arrived I was warmly greeted by Fantasea, who checked me without a hitch and a smile so big, I felt like she had known me forever. When I went to check out, Rebecca was like a shining star to my otherwise groggy morning (I'm not a morning person). Great staff, great place...5/5 already looking forward to my next visit!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us.  We do appreciate your loyalty and wonderful feedback about your experience here.  We are happy as well of acknowledging the impressive services provided by Fantasia and Rebecca.  Hoping to see you again in the near future.

Summary: Ricky at the front counter was super friendly and helpful. He got us checked in without a problem. He informed me that I accidentally made a second reservation by mistake and helped me in getting a full refund! Room was clean and the staff was nice! Would stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us.  We are thrilled to know that the attentive service provided by Ricky went a long way in making your stay so memorable.  Reviews like yours mean the world to our associate and we will share your compliments with him.   We do like as well of your intentions of staying with us again.

Summary: I stayed at this hotel for 2 days and did not have any huge issues. Fantasia from the front desk checked me in and always had a smile on her face. My room was spacious and very clean. In fact, the entire hotel has just been remodeled and looks great! Everything still has a new look to it which is good to see. Location of the hotel is supreme. There are plenty of places to eat within a 3 minute walk. The hotel is quiet and very well kept. Parking is abundant and well lit. the pool is in great shape and is clean. If you're looking for "better than standard" hotel room, you cant beat it for the price.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to give us a wonderful review. We are happy that you had a wonderful stay and the services provided by Fantasia went a long way.  We will share your kind compliments with her and we can't wait to welcome you back.

Summary: Perfect stay. From the moment I walked in I was welcomed and accommodated quickly. The room are big, clean, and best price in town.i would definitely recommend this anyone. This place is quite and relaxing. Perfect for business or pleasure.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and the five-star review. We are glad that our Front Desk staff accorded you an exceptional service and we will surely share your kind complements with them. We do value your business and we can't wait to be hosting you again

Summary: When I visit Buena Park I only stay at this hotel. The price, location and most importantly the great customer service keeps me coming back. From the moment I arrive I'm greeted and welcomed. Front desk personnel are friendly and make checking in easy. Rebecca is great and friendly, Fantasia is awesome too and always has a smile on her face. Ricky is awesome as well, he takes initiative and once made a reservation for me when he knew I was extending to ensure I had a room the next day. When I arrived this time, it was late and she already had everything ready to go so all I had to do was sign, get my keys so I could go to bed.   This hotel is clean and economical. It has all your necessities, food next door, gas station across the street and you can't beat the price.   Thank you
Manager Response: Thank you for your being our regular guest and for your positive feedback. We highly appreciate your kind gesture of acknowledging our staff. We will convey your kind words to Ricky, Fantasia, Rebecca and the housekeepers. We take pride in our staff for always going an extra mile to making your stay memorable and enjoyable. We always look forward to see you.

Summary: Rooms are to old and rooms needs to be cleaner. They need to upgrade everything! check in was fast and the parking is pretty big at no cost. 10 mins from disney but no walking distance! I expected rooms to be nice but of course. Maybe next time i will find something nice and pay a little more.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. We are glad that you took advantage of our proximity to Disneyland. We do appreciate your feedback and it  will be relayed to the department concerned.   Hoping to see you again.

Summary: The rooms are very well kept and very clean. It is a very basic room, beds and a desk with a chair. There is no closet or extra space, but we needed a place to sleep after theme parks nearby and it was great. The staff is also very friendly and helpful. Would stay again!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. We are glad that you took advantage of our proximity to  major theme parks. We are happy as well for acknowledging the services provided by our staff and we will definitely share your kind compliments with them. We do value your feedback and we can't wait to be hosting you again.

Summary: So far one of the best hotel  around the area very very respectable and the person that attended me her name is Santasia.  She was real polite and took care of me very good even showed us to the room. O  The place where you clean
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. We are glad that like our location and found us with a reasonable rate.  we are happy as well that the service provided by Fantasia went a long way.  We will share your kind words with her and we can't wait to be hosting you again.

Summary: In general, very good, the problem was the digital keys of the room and there is no safe in the bathroom. The delicious coffee The clean room I congratulate the very kind and attentive employees, very hardworking.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. We are glad that you had an enjoyable experience and like the attentive service by our employees.  We do value your feedback and we can't wait to welcome you back.

Summary: Pleasantly surprised with this budget friendly hotel. Staff were friendly and courteous, rooms were clean, the pool was very nice. Right next door were three restaurants, one of them being a McDonalds which was great for a cheap breakfast and late night snacks after walking all day at Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. We are thrilled to know that you had a pleasant experience and at the same time took advantage of our proximity to Disneyland and  famous eateries.  We do value your business and we can't wait to be hosting you again.

Summary: We travel a lot for business staying in a wide range of hotels. The Good Nite was one of the best we have seen for the price. Shower, beds, heater/AC all worked excellently (if you travel you know this is not alwyas the case) staff was was very friendly and helpful over the top actually, and the place is clean and well maintained. Needed some things printed without leaving the property and Fantasia and Ricky found a way with a great attitude got it done. Would recommend this hotel highly and put it on the list to stay again when in this area.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to give us a detailed and wonderful review. We are thrilled to know that you had an enjoyable experience and Ricky and Fantasia afforded you an exceptional service.  We will share your nice compliments with them and hoping to be hosting you again soon.

Summary Heading: Good value. Not terrible, but not awesome.
Summary: Super clean place, nice staff. Honestly, just what I would expect for the price. I was a little concerned that the elevator inspection expired last year. And the beds were harder than woodpecker lips.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us.  We are glad that you found our place super clean with a reasonable price. We just want to let you know that we are just waiting for the government agency to inspect the elevator and get the certification after that. We do value your business and we can't wait to welcome you back.

Summary: Good night inn offers most basic need I wanted for a week of budget stay. Clean room. Good size. Hot water comes quick and the strength of water is excellent. Location is easy & Staff are friendly.  It is already exceed my expectation based on the cost I paid.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to give us a detailed and wonderful review.  We are thrilled to know that we have exceeded your expectation and will  continue to do so.  Your feedback is valuable to us and hoping to welcome you again when you are in the Buena Park area.

Summary: IOne of my favorite people.they are so Kind. Polite. And honest they were wen i lost important documents they retrieve for me. Clean and updated with a pool! Always had a good experience me and my family
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. We are thrilled to know that you had a great  overall experience and was able to retrieved your pertinent papers. We do value your business and we can't wait to welcome you back.

Summary: Loveeeee this hotel!!! Great pricing ! Decent rooms & The staff always goes above and beyond to make sure your stay is just how you want it! Special thanks to Fantasia! Would definitely recommend to others :)
Manager Response: Thank you very much for staying with us.  We are glad that you had an awesome experience and Fantasia's impeccable service went a long way.  We will share your nice compliments with her and thanks as well for your intention of recommending us.  Hoping to see you soon.

Summary Heading: Terrific basic motel, not luxury with amenities, but great place to sleep
Summary: Very comfortable for a basic motel. Lot's of attention to detail on the part of staff and management (on my departure morning saw staff cleaning up the parking lot, reflective of the care taken in maintaining the whole property). Like having the sink outside the bathroom, always a plus for convenience.  Area felt safe.   ¬∑ There's no fridge, microwave or coffee maker in the room, always nice to have, though the hotel makes it clear they're not provided. Similarly no breakfast provided, but there are 3 options within a 1 minute walk. Morning coffee is provided in the lobby, along with a microwave and tables for eating.  Since the price point of hotel is comparable to others with those facilities, would be nice to have those additional amenities, but not a deal breaker for me
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to give us such a detailed and wonderful review.  We are thrilled to know that you had an enjoyable experience.  We just want to let you know that mini fridge and coffee makers are available on 2 queen deluxe rooms.  We do value your business and we can't wait to be hosting you again.

Summary: Planned on a very short time a visit to Disneyland with our family.   The place was neat, warm, clean and perfect. Allowed us to move around the town very easily.  The staff welcomed us with a big smile and a great atittude!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and the 5-star review.  We are thrilled to know that you had an enjoyable experience and found our location strategically located to the places of your interest.  We do value you as a guest and we can't wait to welcome you back when you are in the area.

Summary: Excellent hotel, I highly recommended, my family and I stayed for a week and the personal was very friendly, the room was very clean, and is very close of the supermarkets, gas station, pharmacy, mac donals and Anaheim.
Manager Response: We are most thankful for your positive review on your recent stay with us here in Buena Park.  We will share your appreciation for our employees and the clean standards you experienced.  We hope to see you again upon your next visit to our area.

Summary: Just checked in and Ricky was such a good front desk representative and made things quick, easy, and made me felt at home I‚Äôll definitely be booking a room here again and also recommending it to other friends
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us.  We are glad tat Ricky's impressive service makes your stay an enjoyable one. We do  appreciate your intention of recommending us and we would like to be hosting you again when you are in the Buena Park area.

Summary: I stay at this Good Nite Inn frequently because the staff is exceptional. They are always pleasant and accommodating. When I go for coffee in the morning, Natalie takes the time to talk with me. They all know me by name and my room preferences so I feel very welcome here. I wouldn‚Äôt go anywhere else. Good job!
Manager Response: Thank you for always staying with us. We appreciate your loyalty and wonderful feedback about your experience here. We do thank you as well for acknowledging Natalie's impressive service and we'll surely share this with her. Again,  a big  'THANK YOU" and we can't wait to welcome you again.

Summary Heading: fine place until contacting the staff
Summary: lacking of basic understanding of customer's needissuing a simple invoice was a hurdle for the night and day staff as wellunderstanding what the customer tells is impossible if there is no tailor made dictionary answer in the staff's handbook, which means people with mind are won't be employeed here
Manager Response: Thank you for the valuable feedback. We will work with our front desk to ensure about the issue that you mentioned. Although we understand your concern, Prepaid reservations that are made via Hotels.com, front desk staff is bound not to provide invoice to guest. We are sorry about that and hope you will come again and stay with us!

Summary: The room was very clean and comfortable. The hotel is nicely located and within walking distance to multiple restaurants. Very happy with stay overall. Only (minor) issue was poor access to drinking water since you could only get it from vending machines at a cost of $2.5 per 16oz bottle.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us.  We are happy that you had a memorable experience and found us strategically located to your interests.  We do value your business and hoping to see you again.

Summary Heading: Love Love Love the Good Nite Inn Buena Park
Summary: Super clean and affordable hotel just blocks from Knotts Berry Farms, Great little restaurant in the same parking lot less than 5 minutes walk. The only down side to the GOod Nite Inns is that they are smoke free. But they have great little sitting areas where you can smoke if needed. Free tea and coffee as well. THe best part is the staff is always plesant. I love the GOod Nite Inn in Camirillo too!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and your "Love" of our place.  We are happy that you found us clean and affordable and at the same time took advantage of our proximity to Knotts berry Farm. We do value your patronage with us and the Camarillo office and we can't wait to be hosting you again.

Summary Heading: Grandpa and granny go to the big city.
Summary: We searched the internet to find a decent motel that was not ridiculously overpriced and without hidden cost (parking fees, etc). Good Nite Inn was a great choice. The staff was friendly and very helpful. The facility and rooms were clean and comfortable. And the price was great. Our room did not have all the frills (refrigerator, coffee maker, etc) but I understand other rooms do. It was also conveniently located close to attractions, restaurants and coffee shops (within walking distance). We highly recommend this motel.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and your detailed review.  We are glad that you  enjoyed your time with us  and we hope to welcome you back soon.  Thank you as well for your recommendation.

Summary: I was very surprised with the room and facilities.  The room was very clean and smelled really good.the staff was friendly and helpful. I look forward to staying here again. Only down fall for me was beds were too firm for my liking...
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us.  We are happy that you had an overall  pleasant experience and our staff accorded you a great service.   We do value your feedback and we can't wait to welcome you back.

Summary: We stayed for two nights. The first night, we were in a 2nd floor room below a family with noisy children, so we both barely got any sleep as there was a lot of running around and sounds of fast heavy footsteps. The next morning, we asked if we could move to another room that is not under a noisy family. They offered to upgrade us. We said we didn't need an upgrade, but they said it won't cost more, so we were moved to a better room on the third floor.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to give us a wonderful review.  We are happy that we were able to resolve the noise issue you had that made your stay comfortable.   Again, thank you for staying us and hoping to see you soon.

Summary: This hotel was great! Friendly staff, clean, big rooms, close to Disneyland and Knotts Berry Farm. Good restaurants within walking distance. Very reasonably priced. Would definitely stay here again!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your recent experience  with us and the 5-star review.  We are glad that you took advantage of our proximity to Disneyland and Knotts Berry Farm .  We look forward to your next stay at Good Nite Inn.

Summary: Clean, comfortable and convenient. We spent the days out doing things and came here at night to sleep. It isn‚Äôt fancy, but location was great for what we were doing. It is obviously really close to Knotts Berry farm, but also was only about 10 minutes from Disneyland, was way less expensive than hotels next to the park, and a really easy drive. The diner next door had great breakfast and the Korean restaurant down the road was awesome.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us.  We are thrilled to know that you had an enjoyable experience and at the same time finding us close to major them parks and restaurants.  We do value you as a guest and we can't wait to be hosting you again.

Summary: Place was fantastic,  clean, sanitized big rooms. Easy access to public transport since its located in the corner of major roads. Staff was awesome, checkin was a breeze, hats of to the front desk clerk ( G. C ) she was friendly and very courteous.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your recent experience with us. We are glad to know that the service you received from GC went a long way . We will share your kind compliments with her and hoping to see you soon.

Summary: I have stayed here a lot of times and all my experiences have been great with them. Thank you for all the services you have with me and the people I bring. the rooms are very clean and have everything what you need
Manager Response: Thank you very much for being a loyal customer. We do appreciate you reviewing your stay with us and the 5-star review.  We are thrilled to know that you always enjoyed your stay and we are very grateful as well for recommending us to your circle.  We hope to welcome you back very soon.

Summary: Return visit, good value for the money. Clean, easy access in and out of parking lot, quiet area, friendly and helpful staff. Good location with nearby shopping and restaurants. Not hard to get to from the freeways.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to give us such a detailed and wonderful review.  We strive to make each stay as pleasant and comfortable as possible .  We are also delighted to hear that you took advantage of our proximity to major freeways and shopping areas.  Hoping to see you soon.

Summary: It was our first time visit in Disneyland California and we stayed in Good Nite Inn for 3 nights it was nice and everyone is very accommodating especially Ricky the receptionist. We are sure we're going to come back.

We are glad that you were impressed with the excellent service provided by our staff most especially, Ricky. Your kind words will be shared with them and hoping to see you again when you are in the Buena Park area.

Summary: This hotel is always friendly, always a clean room. everything works, every time.Loved the stay. Room was clean and well maintained. The staff was friendly and the room was big,  will definitely stay again. Especially G.C. who is always welcome to me
Manager Response: Thank you for your loyalty and wonderful feedback about your experience here.  We are glad that you're impressed with the excellent service provided by our staff, most especially GC.  Thanks again and we look forward to your next stay here at Godd Nite Inn.

Summary: The personnel is very nice and help you in anyways. We really like Fantasia she was super helpful. Thank you so much !!!  The hotel is a 2* so you get what you have for your money. It s correct, very well situated especially for Disney and the others funpark. You have a Mac Donald‚Äôs  just in front so it s nice when your arrive late from the airport for example.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. We love knowing that the attentive service provided by Fantasia went a long way in making your stay memorable. This review like yours mean the world to our associates and we will share your compliments with her.  Hoping to see you again.

Summary Heading: Extremely run down hotel! Don‚Äôt waste your time or money!
Summary: Extremely run down hotel from the exterior and interior. I definitely would not even give this hotel any stars if I could. You are charged for the entire stay upon arrival so cancelling your reservation or going elsewhere is not possible. First of all, the elevator is run down as you can‚Äôt even tell what floor your on. The room is a nightmare! The curtains had spots and stains all over, the floors felt extremely dirty as I couldn‚Äôt even walk barefooted as I felt disgusted to do so. The bathroom was filthy!  The toilet  seat was cracked, the toilet had previous filth stains inside as you could clearly tell it was not properly cleaned. The sink area where the towels were placed had white spots of who knows what. I am definitely surprised I didn‚Äôt see any rodents as the hotel was
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback as negative as it may be.  We will try harder.

Summary: I had debated amomgst myself as to whether or not I should even bother to book a room at all for tonight, or to just "suffer through the icy cold winter night" at my mother's house, yet again? Mind you, it had been an "overnight temperate" of 39 degrees Farenheit, or BELOW, for the entire week. My mother hardly turns on her heater, so last night was extremely  cold in her living room. After some contemplation, I decided to call the GoodNite Inn directly and ask for any availability in rooms and their current rates for an overnight stay.  KP took the call and had advised of an available room and an extremely affordable price. He booked it for me and drove out to them immediately.  This was indeed,  a last minutw decision that was "meant-to-be." The overnight was well within my
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to give us such a wonderful review.  We are glad that you had a comfortable stay. We do value you business and hoping to see you again when you are in the Buena Park area.

Summary: Priceless front desk welcoming is always on point and to the fullest attention.  Thank you GC, Rebecca, Fantasia and the maids for your great service and endless smiles. The beds are comfy, towels and toiletry stocked, fridge, coffee, its a good night sleep. Happy New Year!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and the five-star review.  We are glad that our Front Desk staff accorded you an exceptional service  and we will surely share your kind complements with them. We do value your business and we can't wait to be hosting  you again.   Happy New Year as well !

Summary Heading: Great location to many of the Buena Park attractions
Summary: I stood at this hotel 11 years ago due to the close proximity of all the Buena Park attractions. The hotel seems a little run down since then. Only a few negatives, the bathroom door was a sliding door, there was no way to lock it. When you have kids with you, that would be a preference. No microwave, coffee maker or refrigerator in the room. There was only 1 microwave in the check in lobby, and the lobby closes at 9:00 pm (opens a 6:00 am). I didn't see a pool, but wasn't looking for one either. The bed was comfortable and the heater was great on the cold night. If you are looking for a no frills, place to lay your head and sleep the night, this place is a good choice. There are a few fast food restaurants a stones throw away.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and the detailed review.  We are thrilled to know that you took advantage of our proximity to Buena Park's major attractions.   We just want you to know that mini fridge and coffee makers are available on 2 queen deluxe rooms and we do have a pool.  Thank you for your recommendation as well and hoping to see you again.

Summary: Stayed here one night after flying from the UK before driving to Phoenix the next day, we just needed a cheap place to stay as we literally were just sleeping at the hotel, but the hotel turned out to be modern and clean with friendly staff. The room were decorated nicely and was perfect for us, we were on the ground floor and parked right outside our door.  There are a couple of eating places close by, but they were closing as we did not arrive until late, but we did find a Wendy's close by Beds were comfortable and I slept well if only for a short time, jet lag woke us up really early, so we pottered around and checked out quite early I would stay in this motel again if I was in the area
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and the wonderful and detailed review. We are glad that you had a comfortable stay and we can't wait to be hosting you again.

Summary: Location of this hotel is close to the parks and to food/gas stations. The lady that checked us in was super nice and friendly. My only complaint regarding our stay was the water pressure in our room.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and the five-star review. We are glad that you took advantage of our proximity to theme parks and restaurants.  We do value your feedback and will be relayed to the department concerned.  Thanks again and looking forward to be hosting you again.

Summary: I have traveled for twenty years, and staying at the Good Nite Inn Buena Park has been my favorite. Thanks to G.C. Rebecca, and Fantasia what an amazing staff, the friendliest ever! I would definitely recommend this hotel!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us.  We are glad that you had a pleasant stay and our Front Desk staff was able to provide you an exceptional service.    Thank you as well for your recommendation and we can't wait to be hosting you again.

Summary: The front desk staff is always so nice and friendly whenever we're checking in or out. GC is usually the one who helps us at the front counter, and she is always so welcoming every time we've stayed there. I also love the coffee/tea bar they have out in the mornings.  :)
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and the five star review.  We are thrilled to know that GC accorded you an excellent service and we will surely share your nice complements with her.  We do value your business and and we can't wait to welcome you back.

Summary: Hotel is worth more than a penny - surprising clean, safe and centrally located. The staff at the front desk was very friendly - I dont remember everybodys names except Rebecca.  The only issue I had was the walls and doors of the rooms are very thin and there was a fair bit of outside disturbance with even the people talking softly in the corridors easily audible. I requested them to move my room and they gladly acknowledged. I wanted to give 4.5* but there's no option for the half point, so its a 4* for me.  Thanks. Will be back.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to give us a detailed and wonderful review.  We are happy that you found us strategically located and our staff provided you an excellent service, most especially Rebecca.  We will share your nice words with the staff and we can't wait to be hosting you again.

Summary: As always, our stay was excellent. Extending our stay for an extra day was easy and quick. the staff was great, coffee in the morning was excellent and the room was as comfortable as ever. A nice quiet stay for the whole family.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and the detailed review.  We are thrilled to know that you had an excellent stay and we can't wait to be hosting your family again.

Summary: It‚Äôs a really nice hotel, and easy access from the highway. Staff are super nice. I met Rebecca when I was checking out. She recommended attractions and restaurants around the property. I definitely will stay there again!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and the five- star review. We are glad that Rebecca was able to give you some recommendations on places to go and we will surely share your nice words with her.  Thank you as well for your intention to come back.

Summary: Quiet and pleasant nice room and hit water. We had a blast and we were close to food all around. The hotel room was clean smelled good nice bedding and great staff. They honor military vets there as well.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and for the five-star review.  We are thrilled to know that you had an excellent stay. It was a pleasure having a guest who served our country  and  we look forward to be hosting you again.

Summary: Best bang for your buck close to everything Knott‚Äôs good food target and Walmart just in case you forget some thing staff is nice and go the extra mile it‚Äôs very clean and quiet property no riff raft hanging around

We are glad that you took advantage of our proximity to Knotts Berry Farm and the Target department store and at the same time appreciate the services that our staff accorded you.  We do value your feedback and we can't wait to welcome you back.

Summary Heading: Perfect for the type of trip
Summary: Our goal was only to have the room for sleeping and showering. We spent all day at Disneyland and needed a clean place to crash. The room is made for such stays. There are no extra ammeneties in the room that would make it too comfortable for those who spend all day in their hotel room. There is no coffee maker, fridge, microwave or huge fluffy towels. They apparently keep the costs very reasonable by not focusing on this type of hotel stay. That works great for us. So if you are bringing your whole family into the area for Knott‚Äôs or Disneyland, this place is perfect. The staff is friendly, service is quick, price is right, room was a little dated but clean, and coffee was available in the lobby. I will say, the great rates make this place very busy, so it was hard to find a
Manager Response: Thank you very much for giving us a very detailed and wonderful review. We are thrilled to know that you had an enjoyable experience and we can't wait to be hosting you again.

Summary: Stayed eight nights and couldn‚Äôt be happier. The front desk staff were very nice and helpful. The cleaning staff work hard and it shows as our room was spotless. Drove down from Canada and arrived one day early and had no problem getting in a day early. Good restaurants close by.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us.  We are glad that everything works well with you during your stay  We do value your business and we can't wait to be hosting you again.

Summary: We spent 6 nights at Good Nite, we found all the staff lovely, cheerful and helpful.  Rebecca at the front desk was very pleasant and alway ready to help when we needed her.  The rooms where clean and well supplied.  There was no breakfast supplied which is something that i would have liked to have, there is McDonalds next-door.  A laundry room always helps as well, unfortunately there is not one of these either.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. We are glad that Rebecca afforded you an exemplary  service and at the same time finding our rooms clean.  We do value your feedback and we can't wait to welcome you back.

Summary: I had a cozy stay and was super clean !  Front desk was so sweet ! Thank you again  I hope to stay again !  It‚Äôs my bday tomorrow! So maybe I get a free stay some day or discount :) G.C WAS SO SWEET!  thank you
Manager Response: Thank you very much for staying with us.  We are thrilled to know that you had a great experience. Thank you as well for your kind words about GC and we will surely share it with her. Happy Birthday to you and hoping to see you again.

Summary: We stay at the Good Night Inn because it's always comfortable and quiet.  Excellent friendly and helpful staff. Our first choice when staying in this area. Many restaurants and dining choices in the area.Just minutes to many of the amusement parks and entertainment.
Manager Response: Thank you for continuously staying with us. We are glad that you always had a comfortable stay and found us close to theme parks and restaurants.  We do value your business and we can't wait to be hosting you again.

Summary: Regarding the service that was provided for us when we were checking in, the lady was very nice and polite so it made us feel very welcome. However, our room had a broad stench of urine that would not go away even when we sprayed perfume in the vicinity of the area.
Manager Response: Please accept our sincere apologies for not providing you the complete excellent guest experience you anticipated with your stay.  Thank you for informing us of your room odor issue.  Our team strives everyday to provide all our guests the highest quality experience possible and it appears we failed with your stay.  We are pleased to hear you felt a polite and warm welcome, by our Guest Service Representative, upon your arrival.  We also always strive to offer a room change and or correct these type of issues, provided we are informed of the problem.  It is our hope you will give us another opportunity, on your next visit to our area, to provide you with the excellent accommodations you expect.  Please contact me directly if I can be of any more assistance.  David Verduzco, Operations Manager  714-523-1488

Summary Heading: Slightly Out of the Way, But More Than Makes Up for It
Summary: I stayed here during a visit to Disneyland and Knott's Berry Farm. To be honest, there are a lot of options that are closer to both, but this place made up for the distance in so many ways that it's now going to be one of my go-tos when visiting the area.First (and what most people probably note) is the price is very good. I like to spend as little on hotel as possible so I can spend more in the theme parks, and that's where this place really shines. I've stayed at a ton of places that charged more, but were far less well maintained.The location feels safe, which is always something I worry about. But I didn't notice any shady goings ons, and it almost felt like it was more residential. It was also very close to the freeway, some places to grab a quick bite to eat, and a Target
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to give us such a wonderful and detailed review.  We are thrilled to know that you had an enjoyable stay and at the same time took advantage of our proximity to major theme parks and department store We do value your feedback and we can't wait to welcome you back..

Summary: All the staff treated us with respect and helped with any questions about the area . Great place to stay for our Dineyland trip! Rebecca was very courteous and helped me get a blow dryer for our room !
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to give us a wonderful review. We are pleased that our staff afforded you an exceptional service and we will surely extend your kind complements with them most especially, .Rebecca.  We do value your feedback and we can't wait to welcome you back.

Summary: Was on holiday @goodniteinn calabasasa but because of the fire we had to evacuated and ending up in the good nite inn @buena park..thank you to Rickey who organized a room and helping us out...had a wonderful time at this hotel in a great area for family's or working in the area... close to Knott berry farm & disneyland which we never planned on going to...how wrong were we  plenty of cafe shops restaurants ECT within walking distance   Thank you Rebecca for helping us with are return fligh and all....I would recommend this hotel highly   Thank you goodnite inn for a great stay
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. We are happy that we were able to accommodate you due to the situation in one of our offices. We are also glad that you were able to explore some of the parks here in Orange County and are thrilled that you enjoyed it. We will also share your kind words with Ricky and Rebecca.  Hoping to see you again when you are in the Buena Park area.

Summary: As a frequent guest, I enjoy my stay here. It's generally quiet here, which is what I am looking for, since I come here to work and stay for the week while working. I spend five days per month here.  Clean and comfy
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to give us a wonderful review.  We would just want you to know that we do appreciate you continuously staying with us and we are always happy to be of service to you.  Thank again and see you soon.

Summary: My Boyfriend and I stay at this hotel often. It‚Äôs close to Disneyland and is very inexpensive. The rooms are always clean and the service is always great, staff is extremely friendly and welcoming. The only complaint I have is that when you ask for late check out or just regular check out there are always cleaning ladies that come by really early and knock on your door! It can get annoying if you‚Äôre still sleeping! Two times they just knocked and we didn‚Äôt answer and they just opened the door! They should give them a list of the guest who have already checked out first so they clean those rooms and then move to the other guest after 11 or 12. It‚Äôs just common sense!
Manager Response: First of all, please accept our apology for the inconvenience you had during your stay.  We have referred this matter to the department concerned for rectification.  We do value your business and hoping to see you again when you are in the Buena Park area.

Summary: When my family visits I don't think twice, I will reserve a room for them in the 3rd floor.4 of us can stay in a room with two comfortable queen beds.Only one time I asked for a change of room and they were helpful and concerned to solve the issue. Amenities are reasonable to the price paid.I will not go anywhere else.Friendly and helpful staff.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and the five-star review. We are thrilled to know that we met your expectations .  It was a pleasure having you as a guest and we look froward to hosting you again soon.

Summary: Hotel was in a great location with lots of restaurants in the vicinity.  My room was very basic 2 queen beds with 1 bath that was a bit small with sliding door.  No mini fridge, microwave, or hair dryer.   They do offer coffee in the lobby.   The best I can say about this place is that is was affordable, clean, and in good location!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. We are happy that you found us clean and strategically located. We just want to let you know that mini fridge is available on 2 Queen deluxe rooms, microwave is in the lobby and we always have a hairdryer in the room. If it wasn't available during your stay, we could have provided you one by contacting our Guest Services.Again, thank you for your feedback and hoping to see you again.

Summary: Room was great after being greeted by the big smile of Bec.  Comfy bed.  Plenty to do and see in the area.  Not far from theme parks, restaurants and shopping.  I have stayed here a few times in the past couple years.  Will always come back when in LA.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to give us such a wonderful review. We do appreciate you continuously staying with us and we can't wait to welcome you back.

Summary: We booked this Hotel for our stay in the USA. The room was clean the staff very friendly and nice. We asked for a room on the ground floor, which was no problem. However we had a room on the front side of the hotel, so a little bit nosier than a room at the back side, but we had a good night sleep, so the noise wasn't too loud. The pool was also need an d clean, so if we are going again to LA we surely will book at Goog Nite Inn.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for reviewing your stay with us. We are happy to know that you enjoyed your time with us and we hope to welcome you back very soon.

Summary: Came back for a few days, like every other visit it was awesome. Great price, clean rooms, friendly front desk and housekeepers. Ricky working the front desk is always helpful and accommodating. I highly recommend, I myself will be back again
Manager Response: Thank you for continuously staying with us. We are glad that you always had a pleasant experience and Ricky afforded you an exceptional service.  We will share your nice words with him and we can't wait to see you again.

Summary: We stayed here a total of 6 nights over a 2 week roadtrip. Wanted somewhere close enough to LAX and LA itself but without paying over the odds for top hotels as we literally needed somewhere to sleep after each day's adventures. This fitted the bill. The hotel itself was clean, the bed was comfortable, shower hot. Considering it is a 2 star motel I thought it was very good! Car park was spacious and there is a McDonald's right next to the carpark which we used for breakfast each day! Shopping malls within 15 minutes drive away. Overall I have no complaints and would recommend.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to give us such a wonderful and detailed review. Your kind compliments will be shared with our staff and hoping to see you soon whenever your travel brings back to Buena Park.

Summary: Everyone was GREAT!!! Will be staying again this weekend.. My family and I loved this hotel and staff. The Lady at the front desk was extremely welcoming and friendly. She helped in every way possible to make sure we had a great stay. The rooms were very nice,clean and comfortable and the  location was great. I will definitely recommend this hotel to everyone else who is interested in staying in the Buena Park area. Great stay worth every penny!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and for the five-star review. We are thrilled to know that we met your expectations and always looking forward to be hosting you again soon.

Summary: We stayed here for 2 days for a family gathering and this place was a perfect location.  Close to the freeway and nearby restaurants and Buena Park and Cerritos Malls, everything we need is easily accessible.  The Front Desk people are amazing and the Housekeeping really cleaned the room well.
Manager Response: Thank you for reviewing your stay with us.  We are happy that you found us easily accessible to the freeway and nearby shopping areas. We will share your feedback with our staff and hope to see you again soon.

Summary: We stayed here for 3 nights for my Mom‚Äôs funeral and the our stay was really a peaceful one.  Staff were very friendly and rooms are clean with comfortable beds. Close to Paul‚Äôs place with good zucchini.
Manager Response: We are sorry for the lost of your love ones. We are glad that that you found solace in staying with us and was welcomed warmly by our staff.  Thank you for staying with us and hoping to see you again when you are in the area.

Summary: We stayed here for a family reunion and this is the right place to stay, quiet and clean rooms Ricky was very accommodating when we inquired about the place and everything he described is just right. Will recommend to others and will come back.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us.  We are thrilled to know that you were well taken care of by Ricky.  Thank you as well for your intention to recommend us and we can't wait to be hosting you again.

Summary: Good nite In was very helpful and patient with me When I need anything at all. Everyone working here was very nice. Everything was very clean and cozy. The bed and  Easy to access WiFi, Would definitely  stay here again. Thank you.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to give us a wonderful review.We are thrilled to know that we met your expectations . It was a pleasure you having as a guest and we look forward to hosting you again.

Summary: We needed a place to stay for a couple of days while our home was being fumigated.  This hotel was perfect.  Reasonable priced. Very clean.  Comfortable bed. Excellent location.  Friendly and helpful staff.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for reviewing your stay with us. We do appreciate your detailed and wonderful review.  We are happy to know as well  that you enjoyed your time with us and we hope to welcome you back very soon.

Summary: nice comfy beds, clean rooms, never had any problems even when i left my keys in my room. staff is very friendly and understanding. Good hotel to stay at mcdonalds within walking distance and overall id recommend to anyone. Id ask for ricky in guest services

Summary: I needed to save and have stayedhere prior so I knew it was a great value. Staff very friendly and rooms very clean. Close to restraunts and theme parks. Disneyland about 15 min drive. Knotts was 5. I will stay here again!

Summary: hello couple days I was on vacation in Buena park and I stayed at this hotel Good Nite inn. Summary: This hotel is very nice place to stay very accessible to many geat places in California. The nicest part about this hotel is people in the front dest, especiall Ricky he great person and if you ever need help or need anything at all, Ricky best person to ask he is very kind and helpful.

Summary: I love staying here, very clean and comfortable rooms. The staff is very friendly and helpful. I give this hotel a five star review. I recommend this place for anyone who is looking for a comfortable stay and is very affordable and in a great location

Summary: We had an amazing stay at the Good Nite Inn, we were privileged to have amazing service from the staff and they definitely took care of us. We knew as a group that we had high expectations that were definitely met at this delightful hotel. Highly Recommended!

Summary: Love staying at the Good Night Inn Buena Park, the staff & service are always there to help & are very welcoming with a smile, this is my family & I second time staying here & love the immediate help we get when having an issue, keep up with the excellent staff & customer service.

Manager Response: none

Summary: For school groups request the third floor because it is an interior hallway. Fantasia at the front desk is incredibly helpful! Great location for heading to Disney. We will totally stay here again with future groups.

Thank you as well for your compliments about our Front desk staff, Fantasia . We will surely share your kind words with her and we can't wait to be hosting you again.

Summary: I've been staying with Good Nite Inn in Buena Park for the past months to escape for some me time. They always have good deals. Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to give us a wonderful review. We are glad that we are your choice of hotel when you are in the Buena Park area. Summary Heading: Clean, good location, good price, VERY friendly staff
Summary: This hotel is conveniently located for so many things in the area, and it‚Äôs really the best bang for your buck. It‚Äôs simple and no-frills, but it‚Äôs clean, quiet, and well maintained. And every single employee I encountered was so helpful and joyful. I have a student in a local college, and I will definitely stay here again and recommend it to others who come to town to visit him:-)
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to give us such a wonderful review. We are thrilled that you had an enjoyable stay and was impressed provided by our staff.  We do appreciate also your intention to recommend us and we can't wait to welcome you back.

Summary: Rebecca is always warming and welcoming with her smile. Every time I am a guest I am greeted with a Hello Ms.Slaughter. The room was clean. My partner and I slept well. I just wish they and an rewards program.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. We are thrilled to know that Rebecca handled you well  and we are glad that you slept well during your stay.   We will share your kind words with her and we can't wait to see you again.

Summary Heading: Great Value, Clean Rooms, Amazing Staff!
Summary: Stayed at this location while visiting the area and was very pleased. Clean and simple rooms with all the extras thrown in like blow dryers, iron and ironing board, fridge, and coffee maker which I wasn't expecting.   What really impressed me was the staff at this location. From the first night at check in to the friendly maid who was waiting to clean our room the next day, and finally the front desk staff at check out. Everyone was so welcoming and genuinely made me feel like they appreciated my business. The front desk staff, whose name was Rebecca was amazing! She was so cheerful and full of energy when I checked out and it was just what I needed to start my day. She asked how my stay was and how I would rate the hotel. She made sure I was satisfied with everything and sent
Manager Response: Thank you very much for the detailed review of our property.  We are very happy that you had an amazing stay and likewise impressed with the service that our staff most especially  Rebecca afforded you. We do value your business and we can not wait to be hosting you again.

Summary: Stayed here for a quick 2 night visit. Rooms were clean, staff was very pleasant, hotel was very accommodating. Night staff was very gracious and helped with Ice, etc.  We made another reservation for October. Very reasonable for a quick stay motel, safe location, food very very close.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. We are glad that you had a pleasant stay.  We do value your feedback and we can't wait to welcome you back.

Summary: Convenient location, right off a freeway, with some fast foods around. Plenty of parking. Check-in is relatively fast. Room is clean, bed is comfortable. Only thing is the bathroom door is a sliding door with only the top rail, so it's a bit heavy and unstable. For the money, hard to beat the value.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to give us a very detailed review.We are glad that you took advantage of our proximity to the freeway and restaurants. We do value your feedback and we can't wait to welcome you back.

Summary: 1 night stay for Disney visit. A great value!! Rooms are clean, contemporary and minimal. Good bed, tv, pool, free WiFi and free parking. If you are on a budget and don't need the frills, this is the place for under $120!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to give us a detailed review.  We are glad that you took advantage of our proximity to Disneyland.  Hoping to see you again when you are in the area.

Summary: My family and I checked in pretty late I would say around 1 am . Check in was a breeze , super fast and easy which was very nice because we were all grumpy and tired .  We got a 2nd floor room above the pool. Natalie Was awesome and super friendly !
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us.  We are thrilled that our staff, Natalie provided you a great service when you check in.  We will share your nice words with her and we can't wait to see you again.

Summary: Took my wife, baby and toddler there on the 10th of August and we stayed 2 nights. We checked in around 9 pm and the woman at the desk was so nice, she called me by ‚ÄúMr. Jason‚Äù which was nice. Gave us directions to our rooms and handed out information on the local attractions. Very welcoming and clean lobby. Our room was very clean, organized, and a decent size. The maids won‚Äôt bug you and checkout is 11 am. Great place for older kids or couples.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for reviewing your stay with us. We are thrilled that you were taken care of by our Front Desk staff and we will share your kind compliments with them..  We take pride on all we do and we are happy to have satisfied your needs.  Hoping to see you soon.

Summary: While on business I found a gem of a place to stay at!   The "good night inn" in buena park ca. hotel is clean and well keep, internet service works when it is suppose too and the staff are always going out of there way to provide great service.  Rebecca and GC on day shift always greet me by name which to me makes you feel right at home! Lets not forget Natalie on the late shift alway greets with smile day or night when Ive misplaced my key or Im checking out early due to work demands!  They just make it a joy to stay overnight!!!! Rooms are clean and affordable, pool is an excellent commodity for those hot summer days and parking is a breeze to find. It is in an ideal area in Buena Park, no more than mere minutes from food, Knott's, malls and more. No muss no fuss, no bugs (unlike other places) and overall a genuinely better experience than even most resorts. If you are looking for a good hotel at an even better price. Good Nite Inn Buena Park is hands down the place to choose.

We are pleased you enjoyed your stay, our facilities and services. We will share your comments with our entire team. Summary Heading: Ricky and Rebecca are the best! Very helpful, friendly and accomodating!

Summary: Front desk employees are very nice and  always energizing, and helpful. Those people are: Quicky/Nicky, Rebecca and there is another Asian lady who‚Äôs always nice. Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. We are thrilled that our staff provided you an exceptional service and at the same time finding our room clean. We will relay your kind words to our Front Desk staff and we can't wait to be hosting you again.

Summary: Thanks a lot to GC for doing extra mile for costumer service for my whole family!!! We stayed here  for vacation and very satisfied with our stay and our budget to this hotel is just right so we can afford. Looking forward to stay here on our next trip.
