Summary Heading: First time but not the last.
Summary: We liked the stay, and the checking in was fast and easy. Rooms were accomodating for a family and very close to theme park (Knotts Berry Farm). We will definitely consider staying here again on our next family trip.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. We are happy to know that you had a memorable experience and took advantage of our proximity to Knotts Berry Farm. We do value your feedback and we can't wait to be hosting you again.

Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and the five-star review.  We are thrilled to know that we met your expectations and GC was able to provide you an exceptional service. We look forward to hosting you again soon.

Summary: Good nite inn is very clean. Everyone is very friendly. We especially appreciate Ricky, who works at the front desk. He is very professional and very helpful. We recommend this place to everybody. We love staying here.

I keep going back because of the warm welcome I received when I arrive, the clean well-kept room that I get to stay in, and the great value. I often think about staying closer to Disneyland, Which is my destination, but I would spend twice as much for a lower value hotel. I think it's worth it to drive a couple miles to get to Disneyland and to pay for parking. I will definitely keep staying at Good Nite Inn Buena Park.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave us such a wonderful review.  We are happy to know that you always enjoy your stay with us .  We do value your feedback and we can not wait to welcome you back.

Summary: Booked two rooms one month in advance.  When you book it asks, ‚Äúwhat time will you be arriving?‚Äù I put 10, I thought the rooms would be ready since it asked. Front office clerk (Fantasia) was very un-accommodating and you could tell she didn‚Äôt want to be there. Tried to charge us $25 for checking in 15 mins before 11.  Requested 1st floor for mother with bad knees.  She stated that was ok.  When we went to get rooms, she ‚Äúran out‚Äù of rooms on the 1st floor.  The rooms smelt really bad like smoke and dirty mop water.  The tub drain did not work, the water would back up easily. Had to notify them twice to get it fixed.  TV‚Äôs are small and the signal is horrible.  Only good thing is the restaurant across the street.
Manager Response: Please accept our apology for the inconvenience you had.  We certainly try to create a 5-star experience for all our guest and it seems we fell short with you. Your feedback is of utmost value and we will use it to work more diligently going ahead.  Please consider coming again  so we can provide you with a much better stay.

Summary: This was out 2nd stay here. Great prices, clean, and very close to knottsberry farms. Nothing fancy, but all we use it for is to sleep anyways. Will be going back in a few weeks and will be staying here again

Summary: It was amazing to stay there . The front desk people are very helpful they allow me for early check in and late check out according to my flights. Really thankful to them . I suggest one thing that water dispenser and coffee should be placed in lobby for 24 hours specially water

During a busy summer rates are high in the area but we always have better rates then our competition. We hope you will come back and stay with us again in future.

Summary: We loved it and will be back next year.. Kids loves the pool and I loved the location.. The people who worked there were all super nice and helpful.. Jothing bad could be said about our stay.. It was wonderful..
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and your wonderful review of your stay.  We are happy to know that you enjoyed your time with us and we can't wait to welcome you back .

Summary: The property is as good as it gets for s discount kind of motels especially with the area being close to knots berry farm. Thumbs up to the staff. Room needs more pillows and could have a better kind of towels. Other than that I‚Äôll recommend the place anytime
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. We are glad that you like our proximity to Knotts berry farm and the services provided by our staff. Summary: so very accommodating for our big family really enjoyed our stay My trip to Disneyland was flawless just a quick 5 minutes to the park such a breeze and the hotel staff was amazing  Thank you Goodnight inn
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. We are glad that you family had an enjoyable experience with us and you took advantage of our proximity to Disneyland. We are glad as well that our staff provided you an amazing service and hoping to see you soon.

Summary: This hotel has become my go to for business or pleasure purposes. Its my home away from home.  Strategically located near two major freeway onramps. The booking is always easy. Summary: I come often and it is always consitent. Rooms are always clean and I check in quickly always. Staff is super friendly really appreciate them. Parking is readily available and there are tons of places to eat and hang out near by.

Summary: It was near Disneyland and good for the price. Rooms were fairly clean. No microwave though and not all rooms have a fridge. No free breakfast, just hot beverages in the AM But, plenty of restaurants around. Would I stay again, maybe or maybe not.

Summary: I had a nice stay at good nite inn, the room was really clean, and customer service was awesome. Fantasia was very welcoming and accommodated all of my needs. I only stayed one night but will definitely stay another if I‚Äôm ever in the area.

Summary: Fantasia and Ricky are amazing!!!!! Amazing service! They provided superb customer service and created an amazing experience for my family. They were helpful and polite. I will continue to come here and tell others.  Thank You!  -The Dickerson Family ‚ù§Ô∏è

Summary: Decided to stay two nights at the good nite inn. Have had nothing but positive experiences here in the three times I have stayed here before. Front office staff is always so fun and nice.  Thanks for the Birthday song n dance Fantasia :)
Manager Response: First off all thank you for taking the time for writing a review! Providing first class hospitality is our first priority so we thank you for your positive feedback. We are happy to know that our front office staff is always nice and Fantasia made your birthday special! We look forward to see you again!

Summary: Quiet, clean, reasonable price, great location to most of the popular beaches and attractions, friendly staff, beds were very comfortable, maid did a good job cleaning, definitely staying there again when I return on another vacation!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time to review your recent stay with us. We are so pleased to know that your stay with us was comfortable and you enjoyed our quite clean room at very reasonable price. We look forward you in welcoming you back soon!

Summary Heading: Affordable and close to Knotts Berry Farm
Summary: Close to Knotts Berry Farm and affordable. We would definitely stay again. Great no frills option! Front desk staff was friendly. Cute outdoor pool to relax outside open from 9-9. Loved the barn yard style door on the bathroom!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time on writing a review. We appreciate the kind words and hope to see you back soon! Thank you again for recommendation.

Summary Heading: Best value hotel in Buena Park
Summary: I have stayed at this hotel a numerous amount of times and will continue to choose this hotel simply because it has the best value in Buena Park. Rooms (queen, king, deluxe) rooms are clean, comfortable, and affordable. Best part is the customer service as I am always greeted with hospitality (shout out to GC and Rebecca whom have helped me on multiple occasions). Staff is willing to accommodate my requests. Most importantly, the hotel is close to Knotts and a 15 min. drive to Disneyland. Highly recommend if staying in the area!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and for the five-star review. We are thrilled to know that we met your expectations and we are also delighted to hear about the service you received from our staff, Rebecca and GC.  We will share your kind words with them and we are always looking forward to hosting you again.

Summary Heading: Great Staff, Non-smoking Property, Clean modern Rooms
Summary: I have stayed here many times because I travel extensively for my work. The rooms were modernized last year including the A/C's, windows, counters, flooring, TV's and bedding. WI-FI and parking is free with a permit issued at check-in. The front desk staff (Ricky and G.C.) are very attentive. Remember that this is a Non-smoking property  which is one of the reasons I stay here. Prices are ridiculous in California and the price at Good Nite Inn is not cheap but reasonable compared to the other places near Knott's Berry Farm.
Manager Response: Thank you for continuously staying with us and highlighting some of the key features of our property. We are thrilled that you were also impressed with the service of our Front Desk staff, Ricky and GC and your kind compliments will be shared with them.  Thanks once more and we look forward to hosting you again.

Summary: I've stayed here a few times and keep coming back. The hotel itself is clean and comfortable.  You have a couple options next door to eat. Free parking and WiFi.  Front desk have always been helpful.  Ricky is great and makes checking in/extending easy and quick. I highly recommend if you're looking for a Clean affordable place
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 star review and for continuing to choose Good Nite Inn Buena Park. We are very pleased you enjoyed each time you stayed with us. We will pass along your comments to Ricky. Thank you for the recommendation and we look forward to your next visit to Buena Park.

Summary Heading: Don‚Äôt let the ratings fool you, great staff, great customer service!
Summary: Cannot beat this for the price. I was greeted and helped by Ricky, who was very helpful and attentice to our needs. Don‚Äôt let the star rating fool you, this place is great for the price. Very clean, and very affordable. Ricky made sure our needs were taken care of.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. We are glad that you found us clean and affordable.  It is also a pleasure to read about the service you received from our staff, Ricky and we will make sure that your kind comments will be shared with him.  Thank you for your business and we look forward you as a guest again in the near future.

Summary: Big thanks to Natalie Padilla for her great customer service!!!!  Since the minute we walk in Natalie make us feel like we were home. Great place, This is the second time and it won‚Äôt be the last... We LOVE OUR STAY @ GOOD NITE INN Buena  Park :D
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. It is a pleasure to read about the service you received from our staff, Natalie and will surely share your compliments with her. Thanks once more and we look forward to see you again.

Summary: Friendly - helpful staff, nice and clean room. This will be my new spot to stay in from now on. A lot of good places to eat close by, Kott's berry farm up the street. I'm almost at my 200 characters to submit this review, made it. bye
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and for the five-star review.  We are thrilled to know that we met your expectations and you chose us as your new place to stay.  It was a pleasure having you as a guest , and we look forward to hosting you again.

Summary: Hotel in a great location.  Short drive to Angels stadium.  Close to I - 5 freeway.  Room was quiet and front desk staff were super helpful.  McDonald's and a Black Bear Diner restaurant across the street.

Summary Heading: Not bad for a few nights
Summary: Had a late check in. Took a bit longer than had hoped but still was ok. Room itself was nice. Fridge didnt work. Told front desk about fridge issue the next day and we were able to switch rooms. They were apologetic and sincere. Both nights stayed there were quiet. No noise from adjoining rooms and no riff-raff from people staying or visiting. Parking lot wasnt sketchy and no one messed with the vehicles in the lot. Would stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to give us a detailed review of your recent stay with us.  We are glad everything works out to your satisfaction.  We will be very happy to welcome you back when you are in the area.

Summary Heading: The best hotel in the area!!
Summary: We absolutely love the Good Nite Inn. They‚Äôre the best budget hotel in the area. Close to knotts and Disneyland, free parking, McDonald‚Äôs in the same parking lot, clean, no bugs at all in the 12 times we‚Äôve stayed here. Great service. We will never go anywhere else!

Summary: Best hotel you could Imagine. Stayed a week and always clean, great house keeping service, very helpful, and friendly people. Second time staying and won't be the last. Summary: Hotel was nice and clean,lady at front desk for our check in was great and helpful..CG I believe her name was.Theres 3 restaurants across the parking lot,which was great and convient for breakfast or lunch.Its about 12-15 minutes to Disneyland in a Uber($10)and about an hour Uber ride($45) to universal and Hollywood.Pool was nice water was too cold for our liking but it was nice and relaxingüòä

Summary: This Inn is amazing and always provides the friendliest care as well as amazing rooms. The Good nite Inn provides the cleanest rooms and is never short of anything. Guaranteed an awesome time. This place should be a first choice!

Summary: The roon is clean and big enough for 4 people . i‚Äôve stay 2 night with my family over the weekend and was satisfied with the room. The bed is so comfortable.  If the room does provide microwave and refrigerator would be perfect.

Also the rates are lower than the other surrounding hotels love that we get to go have breakfast at the black bear restaurant right across from hotel

Summary: Pretty simple place. Second trip with good nite inn. We plan on returning here. 10 minute drive to Disneyland. No microwave or fridge. But overall if you‚Äôre doing a quick trip and not expecting much. It‚Äôs perfect.

GC thank you for everythibg you for us.

Summary: We stayed on the 1st floor 116(I think). A lot of street noise and people hanging outside.  The photos they put on the web are of the lobby but not the actual rooms. The toilet had a horrible stain!! We couldn‚Äôt tell if just wasn‚Äôt cleaned or just old. Had a roller door for the bathroom that didn‚Äôt really close. Bed was ok. We paid $99. I guess you get what what you pay for!!! We booked through Booking.com

Summary: It was excellent stay. The staff is very friendly especially GC who helped us out when we checked in. She's accommodating and very helpful. Summary: Fantasia at the front was excellent. My plans kept changing so I had to keep extending my stay. Fantasia made this a seamless process and was a delight to work with. I will definitely  recommend this hotel to others. Keep hiring people like Fantasia.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and we are glad that our staff, Fantasia provided you an excellent service .  We will share your your great comments with her and we do appreciate your intentions of recommending us.

Summary: Really liked the room. Very big and clean. Like that the ice machine was down the hall.  Also like that it had a refrigerator. Beds were also comfy. I would definitely stay in the deluxe room again. My stay here was close to Disneyland and the price I paid was worth the stay and drive.

Summary: This place exceeded my expectations. Check in/out was very easy. Staff was great. There is a McDonalds right next door and several restaurants and shops nearby. The room had an ironing board/iron, mini fridge, coffe maker, hair dryer and plenty of clean towels.
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear that your stay with us exceeded your expectations. We at Good Nite Inn take pride on all the work we do and we are happy to have satisfied your needs.  Thank you for your detailed review and we will be very happy to welcome your back.

Summary: Third time here, luv that the grounds are well maintained as is the lobby the rooms must of had a recent make over. The room was very well lit, shower was hot and good pressure and bed was comfy. 1 of the perks of staying here is Pauls place in the parking lot, some of the best food in B.P

Summary: We have came here like 5 times already and so far no complaints we love coming here for our family trips. Great service all day/night!! We get the deluxe rooms due to having the  fridges inside. Ricky was our check in worker and did awesome work!

Summary: Check In was very easy & fast It‚Äôs gr8 place to stay with family.Quite n clean with reasonable price. Mr KP (Business Manger) very helpfully person. Close to many amenities.Highly recommendable All the best

Summary: I stayed here in Oct of ‚Äò17 with my family while visiting Knotts Scary Farm. Although our stay was just 2 days, it was pleasant. Summary: A very comfortable stay,and Rebecca was very helpful in making it a very nice stay  , I will highly recommend to anybody looking for a nice to stay at an affordable price traveling to this area. To make sure they check it out

Summary: We stay at the Good Nite Inn every time we go to Disneyland (at least 3 extended stays each year) because they have the best staff I have encountered at a motel. I have been staying there for over eight years and have always been treated extremely well.

Summary Heading: 2 star performing at a 4 star level...Awesome

Summary: I wanted to take a moment to re-review the Good Nite Inn Buena Park. I stay at this property quite regularly, once a month or every few months for a few nights. Summary: The rooms are nice, beds comfy. Location is good. Staff very friendly. Coffee available in lobby in the a.m. I would stay again.  Black bear diner across street has a nice variety of food, delicious, service was good.

Summary: I had a great time. Natalie and Rebecca had great customer service. The room were very clean. Not far from knotts berry farm and Disneyland. The staff was warm and welcoming to my family. Great place to stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing Good NIte INN Buena Park as your preferred hotel. So glad  that you had a great time and found our location accessible to local attractions. Summary: Very good value for the place where the hotel is. Clean and well organized. I will stay there again. The parking is very conveniente and rooms are quiet and  very  comfortable. There is good coffee every morning .
Manager Response: We are so glad you found our hotel convenient as well as the amenities and services. We appreciate that you enjoyed your stay with us. We look forward to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Just the right balance between price and comfort
Summary: I‚Äôm going to start the review off but saying, for the price, you CANNOT go wrong.  The beds are very clean, the toilets, walls, and shower area are also very clean. The WiFi is decent and not unusable like other hotels / motels. The neighbors are quiet and the neighborhood is quite safe. Nothing sketchy going on around the area. The downsides are quite trivial and didn‚Äôt affect my stay at all. There is no refrigerator / microwave, and the towels aren‚Äôt so abundant.   Other than that. I‚Äôd stay here again in a heartbeat. Great value, great location, clean and safe stay. I‚Äôd highly recommend it if you‚Äôre just looking for a place to hang your hat for a few fortnights.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and finding our place to be clean with a safe neighborhood and reasonably priced.  We do appreciate your feedback and we would also like to inform you that there is a microwave in the lobby and a mini fridge is available on 2 queen bed deluxe.  Again, our sincere gratitude for your comments and your recommendation.

Summary: The place was fine and simple. The room was clean enough to use. It was quiet with neighbors, and the helper was really kind and friendly. Just let you know, there is no refrigerator. There is no bathroom stuffs as shampoo or body wash, so you might want to bring your own for sure.
Manager Response: Thank you for review and finding our hotel clean and our neighborhood safe. Just a reminder that mini fridge are available on 2 queen  deluxe rooms, shampoos are provided  and extra towels can be requested at our Guest Services.  We are looking forward to see you soon and again, Thank you for staying with us.

Summary: My partner and I flew into LAX for a weekend getaway to Disneyland. We planned on getting to the hotel around midnight. I called in advance to let them know we would be late, but we would be there. The woman on the phone was so nice and accommodating! She took my information and said a late check in would be no problem, they would be there when we got there. Check in was a breeze, the room was comfortable, and we both slept really well. I would recommend this place to anyone! It isn‚Äôt a fancy, getaway hotel, but if you need a place to crash for a few nights, it‚Äôs peefect.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recommendation and detailed review. We work very hard to exceed our guests' expectations. We are so pleased you enjoyed your stay, our services and location. I will pass your kind words to our night auditor. We will definitely look forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: Where I Stay When In Buena Park
Summary: Front desk staff is awesome and very friendly , they take time to talk with me during and after check-in. My room has always been clean, fresh and roomy. Bed is great and I have a restful sleep. I've stayed there 4 times in the past 3 months and already have 2 dates for the coming month.
Manager Response: I love this! Thanks so much for staying with us 4 times in the past and for finding everything so awesome! We all try our best to ensure our guests have the most comfortable, fantastic time while they're here, and it's always nice when someone let's us know we're successful.  We look forward to see you next month.

Summary Heading: convenient location...clean rooms..rude condescending front desk
Summary: reasonable prices...the rooms were clean and the location is great just off the freeway with easy access to everything BP or Anaheim has to offer...unfortunately the front desk person they had when i checked in was one of the rudest and most condescending one i've ever run across and i have stayed at plenty of hotels due to the business i'm in..i wanted to stay for 2 nights since i have business in the area but she was so rude i decided to just stay one night since it was late when i got in and take my business elsewhere..lost me as a customer not because of your amenities (it's a nice spot ) but because of the actions of this person..
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time for writing a review about your recent stay with us. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed our clean room and great location at very reasonable price. Please accept our apologies for your experience at our hotel at the check in. This is not the type of hospitality we strive to extend to our guests and I want to profusely apologize for your experience. We will strive diligently to ensure your experience is not repeated and that we reach our goal of exceeding our guests expectations. We remain at your service and hope to have the opportunity in the future to prove that we remain committed to you, our guest, and to our dedication to excellence in service.

Summary: Extremely clean. Peaceful and safe area, Near Hwy 91 for best connection everywhere. Great for Bussiness or Vacations. Attractions and Restaurant nearby for convenience.Convenient Shopping malls 5 min.away. Personel is very dilligent and helpful which made my staying very pleasant. I would highlite an exceptional associate at the Hotel, named G.C. who went the extra mile to make ny staying even better. Highly recommended!
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind feedback. We are delighted to hear that you had enjoyable stay with us. Our cleanliness is extremely important to us and very pleased to hear that our location is convenient accessible to freeway, entertainment zone and restaurants. We take pride with our excellent customer service and we are pleased that GC has shown during your stay. We hope your travel brings you back to our hotel in your future visit and thank you for your recommendation.

Summary: Upon entering the hotel lobby you are treated like you are a friend. The staff here has gone out of their way each and every time I have stayed at this hotel. G.C. is one of the most friendliest and knowledgeable person who runs the front desk and will go out of her way to make your stay as pleasant as possible. The room's have always been clean tidy and comfortable. If you are in need of anything extra, the housekeepers will make sure that you receive anything that might be needed for your configurability. The price is way below what you would expect from a hotel of this caliber. And not to mention all the attractions that are within just a few miles from here. Oww forgot to mention that the property has an abundance of parking so you won't have to go and park elsewhere.  Thank
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time in writing a great review about the hotel and staff as well as the housekeeping. The feedback is remarkable and we are elated for giving us a high five. We are so glad you enjoyed the clean room, location, amenities and the price range. We will extend to the staff and GC for your wonderful comment. Kudos to our housekeeping for keeping our rooms always tidy and clean. We look forward on your next visit!

Summary: We live in Las Vegas and frequently travel to southern California for mini vacations. We stay at this hotel every time,  it is convenient to all the beaches and other attractions.  It is clean and affordable.  We are never disappointed
Manager Response: We are extremely pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us again and you find our location accessible to amusement parks. We take pride in our clean rooms and providing the best rate every time. We are excited to see you soon!

Summary: Great customer service upon arrival. The rep Ricky was very very helpful and nice. The rooms are clean and cozy. It's very quiet even when it's a lot of guest. I've stayed here on two different occasions with my family and I would definitely return.
Manager Response: Thank you for continuing to choose Good Nite in visiting to Buena Park. We are delighted to hear you enjoyed our clean room and had a good night rest considering the influx of guests'. We will pass your kind comments to Ricky for extending good service. We look forward on your next visit!

Summary Heading: Good Place to Stay in Buena Park!
Summary: Staff was friendly and welcoming upon arrival. Room was exactly what we needed and it was right down the street from Knott's. Free coffee in the lobby was a plus for sure! Will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind feedback. We appreciate your stay was completely a good one and enjoyed the comforts of our room. We love reading the stories of our TEAM going above and beyond to make our guests' stay special. We look forward to welcome you again!

Summary: Very friendly receptionist when checking in. She made you feel welcome and ready to make your stay an enjoyable one. Good area with easy freeway access. Coffee in foyer in the mornings, clean premises with lots of parking.
Manager Response: We are so pleased that you took advantage of our location near the freeway and the convenience of decent parking. We'll pass along your comments to our TEAM. We are glad you enjoyed our clean room as well as the entire property. Thank you for the feedback.

Summary: Room was nice and cozy but no refrigerator or microwave like I was quoted online.  Good for the price but others similar have a continental breakfast.  It is nice they have an elevator for those of us that have much trouble with stairs.
Manager Response: Please accept our apologies that your recent stay did not meet your expectations. We are sharing your comments with our management TEAM. We will research the information on the website and address the issue promptly. We hope you will give us another opportunity to better serve you.

Summary: The woman at the front table was nice and helped me with awesome service. The room was really clean. Me and my wife really loved our room. For the price it could not have been any better. We will definetly stay here next time. Thank you
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review! We will share your comments with our entire TEAM. Our goal is to provide excellent service for our guests to ensure awesome stay. We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: A large group of friends stayed here for a basketball tour from Australia. Rooms were a good size and bed was very comfortable but definitely needed a fridge. Ice machine helped a lot. Front desk help was awesome. Alway will to help and extremely approachable.
Manager Response: We truly appreciate your detailed review regarding your stay. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay, our service and amenities. We will pass along your comments to our TEAM. For future reservation, we suggest to have the room on DELUXE and surely you will have a fridge.

Summary: Very clean and simple room.  Quiet and well cared for property.  I would stay there again.  Low cost but good quality.  No frills but you aren't paying for extras.  Excellent location near enough to local tourist sites.
Manager Response: We are so glad you found our hotel convenient as well as the amenities and services.  We appreciate that you enjoyed your stay with us. We look forward to see you again soon!

Summary: Everything was good, but the that I got it doesn't has coffeemaker which is important for me. Excellent motel especially the staf, and for who is looking for Disneyland. Also, Long Beachis not far a way of this motel.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to review our property. I am happy to hear that your stay was great and glad you enjoyed our location close to Disneyland and near by beaches. We hope to welcome you back soon and on your next visit.

Summary Heading: Good location but not worth it
Summary: We stayed at this hotel mainly for the location. Our bed had not been properly cleaned.  It had human hair all over the sheet and the cover was dirty.   I called reception to let them know but they never changed them. The second night when we got to the hotel pass midnight, the sheets were still the same from the night before even after calling them to request clean bed sheets.   Very disappointing.
Manager Response: We apologize that the level of cleanliness was not acceptable during your stay with us. We strive to provide each of our guests with an exceptional experience and regret that your stay was not up to our standards. I will let our housekeeping  department know about the issues you mentioned to perfect those areas.  We hope you will stay with us again and let us show you how great our service can be.

Summary: Was great for our 2 night stay wih my kids. Close to knotts and has the best restaurant right in the parking lot cheap too ! My family of 4 had a wonderful stay. If I had to think of a negative it‚Äôd be the water pressure wasn‚Äôt so great and the second night it was a little noisy up n down the halls but hey ! Everyone was on xmas vaca! And having fun and so were we!!! Tehe merry Christmas!!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking time to review our property. We are so happy to learn your stay went well and it is also very kind of you to detail your stay so we can fix the issue and improve our services. We hope to welcome you back soon! Merry Christmas!

Summary: Clean, quite and friendly. I would have rated higher if there had been a fridge in the room. I would stay here again even without the fridge. The price was well worth it. Also, it was located close to where we needed to be.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing Good NIte INN Buena Park as your preferred hotel. So glad you found our location accessible, room clean and quiet during your recent stay. We will certainly pass along your comments to our Front Desk Staff. For future stay have the Deluxe room and you will have a fridge in the room. See you again!

Summary: Awesome stay, nice location, rooms were clean, beds were comfortable, pillow should have been better, will recommend this to friends. Very good for those who will be visiting Disney & Knott's Berry farm. Will stay here again. Kirit was good and helping.
Manager Response: We are so pleased you enjoyed your stay, we take pride in our clean rooms (kudos to our Operations Mgr and the housekeeping TEAM), amenities and the accessibility of our location. We will definitely look forward to see you again in your future visit to Buena Park. I am honored for your kind words, it's my pleasure to provide good service.

Summary: Great experience. Was pleasantly suprised and very happy with the price.  Facilities were nice and clean. Employees were friendly and extremely helpful.  Would recommend for Disney as long as you have a car to park at the parks.  Worth the savings totally!
Manager Response: We truly appreciate the feedback and thank you for your recommendation. We are glad you enjoyed your stay. Our goal is to provide excellent service and amenities for our valued guests to ensure an Amazing Stay. Will extend your kind words to our TEAM.

Summary: Perfect place to stay with all the basics in place. Nice and accessible, CLEAN and very reasonably priced! Props to GC for being very accommodating and on top of everything. Paul's Diner was my staple breakfast place. Target is 0.6 miles away in case you want to get some supplies. The vendo in the Inn is ridiculous though with water at $2.50 -- that's more expensive than the sodas at $2.
Manager Response: We truly appreciate your detailed review. So glad you found our location convenient, clean room and affordable price. We will share your kind words to GC. We thank you for your comments on our vending concessionaire and will address your concern.

Summary: Hello I recently stayed there on 12/14/17, when I woke up I was extremely itchy and it ruined my planned trip to Disneyland, when I went to the local Emergency room they informed me that I had been bit by bed bugs and was having an allergic reaction to the bites, I sit here with swollen hands and feet writing this. Rm 320 I'm very disappointed, this was my 2nd time staying at this Inn and was please the 1st time but now I'm really upset. I hope you guys fix that problem, wouldn't wish this on anyone.
Manager Response: Please accept our sincere apologies and regrets about the situation you expressed in regards to insect bites on your recent visit. We are sorry this incident disrupted your Disneyland Trip plans. We hope you are feeling better as you read our response. In regards to the room, we take these issues very seriously, we have placed this room out of order and have contacted a Professional Service who will exterminate any evidence of Bed Bugs. Please feel free to contact me at this number #714.523.1488 if there is anything more I can assist you with.

Summary: Room was clean and bed was comfortable. The hotel was close to Disneyland. That‚Äôs why I try to book here. Freeway is easy to get off and on. Hotel is also close to restaurants and shopping. I would recommend this hotel to any one wanting to stay in the area. Front desk was also great
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback and thank you for the recommendation. We are pleased you enjoyed our location, amenities and we take pride on our clean rooms. We will share you comments to our TEAM. We hope to see you again in your next visit.

Summary: One of the best hotels to stay. Clean rooms, clean lobby, nice area and no bugs. Great Staff (especially the young lady name Rebecca she was very helpful and always has a smile that makes you feel very welcomed.)
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time to share your experience about your stay. We will share your comments to Rebecca and the rest of the Staff. Our cleanliness is extremely important to us and we are very pleased you enjoyed our facilities. We hope to see you again in your future reservation.

Summary: I think that the Good Nite Inn is a fine motel; it's in a central location and has many good features, such as a great selection of TV channels and a lovely looking pool. As a person with mobility issues, I truly appreciated the walk-in shower. And the friendly receptionists, GC and Rebecca, were most helpful in providing me with printed instructions to reach the many places I needed to go.I would certainly stay there on a future visit to southern California.
Manager Response: Thank you for your great review. We do appreciate your feedback for finding our hotel as an ideal place for your needs. We will pass along your comments to Rebecca and GC and hoping to see you soon on your next stay with us.

Summary: Upon arrival I was greeted by G.C. at the front desk. Within minutes I checked in, had my room keys and was in my room. Quick and effortless. The motel has been recently renovated and is clean and fresh, even the A/Cs. The front desk, maids and maintenance staff were all pleasant and attentive. This will be my motel of choice when in the Knotts Berry Farm area.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing Good Nite Inn Buena Park .  We are so pleased you enjoyed your stay, our services and location. We will pass along your comments to GC. We will definitely look forward to your next visit.

Summary: This is our second time staying at the Good Nite Inn. Our stay both times were great. Rooms are clean, quiet and roomy. Beds are a bit hard but overall our stay was awesome. Staff is super nice and very accomodating. Great affordable gem!
Manager Response: Thank you for your detailed review and suggestions. So glad you found our location convenient, as well as our amenities and services. We hope to see you again on a future visit to the Orange County area

Summary: Great place to stay. Staff is friendly, great place to eat breakfast across the parking lot. Very close to Knott's Berry Farm and Disneyland. I would recommend for family trips and quick overnight stays.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and for finding us a great place to stay. We do appreciate you recommending us to your family for their next trip in the area.

Summary: Not bad for the price.  The bathroom fixtures were very old.  We would've preferred something cleaner.  The staff were nice.  The parking was good.  It had a pool which was nice but we didn't use.  Overall I would spend a little more money next time.
Manager Response: Please accept our apologies that your recent stay did not meet expectations. We are sharing your comments with our management team and hope you'll give us another chance to change your perception

Summary: I enjoy staying here. The staff has always been really nice. The rooms are clean and comfortable. The price is affordable. MY family has stayed here multiple times when going to Disneyland. It's a short drive to the parks.
Manager Response: Thank you for your great review. We are happy you enjoyed your stay here at the hotel. I will share feedback with the staff and look forward to welcoming you back again in the future

Summary: If you‚Äôre looking for something just to rest your head at night then this is the place. Reasonably price, very clean, and friendly staff. Definitely will be coming back whenever we‚Äôre in the Orange County area.
Manager Response: Thank you for recommending our hotel. We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. We are looking forward to welcoming you back again in your future stay.

Summary: We have stayed here for years.  They know us and always welcome us back.  It is like a home away from home.  Clean....cheerful staff.....great location if you are going to Knott's or Disneyland.  The best!
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind response. We are happy you enjoyed your stay here at the hotel. I will share feedback with the team and look forward to welcoming you back again in the future.

Summary Heading: Stay here when in Buena Park!!! Courteous staff, reasonable rates, clean, safe, conveniently located
Summary: I have stayed here on numerous occasions. I've stayed in their room on the second floor without a refrigerator and their deluxe room on the third floor with the refrigerator. Rooms on third floor are more enclosed/hallway hotel style while the first and second floor rooms have doors that open to the outside. Both types of rooms are nicely decorated and clean. Hotel staff are courteous, helpful, and make you feel welcomed. KP gave me a great rate for staying several days both times I checked in. Right next door to Paul's Place and across the street from Black Bear Diner (similar to but much better than Cracker Barrel). Plenty of free parking on both sides of the hotel. Conveniently located near 91 freeway, Knott's Berry Farm, stores, restaurants, civilization in general. I have
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time in writing a great review about the hotel and the staff. We take pride on all the work we do and we are happy that we have satisfied your needs by staying here with us. I will make sure our staff is told all the wonderful comments. We look forward on your next visit!

Summary Heading: Very clean and conveniently near food
Summary: Liked it a lot. Will return again when in the neighborhood. booked the room from Australia with no expectations. Very pleasantly surprised. Thank you for a good experience. Clean and check in was very friendly.
Manager Response: Thank you for recommending our hotel. We are pleased you enjoyed your stay and look forward to your next visit to USA.

Summary: anytime I do go to California stay in Good Nite Inn Buena Park, place has very good staff and helpful, the place very clean and comfortable to spend day or week there, I am pleased with service and manager David, front desk Rebecca and other staff in property.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind response. We are happy you enjoyed your stay here at the hotel. I will share feedback with David, Rebecca and the rest of the  team and look forward to welcoming you back again in the future.

Summary: We've stayed here several times and love this place! Everybody is friendly and professional. We feel like family when we check in. The coffee is good, Rebecca at the front counter is amazing, the night crew are very helpful as well.
Manager Response: Thank you! We loved reading your review. We truly appreciate your feedback and thank you for continuing to choose Good Nite Inn. We hope to see you on a future visit to the Orange County area.

Summary: The hotel was very clean. Check in was fast, easy and friendly. The room was in excellent condition. I will definitely stay there again! I extended a 3 rd night! The ease of extending was excellent and easy!
Manager Response: Thank you for your post and for your recommendation. We truly appreciate the feedback. Enjoy the rest of your stay!

Summary: The rooms are nice and clean and most importantly the staff like Ricky and Natalie are very nice and helpful, also in which is a great distances from attractions. The rooms are great for the prices and is close to many places.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind feedback. We will share your comments with our team. So glad you enjoyed all of our amenities, services and our location near all there is to do in the Orange County/LA area.

Summary Heading: EXCELENT CUSTOMER SERVICE AT CHECK IN GO'S ALONG WAY
Summary: As mentioned before , I actually checked in late Sunday.  It didn't matter what time it was For this female host. Customer service did not stop for her.  She was extremely intuitive to my needs and from start to finish was kind and courteous.  I have to say I haven't seen customer service like this in a long time. This gift is extremely important to run a successful business.  This employee should definitely be recognized and applauded for it.
Manager Response: Thank you for the five-star review. We are glad to hear that you had an enjoyable stay with us and that our staff was able to make your experience extra special. We appreciate your feedback and hope to see you back soon.

Summary: Frustrating really - we use all the usual clever tools / hotels.com - trivago and tripadvisor and really struggled to get a decent priced hotel in this locality which did a breakfast.  We were very keen to visit Knotts Berry farm again and as we had only flown in from LHR to LAX that day , it was important to have a hotel which was in close proximity to Knotts Berry  It was clean and tidy but not up to our usual standards and clearly something must of been going on since prices were high.  Never mind , you live and learn dont you ?
Manager Response: Thank you for your post. If we understand your review, the concern is of the room rate during your stay. At certain weekend there are higher rates in the area but please let you know that we offer the best rate in the area. One will find discounted rate on our www.goodnite.com web site at all the time. We hope to see you again.

Summary Heading: Great value! Ricky makes all of our stays wonderful!
Summary: We love staying here. Easy access to shopping, food, and Disney. The rooms are clean, the complex is safe, and the staff is very helpful. Ricky always goes above and beyond to ensure we have a fantastic stay.
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay with us! We take pride with providing excellent customer service and we are very pleased that Ricky has shown during your stay. We are located in such a wonderful spot and we are thrilled to hear you took advantage of what we have to offer. Thank you for sharing your experience and we look forward to your next visit!

Summary: it was a really good place in a good neighborhood, just a 12 min drive to disney, rooms were clean, the only issue is that these are a bit small, nearby is a bakery named portos, please go there, it was a really pleasant place
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience about your stay. We are delighted to hear that you were able to visit Disneyland and Porto's Bakery in Buena Park. Our cleanliness is extremely important to us and we are very pleased to hear you enjoyed our facilities.Thank you so much for staying with us and we hope your travels brings you back to our Hotel soon.

Summary: Overall it was a good room. It's a very noisy hotel though, you can hear when someone is in the bathroom or walking above you. The elevator is ungodly slow and every time the AC kicked on there was a musty smell. But even with that, the bed was comfy and it was an easy drive to theme parks.
Manager Response: Thank you for your very detailed review about your stay. We do appreciate the feedback as it allows us to visualize what we are doing well, and areas we can improve.  We are so pleased you enjoyed your stay, our services and location. I will let our maintenance department know about the issues you mentioned to perfect those areas. We hope to see you again in future!

Summary Heading: It"s affordable,easy access on the freeway,restaurant and stores.
Summary: I have stayed this hotel mostly once a week. I feel like I"m home. when i check inn  fast and easy. The front receptionist G.C is very nice and do her job efficiently.The room is clean and its quiet.I will recommend Goodnight Inn to my friends and families. Its clean fast quiet and affordable... to all staff thank you very much...  Sincerely,  Jenie Gonzales
Manager Response: Thank you for continuing to choose Good Inn when visiting the Buena Park! We are so pleased that you take advantage of our location near the freeway, restaurant and stores. We also glad that you enjoyed our quite and clean room. We'll pass along your kudos and comments to GC. We appreciate your recommendation!

Summary: We have been staying at the Good Nite Inn since 2014. The staff is great! GC and Ricky are always accommodating even allowing us to check in early. The Good Nite Inn recently renovated and is very nice. The rooms are reasonably spacious and clean. If your looking for a five star hotel, keep looking. But if your looking for for clean and comfortable at a fair price, you‚Äôve come to the right place.
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 star review and for continuing to choose Good Nite Inn Buena Park. We will pass along your comments to GC and Ricky. We are glad to hear that you liked our newly renovated rooms at reasonable price. We do look forward to your next visit.

Summary: Rooms clean and clean bed. Friendly fast check in. Nothing fancy or over the top. Location is great with the parking lot connected to a McDonald‚Äôs. Night was nice and quiet. Does the job for a night or 2.
Manager Response: Thank you for your detailed review and suggestions. So glad you found our location convenient, as well as our amenities and services. We hope to see you again on a future visit to the Orange County area.

Summary Heading: Overall great place for the price
Summary: We stay here every time we go to Disneyland. Staff is friendly, rooms are clean. So very happy they improved those terrible bathroom doors! My only complaint this trip was that the bed was hard as a rock. I've had rooms with much better beds at this hotel, and this room definitely needs new beds. Other than that, you can't beat it for the price.
Manager Response: Thank you for your very detailed review. We are glad that you enjoyed our clean room and liked our renovated rooms. We appreciate your comments as they help us to know what we are doing right... and what areas we can work on to continue improving our services to best meet the needs of our guests.

Summary: Everything was great and Rebecca at reception made me feel right at home.  A welcoming smile.  Room was clean.  No complaints.  Will be back when I return to LA.  Lots in the area to see and do and Disneyland not too far away.
Manager Response: We truly appreciate your detailed review and are very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us. We will share your comments with Rebecca. Thank you for the recommendation and we look forward to your next visit to Orange County, California.

Summary Heading: Really Cute Room and super nice staff!
Summary: I stayed here for just 4 days in October, and I had a really nice stay! The room was really modern and really clean. I loved the fact that you get free wifi...like truly free no per day charge! The room was really well kept and nice to be in.  There was one day that I came in and the bed was made and all but my towels and stuff weren't swapped out, and the original floor mat towel that I used that morning was still on the floor along with the towel I used still on the rack, but that wasn't a deal breaker....almost felt like I was in my own bathroom...haha! The staff was extremely nice and very helpful, and it's conveniently located. If I found another deal like I did, I'd definitely stay again!
Manager Response: We truly appreciate your detailed review and are very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us. We are so pleased you found our location convenient and amenities and services exceeded your expectations. Thank you for the recommendation and we look forward to your next visit to Orange County, California.

Summary Heading: GC OR JC HAS THE WORST CUSTOMER SERVICE
Summary: I went to this hotel on 10/25, before I drove all the way from Moreno Valley I called to see if I could pay cash. GC/JC however you say her name answered the phone and told me I could pay cash but the $25.00 deposit would have to be put on a credit card or debit card. I drive all the way there to see a sign that says they DO NOT take prepaid debit cards! I told GC or JC that I had a prepaid debit card. She began to tell me she told me that over the phone! GC/JC NO YOU DIDNT if YOU did why would I have wasted my time and gas to come from Moreno Valley?!! You have to be smarter than a 5th grader GC/JC! She told me you can call someone to pay it for you. I said do they have to come down here she said yes! That's how I know you provided me inaccurate  information about the debit
Manager Response: Though we pride ourselves on our high standards of service and our team who truly care about our guests' experience.... we apologize that your experience was less than expected.  Our staff is well trained and very service oriented. We  truly understand how frustrating it can be when specifics of credit card requirements are not fully explained. We will do our very best to ensure the policies are clear and that they are communicated with guests prior to arrival, as well as upon check in -- in a clear, friendly manner.

Summary: Close to Knots Berry Farm and Disneyland, great restaurants around. Room is clean and comfortable. Front desk is very helpful GC help us on our guided tour. Would have been nice to have a microwave in the room.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing Good Nite Inn Buena Park for your recent visit to Disneyland. We are so pleased you enjoyed your stay, our services and location. We will pass along your comments to GC. We will definitely look forward to your next visit.

Summary: Stayed here for 3 days and 2 nights in a king bed. Room was nice, only downside was no fridge or microwave, but no biggie because they had a microwave and ice in the main lobby..... I checked in with Ricky at 10pm on a Friday night he was very busy was the only one working, he was very kind, courteous, and very busy, (3 lines kept ringing) but he didn't show his stress at all..the lady that check us out was GC she was so nice and was asking me how the stay was.it was great.. friendly staff and I definitely recommend them. Thanks for everything!!!! Will stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind feedback. We will share your comments with our team. We love reading the stories of our team going above and beyond to make our guests' stays special. Thank you for your recommendation and we will definitely look forward to welcome you again!

Summary: Have stayed here thru the years and love the re-model.  It is nice to walk in and be recognized by the staff. And the staff have always been beyond great.  They seem to enjoy their job and care about your comfort.
Manager Response: Thank you for continuing to choose Good Nite Inn Buena Park! We will share your comments with our team. We love reading the stories of our team going above and beyond to make our guests' stays special. Thank you for the feedback and recommendation!

Summary: Regardless of the locative maintenance, the service was optimal, I could suggest an improvement in the ventilation system, you will smell moisture in the room environment. Thank You for your service..
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback, both positive and constructive.  We will share your comments with our team.

Summary Heading: The Most Negative Review I Have Given in 71 Years
Summary: This motel has a 3.6 of 5.0 rating on Expedia, and while I could have chosen many hotels at lower prices, we chose this one because of the higher ratings, even though we were going to pay $30 to $40 more for rooms that appeared comparable.  First of all, the staff was courteous and professional.  Other than that, the rest of the stay was a disaster.  The air conditioner was so loud that it would have been impossible other than for a deaf person to sleep through the noise.  So we "slept" in sweltering heat.  When I brought it to the attention of management in the morning, I was offered a "handicapped" room, a room that had the same problem, and was located on the second floor approximately equidistant between two sets of stairs.  Why is a handicapped room located there?
Manager Response: Please accept our apologies that you experienced difficulties during your recent stay. Be assured they are not typical, but we are researching your concerns so that they may be addressed. Thank you for sharing and giving us the opportunity to resolve. We hope you'll give us another chance to change your perception.

Summary: Everything was amazing! The room was comfortable and we felt like home. Especially for Rebecca, who welcomed us like we were family and was always helping us, being kind and smiling. Kirk and florencio were extremely kind and helpful too. People from housekeeping also did their best. My mom is still dreaming about The cream from farmers brothers they offered in The morning. Hope we visit you again. ASAP!! Thanks for everything.
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 star review Patricia! We will certainly pass along your comments to Rebecca and Florencio. We appreciate you letting us know what made your trip so special. Thank you for the recommendation and we look forward to your next visit to USA.

Summary Heading: Very Good Price for Buena Park
Summary: If you are looking for a clean, comfortable room in Buena Park at an affordable price, look no further than Good Nite Inn. There are no frills (e.g., no breakfast--just coffee and tea), but we saved enough money on the room to afford a full breakfast at the restaurant on the corner and still paid less than comparable hotels that provide a measly breakfast. I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recommendation and detailed review. So glad you found our location convenient, as well as our amenities, clean room and services at very affordable price. We hope to see you again on a future visit to the Orange County area.

Summary: Front desk people are very nice and accommodating specially to RICKY that helps me check in... also the area is located in close by restaurants and also its convinient area specially when u dont have a car ... over all experience is good and i will recommend this place with my family and friends .
Manager Response: Thank you for your recommendation and kudos. We will share with Ricky about your kind words. We are so pleased you enjoyed your stay, our services and location. We will definitely look forward to your next visit.

Summary: To start off, I have been coming for multiple times already with the past week or 2; all due to the way that I had been treated since my very first and initial stay here. THANK YOU RICKY & ALICIA! They both made my stay very welcome and both went above and beyond to exceed my needs and requests, whether it be an "late check-out" or an quick bathroom cleaning with extra towels along with clean replacements!
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We will share your comments with Ricky and Alicia. We love hearing how our team keeps our guests coming back again and again. We truly appreciate your recommendation and look forward to seeing you again!

Summary: I was driving through Orange and stopped here with my wife for the night. The bed was comfortable. It was best priced hotel with at least decent rating. I was pleasantly surprised that it was clean and seemed close to a high-end hotel. I will definitely stay here again and any chain of Good Nite Inn. I haven't heard too much about this chain before, but this experience left me happy.
Manager Response: Thank you! We are so pleased you found our location convenient and amenities and services exceeded your expectations. We know you have a choice in hotels when you visit the Orange County area and we truly appreciate you choosing Good Nite Inn Buena Park. Thank you again for the recommendation and stop by at any Good Nite Inn!

Summary: Simple yet functional rooms. Good central location with easy freeway access and decent parking. If you have the opportunity to upgrade the the 3rd floor, take it as those are the only rooms with microwave and fridge.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback and for choosing Good Nite Inn Buena Park. We are pleased you found our location convenient from the freeway and liked our decent parking. We hope to see you again.

Summary: This place is not luxurious by any means but it's a clean, inexpensive, well-located place that's about 45 min to Santa Monica, San Pedro, Long Beach, Universal Studios, West Hollywood, and a lot of the other big attractions. It's literally a minute or so away from Knotts Berry Farm and really close to Disneyland as well. There's a lot of great food options and even great auto shops available should anything happen to your car (my husband and I had to get an oil change while out there and it was great.)   We're never at the hotel much so we don't care about room service or other things available so it's a great place to rest a little between adventures.
Manager Response: Thank you for your detailed review and suggestions. So glad you found our location convenient, as well as our amenities and services. We hope to see you again on a future visit to the Orange County area.

Summary Heading: A great hotel and the best service!
Summary: The hotel was the best we could find, with high quality, excellent location and service and very good cost-effective solution. It is located near to the attractions, walmart and other restaurants, supermarket and interest places. The rooms are renovated and quiet. The service was the best! KP, the manager, David and all their staff were very nice, proffesional and friendly with me and the group! They did everything in order to make our stay very comfortable. I definitely recommend the hotel for your stay! I hope to visit you soon
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind feedback Carolina! We will share your comments with our team. We love reading the stories of our team going above and beyond to make our guests' stays special. We are so pleased you enjoyed your stay, our services and location. We will definitely look forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: Very friendly staff, great location, comfortable stay
Summary: I was very impressed by the friendliness and helpfulness of the staff member who was working the night we checked in. Her name was G.C. and I don't say this often, but she deserves a raise! The hotel is in a fantastic location if you're going to Knott's and the room was clean. I called the office in the morning to checkout and leave the keys in the room and they asked if I needed anything else before we left. I would definitely recommend this hotel to family and friends.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recommendation and detailed review. We work very hard to exceed our guests' expectations. We will pass along your comments to GC. We hope to see you again on a future visit to the Buena Park/Anaheim area.

Summary: Room was clean. The guest service representative name "G.C" is very nice and accomodating. There's an ice machine and microwave in the lobby which is very close and accessible to the room on the first floor. We're definitely gonna come back to this hotel, next time we're visiting Orange County.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recommendation and kudos. We will share your comment with GC. Our goal is to provide excellent services and amenities for our guests to ensure an Amazing Stay. We will definitely look forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: Always a "Good Nite" at the Inn in BP!
Summary: I stay at this property regularly (sometimes once a month to every other month, or so) and have ALWAYS had a positive experience at this property. You can count on; great rates, friendly staff, clean rooms/great housekeeping, quiet nights, and a good/safe location. It's more of a budget hotel, but it doesn't get any better! Thank you to all the staff at GNI BP who work so hard to make a guests stay so pleasant!  It's close to the fun if you're in the area for visiting Disney, Knotts, and other nearby attractions. Perfect freeway access for business travelers too. Free wi-fi in room.
Manager Response: Thank YOU for continuing to choose Good Nite Inn during your visit to Buena Park. We truly appreciate your detailed review and our team is so pleased to have made your stay pleasant each time. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay, our amenities, location and services. We'll pass along your kudos to our BP team. We look forward to see you soon!

Summary: We were not happy with such a small room with a 3/4 bathroom, no refrigerator, no microwave, no hot water or coffee available all day and evening, no security ( anyone can take the elevator and break into rooms or attack someone) and counter people were just not friendly.
Manager Response: Please accept our apologies that your recent stay did not meet expectations. We are sharing your comments with our management team and hope you'll give us another chance to change your perception.

Summary: The staff are extremely friendly and amazing. My most memorable part of the trip was coming back to the room and seeing my daughters stuffed animals arranged on the bed waiting to welcome us back üòä  The manager is quick to handle any concerns or issues quickly and provide you with a solution to make your stay even better, unlike other places.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recommendation and kudos. We will share your kind words with our entire  team. Our goal is to provide excellent services and amenities for our guests to ensure an Amazing Stay. We look forward to your another great stay!

Summary Heading: One of the better budget hotels
Summary: Clean rooms. Well kept property. Friendly and helpful staff. I was pleasantly surprised. This was a really good value for the price. I expected less, but I was wrong. Short convenient drive to the attractions.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to review our property. I am happy to hear that your stay was great and you find your room accommodations clean and at great value. I will pass you kind words to our team. We hope to welcome you back soon!

Summary: I stayed for 4nights and I enjoyed my stay there. Staff at the reception ate friendly.Thanks to GC. She made booking amd tranafering room so easy. She is very efficient. Rooms are clean safe and smoke free. Very afgordable and reasonable price, location is ok too.  I will book my next stay in this hotel soon.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind feedback. We will share your comments with GC. We love reading the stories of our team going above and beyond to make our guests' stays special. We look forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: Newly remodeled rooms and nice staff
Summary: Stayed there to get away from the heat in Las Vegas and found this place clean and with pleasant staff most especially Ricky from the Front Desk. it is near Disneyland and enjoyed the food from the nearby restaurant, Paul's Place.
Manager Response: We are so glad you enjoyed your stay, our amenities and service. We'll pass along your kudos to Ricky... we agree that he's very pleasant!

Summary: Wonderful stay and enjoyed the hospitality of the staff. A couple of days in a row we weren't given soap or shampoo but we did eventually get some when we notified the staff and they made sure we had some the days to follow.
Manager Response: Thank you for the feedback. So glad you enjoyed the majority of your stay. I will pass your wonderful comment to our staff. We look forward to see you again!

Summary: Look like the deluxe room we stayed in is newly remodeled, it's nice and clean. Very basic hotel but clean and cheap. The staff is very nice and helpful, plenty of parking. Coffee, tea and microwave is down stair in the lobby. Pool is small but clean. Restaurants are right across the street. Would stay here again.
Manager Response: We truly appreciate your detailed review and are very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us. Thank you for the recommendation and we look forward to your next visit to Orange County, California.

Summary: Had to stay in SoCal for unexpected business nearby, I booked this late in the same day I checked in, front desk personnel was both inviting and helpful, especially Rebecca, who accommodated my business request.  Lobby was clean and looked updated, room was fine except for a/c is quite loud. Good value.
Manager Response: We appreciate the feedback and thank you for posting your review. We are pleased you enjoyed our location, amenities and good value. I will pass your comment to Rebecca and you  are correct, she is very inviting and helpful. We will also take care of the issue that you mention about the AC. Thank you for letting us know. We look forward to your next business trip.

Summary: Amazing like always , friendly environment, amazing staff and rooms feel homey , right next to food places , the televisions are great , quiet and peaceful. Also they wont let you down like other hotels will and AFFORDABLE!
Manager Response: Thank you for your recommendation and kudos. We will share with our entire team. Our goal is to provide excellent services and amenities for our guests to ensure an Amazing Stay. We will definitely look forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: Smelled like Ramen and no breakfast
Summary: Gross. Smelled nasty like Ramen and noodles. No breakfast. Just coffee and tea. The door to the bathroom didn't even work. Comforters were all old and 90s. The lady at the front desk was annoyed with another customer and badmouthing how they didn't understand English just Spanish. Unprofessional.
Manager Response: Please accept our apologies that you did not enjoy your recent stay. Though your experience is definitely not the norm, we take your concerns and feedback seriously. We will research your guestroom and address any issues promptly and correct it. we hope you will give us another opportunity in future to better serve you.

Summary: It was close to where we were going and diners were close as well.  Rates were reasonable. Pool was heated. Handicap parking close to room. Front desk clerk at check in was very friendly and helpful...
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We are pleased that you found our location convenient as well as our rooms at reasonable rates. I am also glad that our staff was friendly and helpful to you. However, I am not quite sure what you were disappointed about. We hope to see you again!

Summary: Very friendly staff and the room was clean... very basic renovated room. Would I stay here again?.... probably.. but I would upgrade the room if possible... the bathroom door was a sliding farm door on rollers and no fan in the bathroom
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We are happy you enjoyed your stay and our services! We look forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: True to its Name- Good NIte
Summary: Stayed there for 2 nights, good & comfortable stay. Everything was just fine. Great location, nIce rooms, Raebeca at the fornt desk was very efficient and very welcoming.  Overall pretty good value for money. Will stay again..
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback and recommendation. So glad you found our location convenient, as well as our amenities and services. We will certainly pass along your comments to Rebecca. We look forward to see you again soon!

Summary: We enjoyed our stay here, staff was very helpful, especially GC, the rooms were clean and comfortable, especially for the price.  The hotel was conveniently located, close to Knott's Berry farm, beach cities and Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to review our property. I am happy to hear that your stay was great and you find our location clean and convenient to things to do in OC. We hope to welcome you back soon!

Summary: Nice quiet clean motel. The staff was efficient and the cleaning was done well. Great location and the drive through next door is amazing. Only thing I would change is the pillows are too big and hard. Next time I will bring my own.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing Good Nite Inn Buena Park for your recent stay. We are so pleased you enjoyed your stay, our services and location. We will definitely look forward to your next visit.

Summary: This hotel was clean and the staff was friendly. It was easy accessible, and check-in was a breeze. The water was hot and the air conditioner was cold.  Cons: the room was small; the pillows were hard, the bathroom door didn't have hinges so that it opens out, but it was a sliding door & got stuck a couple of times; the towels were hard and when we called to get extra towels, we were told there was no housekeeping so we had to go to the front office to get them, which was not a problem, but when my husband went to go get them, the front office staff wouldn't let him In to get them.  Overall, it's an ok hotel...well....motel and you pay for what you get.
Manager Response: Thank you for reviewing your recent stay at Good NIte Inn- Buena Park. We are so happy to hear your stay went well and it is also very kind of you to detail your stay so we can fix the issue and improve our services. I will let our ME know to fix the door issue. Thank you letting us know!

Summary: The place is centrally located to parks, shopping centers and my relatives. The room is clean and the staff, Ricky and the lady were very helpful. Pauls' Place and McDonalds is just nearby...Will always stay here when visiting relatives.
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 star review and recommendation! We will certainly pass along your comments to Ricky and our front desk staff. We appreciate you letting us know what made your trip so special. We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Excellent service Clean and neat Black bear diner and Macdonalds very convenient. Cozy hotel  Receptionist Mar√≠a was very polite and provided us with extra pillows immediately. Room has iron table and ironing machine.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review. We are so pleased you enjoyed your stay with us and location close to restaurants. I will pass your kudos to Maria. We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: We stay there for 2 nights 1 day I didn't like the room I was in it was on the first floor but that was my choice it was a lot more noisier I will go back to the third floor you don't think what I don't understand is my prices was at $5 more so I'm going to be livid more careful when I put my reservation there again but overall it was a good stay every time we go there it's a good stay no complaints always good service
Manager Response: Thank you for continuing to choose the Good Nite Inn Buena Park. We appreciate your detailed review and recommendation. Sorry about the noise issue that you mentioned during 1st night stay. We are also glad that you enjoyed our services each time you visit us.

Summary: First of all thanks for getting me a room in such short notice. I had made a reservation in my usual hotel but it didn't have a working pool. I had never stayed at a Good Nite Inn before and it was great. As soon as we walked in Rebecca (the desk lady) was very nice , helpful and friendly. Overall the hotel was nice, clean and affordable. Next time we stay out of town we'll surely look for your hotel as our first choice. Thanks.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recommendation and kudos. We will share your comment with Rebecca. Our goal is to provide excellent services and amenities for our guests to ensure an Amazing Stay. We are glad that you enjoyed our nice clean hotel at very affordable price. We look forward to our next visit to Buena Park!

Summary Heading: Many stays at the good nite inn
Summary: We stay at the good nite inn a dozen times a year. The hotel is pleasant to stay at. It's clean and quiet. The housekeepers and custodial staff are friendly and helpful. The ladies behind the desk, specifically GC, Natalie,and Rebecca have been most helpful and pleasant. They always have a smile and a kind greeting!!! They all have gone out of their way to make sure our stay is pleasant. We have had check-ins at all hours, and never have the people at the hotel not meet our expectations. We will continue to visit this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind feedback. We will share your comments with our team. We love reading the stories of our team going above and beyond to make our guests' stays special. Thank you again for being such a loyal guest of us. We look forward to your another great stay at Good Nite Inn Buena Park.

Summary: The receptionist at the check in counter was very nice and professional. She was awesome. But the rooms were disgusting . We had to wipe down the entire bathroom ourselves before using anything . The toilet was so dirty and the shower was just as bad. It was ridiculous that we had to pay for a room that we had to clean . Never again would I stay there .
Manager Response: While I'm glad you enjoyed our excellent guest services from our Front Office Team, I‚Äôm truly sorry for the unacceptable experience with Housekeeping during your visit to our hotel. We take great pride in providing a superior experience for our guests, but it‚Äôs clear we failed to live up to our commitment during your stay.  As you may have noticed from our other reviews, your visit is unusual and certainly not up to our standards. I would like to have the opportunity to address your concerns and encourage you to contact me directly. If you would consider returning to the hotel, I assure you we will make certain that you have an exceptional experience.

Summary Heading: Budget Friendly Hotel in Buena Park close to Knotts Berry Farm
Summary: We stayed here because we wanted to go to Knott's Berry Farm and were having a hard time finding a hotel under $160 or more a night anywhere! After reading the reviews we decided to give the Good Nite Inn a try.  We booked their deluxe room (meaning inside access, secure door entry and the room includes coffee and a refrigerator).    Overall the room was very nice, clean and had everything you need for your stay.  It included soaps and shampoo in the bathroom (be sure to bring your own lotion and conditioner).  Our air conditioner unit worked well, which was good because it was hot in Buena Park the days we stayed.   We used the pool on one occasion.  It actually could use a cleaning, lots of leaves and hairs in the pool.    There is no breakfast service offered, however there
Manager Response: Thank you for the detailed review you have regarding your recent stay with us. We are extremely happy to know that you enjoyed your stay and that our spacious and clean rooms were of your liking. Yes, we are the ideal hotel for those people who would like to visit such attraction places as Knott's Berry Farm and Disneyland . Also, as you have stated, we try to offer the best possible rate to our guest, as we know that saving a dollar here and there will go a long way. We hope you were able to enjoy our free amenities such a Wi-Fi, parking and free coffee. Our staff is highly trained at providing the best customer service and we are happy to know that they are providing great customer service to all our valued guest. Thank you again for the great review and recommendation. We hope to see you next time you are visiting the Buena Park area.

Summary Heading: My new go to hotel in Buena Park
Summary: This was my first time staying at the Goodnite Inn Buena Park and it is now where we'll stay whenever we are there. Location to attractions, restaurants,  freeways and beaches is key. It's basically close to everything you'd want to do in the area.  The pool is small but a nice place to take a dip after a long day. The rooms are nice and clean and the beds comfortable.
