I definitely recommend this hotel if you're looking for a good hotel for a decent price.
Manager Response: We are extremely pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and our location! The location of this hotel is great when you want to experience amusement parks and restaurants.  Thank you so much for recommendation and staying with us, and we look forward to your next visit!

Summary Heading: EXCELENT! FRIENDLY STAFF!! GOOD COSTUMER SERVICE!
Summary: Very nice hotel! I comeby to see couple patients of mine nearby area. Rooms are clean and nice to stay in. Most importantly the staff is very accomodating and has good customer service especially "JC/GC" been here multiple times for work related. I highly reccomend this place.
Manager Response: We are so glad you enjoyed your stay, our amenities and service. We'll pass along your kudos to GC. Thank you for the recommendation and we look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Nice clean property staff was great. Attended to all are need. Good area close to our destination. Restaurant and stores within walking distance. Very helpful maid service. Quick check in and check out.
Manager Response: We appreciate the feedback and thank you for posting your review. We are pleased you enjoyed our location, amenities and especially our great services.  I will pass your kind words to entire team. We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: Very clean rooms , reasonable prices and amazing friendly staff in front desk specially C.G has excellent customer service skills and very helpful in giving tips around O.C county attractions :) Will be returning soon !
Manager Response: Thank you! We are so pleased you found our clean room at reasonable price and amenities and services exceeded your expectations. I will pass your kind words to GC.  We look forward to see you soon!

Summary: This was a convenient place to stay for one night. Near Knott's Berry Farm, Disneyland and other attractions.  Recently remodeled. Good for families and has a nice pool area. Room was clean, beds comfortable, but the downside was no microwave or refrigerator in the room.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and for choosing Good Nite Inn Buena Park for your visit to Disneyland. We are so pleased you found our amenities and our location met your needs. We look forward to your next vacation!

Summary: we stayed here last week June 23rd for a disney weekend. Room was clean and neat, shower worked well enough had plenty of hot water. the room needs a small fridge and microwave. the beds were comfortable and the A/C unit worked well. great room for the price, i would stay again
Manager Response: Thank you for your valuable and detailed review and recommendation. We appreciate the feedback - both positive and constructive, which allow us to continue to improve our services and amenities. We do have refrigerator in our deluxe rooms. We look forward to your Disney weekend!

Summary: This is one of the good hotel and I really enjoyed the stay over here. I have recommended multiple friends and relatives for this facility and will continue doing the same. The staff crew is really very helpful and a very decent property.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recommendation and feedback. We are so pleased you enjoyed your stay and appreciate kind word about our staff. We hope to see you, your friends and relatives  on a future visit to the Orange County, CA area!

Summary: I thought the hotel would be eh, knowing that I was paying a fairly cheap price. However the pool was nice, the room was redone, the bed was comfortable, tv channels were awesome. We didn't use the shower however so I can't be  judge of that.
Manager Response: Thank you! We are so pleased you found our newly renovated room, amenities and services exceeded your expectations. We know you have a choice in hotels when you visit the Orange County area and we truly appreciate you choosing Good Nite Inn Buena Park.

Summary: Good location, nice simple rooms, price was very fair ,,very helpful customer service,  lobby clean with basic coffee, microwave , fridge in rooms, mcdonalds on the other side of parking lot hidden away by trees, 2 diners also  2 min walk, pool very clean and in a nice area
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and for choosing Good Nite Inn Buena Park for your recent stay. We are so pleased you found our amenities, services, price of room and our location met your needs. We  look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: The Pros: Descent and clean room, my opinion is the price was fair, front desk was really polite, quick check-in, and plenty of parking, I got the room for 2 days, and had clean towels the entire time,, Cons: No continental breakfast, but it's a 2 min walk to nearby restraints
Manager Response: Thank you for your detailed review and suggestions. So glad you found our location convenient, as well as our amenities and services. We hope to see you again on a future visit to the Orange County area.

Summary Heading: Clean, Comfortable and Good customer service
Summary: We stayed at this hotel when we are in the area, room was clean and comfortable, a lot of restaurants nearby and close to Knott's Berry Farm. GC and Rebecca at the front desk were very nice, helpful and efficient. I will stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for continuing to stay at the Good Nite Inn each time you are in area Buena Park. We are pleased you enjoyed our clean comfortable room and location near things to do. We will certainly pass along your comments to GC and Rebecca. We do look forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: One of the Best Hotel Values in the Buena Park or Anaheim Area
Summary: I have stayed at Good Nite Inn, Buena Park dozens of times over the past few years when I am in the area for work. Since I am not reimbursed for my travel expenses, economy and value are important to me. This hotel has always been, and continues to be, one of the best values in the Anaheim-Buena Park area. In addition, over the past year the hotel has been extensively remodeled. The new lobby is clean and modern, and the rooms that I have stayed in have been considerably upgraded. Most importantly, the service team at this hotel, from the manager to the front desk to housekeeping personnel, are  all excellent. The location is right off the Knott Avenue exit of the 91 Freeway and less than 5 min. from the 5 Freeway. The hotel is is a 5 min. drive or Uber to Knotts Berry Farm, 15
Manager Response: Thank you for your detailed review and being our loyal customer for past few years. We are so pleased that you enjoyed your stay in our newly renovated rooms. We are glad that you felt you got a great value during your recent stay and that our team was able to exceed your service expectations. We are also very happy to hear that you were able to take good advantage of our location near shopping, dining and area activities including Disneyland.We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: well since i have cancer this been the best time of my life going to the park and sightseeing everything it been good.  // also at the hotel there is this girl NAME REBECCA that has treating me very good.
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 star review! We will certainly pass along your comments to Rebecca. We appreciate you letting us know what made your trip so special.

Summary: I brought about 25 students and chaperones for our annual field trip. We were going to book 8 rooms for a total of 3 nights.  The management there worked with us to make sure we got the best experience.  Since student clubs always have a limited budget, it was difficult to even find a place that we could afford.  Some of the hotels like Hotel 6 or 8, were twice the rates we paid at this pleasant Inn.  The accommodations were excellent, nothing fancy, but clean and in good condition.  Above that, the management had great personalities and were extremely helpful.  We come to Southern California every year, and from now on, the Good Nite Inn will have our business!
Manager Response: We truly appreciate your detailed review and are very pleased your student enjoyed  stay with us.  We will share with our entire management team. Our goal is to provide excellent services and amenities for our guests to ensure an Amazing Stay. Thank you for the recommendation and we look forward to your next visit to Orange County, California.

Summary: Decent Value  beds were comfy staff very friendly rooms were clean but really need to be updated and more channels added to the t.v..  pool looked very inviting . Overall it was pretty good and would recommend it. For overnite.
Manager Response: Thank you for your very detailed review. We appreciate your comments as they help us to know what we are doing right... and what areas we can work on to continue improving our services to best meet the needs of our guests.

Summary: We love this place! It's a great place to stay at with a reasonable price! The hotel is very quiet so you are able to have a good night rest. G.C from front desk is always so helpful and provides great customer service. I highly recommend this place.
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback and thank you for letting us know how GC impacted your stay. We will share your comments with her. Thank you for the recommendation.

Summary: Very nice an quiet room. Great for the price. Need way better WI FI   Soft bed good nights sleep.  Felt safe there at night. It needs a small frig    Was so peacefull Randy easy access to freeways and only about 5 minutes to Disneyland
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and for choosing Good Nite Inn Buena Park for your visit to Disneyland. We are so pleased you found our amenities and our location met your needs. We are also very pleased that you like our quite clean room at great price. We look forward to see you soon!

Summary: Though there was no fridge or microwave, we had a nice quiet stay at Good Nite Inn. I used the common area micro which was clean and efficient. We recommend this to anyone on a short stay vacation as well.
Manager Response: Thank you for the recommendation and 4-star review. We look forward to your next vacation.

Summary: Room was perfect for our family stay. Room service was friendly and came everyday. Location was ideal for where we needed to be. Reception was also polite and efficient. Wish that they had an onsite laundry.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing Good Nite Inn Buena Park for your family. We are so pleased you enjoyed your stay, our services and location. We will definitely look forward to your next visit.

Summary: You get what you pay for, but the service was very nice. The women who checked me in at 12:30am was so helpful as I was drunk and very tired. I couldn't get the room key to work (my fault not their doors) but she came and helped me.
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback and thank you for letting us know how Night person help you. We will share your comments with her. We hope to see you again!

Summary Heading: Nice People, Clean room, quiet area
Summary: We were welcomed by a gery Nice man at the Desk. He arranged a room downstairs so that my friend did not Have to climb stairs. Nothing was a problem.  The free Wifi was adequate, the tv was working. Two great diners nearby.. When I needed some boarding passes printed, they did this free of charge.   The only remark: the free morning coffee could be a bit stronger.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind feedback. We will share your comments with our team. So glad you enjoyed all of our amenities, services and our location near great diners. We  look forward to your next visit.

Summary: Like it and will return.It was great staff was very nice both late night and morning. Rooms were great. Location great.Sort of confusing arriving didn't know where front desk was located no signs. No vending machines but I believe it's in the works. No worries because there are several places to eat around there and I believe outside my window the McDonald's was 24hrs. I would definitely come back
Manager Response: Thank you for your review! We are so pleased you enjoyed not only our services and our amenities, but our convenient location near McDonald's. We look forward to see you soon!

Summary: thank you I like the way good nite inn buena park has the service I enjoy to be there yes I did ok I well come back. with my family because it a free of smoke in I like that very good. I enjoy the pool in the coffee on the lobby nice.
Manager Response: Thank you for posting your review. We will share your comments with our team. We are so pleased you enjoyed our pool and free coffee in the lobby. We hope to see you soon!

Summary Heading: Great Room at Even Greater Price
Summary: Let me first start by saying that when we travel, we are very low maintenance. One could sit here and complain about 'this' or 'that' such as "the towels were uncomfortable" but for us, complaints like that are ridiculous.   That being said, we went in with low expectations since it was such a cheap place. The place exceeded our expectations!   We got in around 10:30pm and the front lobby was closed. All transactions after the lobby was closed were done through a bank teller window which made the first impression slightly sketchy. But. Considering this is the LA area, it was understandable.   The room was clean and the beds were comfortable. There were enough towels in the bathroom for our stay (2 nights) and there were no noise complaints. Overall, it was a great find for less
Manager Response: Thank you! We are so pleased you found our location convenient and amenities and services exceeded your expectations. We truly appreciate your feedback and hope to see you on a future visit.

Summary: My husband and I stayed here before and it's gotten better. I liked the upgrades and it was cleaner this time around, but we had a room that was hard to open, but overall the staff was nice and the room was decent.
Manager Response: We truly appreciate your detailed review and are very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us. Thank you for coming back again and we look forward to your next visit to Orange County, California.

Summary Heading: Nice, quiet, clean place with friendly service
Summary: Loved the front desk woman great fast service nice clean quiet place access to food,entertainment your right next to McDonalds..Knott's is down the street the mall is close even a theater .so I would recommend here to stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recommendation and kudos. We will share with our team. Our goal is to provide excellent services and amenities for our guests to ensure an Amazing Stay. We are glad you like our clean room and convenient location to do in Orange County. We look forward to see you again!

Summary: loved everything about this place good price clean friendly staff min away from a' lot of entertainment for the family =) would definitely recommend this place to anyone with family nd on a budget nd who care for a clean neat comfy room. hopefully we can head down there again soon.
Manager Response: We truly appreciate your detailed review and are very pleased you enjoyed our services, location and clean room at reasonable price. Thank you for the recommendation and we look forward to your next visit to Orange County, California.

Summary: the room was clean everybody was kind with us there was a lift and a swimming pool everyting was perfect If I had known that "good nite inn" was so good, I would have made my reservations in this kind of hotels for all my trip
Manager Response: We truly appreciate your detailed review and are very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us. Thank you for the recommendation and we look forward to your next visit to Orange County, California.

Summary: Hotel has renovated rooms ( new carpet, painted walls), renovated lobby... Our room was daily cleaned, location is very good, morning coffee, many parking space, ice machine in the lobby, nice and helpful staff... Nice stay for this price. Recomended!
Manager Response: We are so glad you enjoyed your stay, our amenities and service. We'll pass along your kudos to our team. Thank you for recommending our hotel.

Summary: We only stayed the night, but it was perfect. The beds were so comfortable. I didn't want to get out. The staff was very friendly and helpful. Thank you for accommodating my family and I. I will definitely book again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your detailed review and recommendation. We look forward to seeing you again!

Summary: We had a really good stay. Staff was really friendly and rooms were clean. The only thing I didn't like was there is no mini fridge in the rooms. My son needs milk during the night so we had to have an ice chest in the room to keep his milk in.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We are happy you enjoyed our clean room and our services! We do have mini refrigerator in our deluxe room on the third floor. We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: The hotel was clean and pretty nice.  It was a nice place to stay.  The only downside was there is no refrigerator in the room, which is really needed.  The bed is comfortable and was overall really great.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We are happy you enjoyed your stay and our clean hotel. We do have refrigerator in our deluxe rooms. We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: Good Nite Inn Buena Park was an absolute joy to stay at. From the people at the front desk to the sweet cleaningredients staff, everyone was friendly and desired to meet our every need! I was so pleased with their work ethic and kindness that I gave them a small thank you gift and when I returned home I receieved a thank you letter with personal signatures and notes from the staff. If your ever looking for a place to stay in Buena Park, this is your hotel! Thank you all again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind feedback. We will share your comments with our team. We are pleased that you found us and we were able to make your stay comfortable. Thank you for the recommendation and we look forward to your next visit!

Summary: The rooms are great very clean and friendly manage whom upgraded for no additional fee love it! The check-in was easy quit service the lobby in excellent condition early morning coffee free soon to come continental breakfast looking forward to my next stay ur truly enjoy the amenities the pool the employees . Friendly customer service.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We are so pleased you enjoyed your upgraded deluxe room and new lobby. We are also glad to hear that you enjoyed free morning coffee and pool. Looking forward to your next visit!

Summary: i loved it!!! I love with kids we had to use key locks to get on our floor make my family and I feel really safe!! The office and housekeepers were really great and patient with a family of 5 in one room ;) parking was really easy and everything was really clean close to everything
Manager Response: Thank you! We are so pleased you found our location convenient and amenities and services exceeded your expectations. We'll look forward to seeing you again on a future visit!

Summary: I have been a long time customer at the Goodnite Inn. The upgrade of the Hotel looks wonderful. Their customer service has always been top notch. Maria, GC, Rebecca, Kp, David to name a few are always a big asset to the well maintaining of the hospitality.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We will share your comments with our entire team. We love hearing how our team keeps our guests coming back again and again!

Summary: had a great stay comfortable , quiet rooms friendly staff. the price of the rooms are just right . not to pricey . restaurants close walking distance , shopping close by ,main freeways close so you can get to where you want only about 20-30 minutes to Disneyland .Will be staying there again when in California
Manager Response: Thank you! We are so pleased you found our location convenient and amenities and services exceeded your expectations. Looking forward to your next visit!

Summary: Good Nite Inn sets the standard with affordable,clean,and hospitable service in the Buena Park area. Rooms are clean and comfortable with a modern appeal and prices are ridiculously low compared to surrounding hotels,however,the customer service is what REALLY sets them apart. Rebecca is the example of how customer service is suppose to be. From the easy check in/out, to asking something so uncommon like,"How can I play my Playstation on my T.V.?" Rebecca has always came through with what we need with a smile. Look no further, Good Nite Inn is what you've been looking for in hotel hospitality.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review and for choosing the Good Nite Inn Buena Park for your recent stay. We love hearing how our team goes above and beyond. We'll pass along your kudos to Rebecca. Thank you again for recommendation. We look forward to seeing you again!

Summary: Let me start off by saying that this hotel is fantastic! Clean and spacious rooms, staff like Ricky are extremely kind and accommodating to anything you might need. Along with the awesome promos that come along that cut the price by a lot. Overall, excellent rooms and superb service!
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind feedback. We will share your comments with Ricky. We love reading the stories of our team going above and beyond to make our guests' stays special. We look forward to see you soon!

Summary: Stayed here for a single night in December, and not only was the price right but they gave us a nice quiet room, everything in the room was first-rate and it was spotless. The location was awesome, there are multiple food options right next door and across the street. I'd definitely stay here again the next time I'm in the area, no doubt about it!
Manager Response: We truly appreciate your detailed review and are very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us. Thank you for the recommendation and we look forward to your next visit to Orange County, California.

Summary: This is a great hotel for the price close to Disneyland and Knott's Berry Farm and won't break the bank. About a 45 min drive to the beach. Rooms where great and slept our family of four with out a problem
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback on TripAdvisor! It was great to read that your stay with us was great and your family was comfortable. Please come back to visit us again soon!

Summary: Got a room on short notice, but A/C wasn't working; staff got us another room pronto. Clean rooms (freshly painted), nice amenities, great staff. Wish we had found this place earlier; will definitely come here again.
Manager Response: We thank you very much, on behalf of our team, for your kind review. Our team works very hard to ensure our guests feel welcome and comfortable and we love to hear when they've accomplished their goal! We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: Convenient location, good places to eat around , very clean and neat. One review site have it 2 star average but I was surprised when I got there it is a really nice looking place . Exceeded my expectation
Manager Response: Thank you for your recommendation and detailed review. We work very hard to exceed our guests' expectations. We hope to see you again on a future visit to the Buena Park/Anaheim area.

Summary: I enjoyed my stay at Good Nite Inn Buena Park for the getaway , the room was very clean and  Rebbeca and the rest of the Staff were very professional and made sure my stay was very relaxing and comfortable. I will highly recommend it to my friends
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 star review! We will certainly pass along your comments to Rebecca and the entire team. We appreciate you letting us know what made your trip so special.

Summary: I lived staying at the good night inn. It was quiet, the room was nice and very clean. I wish the towels are softer but overall I enjoyed my stay. I'll be returning back for my future travel. There is plenty of parking as well and the check in process was very easy. I truly enjoyed myself.
Manager Response: Thank you for your detailed review and suggestions. So glad you found our location convenient, as well as our amenities and services. We hope to see you again on a future visit to the Orange County area.

Summary: Good Nite Inn  We have stayed here twice, two nights each. A nice clean, great value hotel. Newly remodeled. Close to Knotts Berry Farm and less than 15 minutes from Disneyland. There are no pictures on any walls. The bathroom door is a "barn door" sliding style. The bed is comfortable but there is only one thin blanket. We bring an extra blanket. You might also want to bring extra towels.
Manager Response: Thank you for your valuable feedback. We are pleased you enjoyed your stay again and you like our clean room, value of the room and location close to Knotts Berry farm and Disneyland. We will certainly address your issues with our management team. We look forward to your third visit to us soon!

Summary: This was a pretty unremarkable hotel, but I mean that in the best possible way. Rooms were clean, there was WiFi, no check-in or check-out problems. Convenient to a number of restaurants. I expect that if you were going to Knott's or even Disney this would be a great location. I also expect that in warmer months the pool would be great. Not much else to say, but I'd go back.
Manager Response: I'm so glad we were able to pleasantly surprise you. Thanks so much for taking the time to praise us here on Trip Advisor. Anytime you're back in town, we'd love to have you as a guest again.

Summary Heading: Convenient location, friendly staff, reasonably priced.
Summary: Stayed here in early November for our family Disneyland trip.  We chose this location because it worked for us as it was a short drive from the park itself, short drive from a walmart (cheaper disneyland souvenirs and supplies), it was very reasonably priced, and because it looked clean in the pictures we saw.  When we arrived we noticed that they were remodeling and renovating some of their rooms so there would be noise throughout the day and also a cutoff of water services throughout the midday hours.  We weren't given notice in advance, only upon check in, which can seem a little shady but any reasonable customer can understand work has to be done at some point and because the shutoff of the water was happening in the middle of the day, most people shouldn't be affected by it
Manager Response: Thank you for your valuable and detailed review. We appreciate the feedback - both positive and constructive. We are glad to hear that our room renovation did not bother you at all. Now renovation is completed, so please do come and visit us again.

Summary: Been staying here at this hotel every year for our Disneyland vacation trips, very satisfied every time except this recent one. Went in to check into my room and the lady that was working must have been new for I have never seen her and didn't seem to listen what I was telling her, my mom and I were splitting the cost of the room, so we told the lady that my mom was paying this amount on her card and I was paying the rest in cash, so she took both our cards, charged my mom the right amount but charged my card after telling her not to cause I had cash, thankfully I had just enough to cover it, so I just shrugged it off and went to our room. Getting into our room was difficult for the door handle was sticking really bad and was hard to open, after getting in I was impressed with
Manager Response: Please accept our apologies that you experienced difficulties during your recent stay. Be assured they are not typical, but we are researching your concerns so that they may be addressed. I will let our housekeeping and maintenance department know about the issues you mentioned to perfect those areas. We have a company that comes at a weekly basis and keeps rooms upto date when it comes to bugs of any sort, rooms where inspected and no signs of  bugs where found, We hope you will give us another opportunity to better serve you in the near future.

Summary: I have stayed at this hotel many times but this was by far the worst. Our bed was broken to the point that it was leaning and our tv wasn't working either. I called the front desk to let them know and they told me to talk to a manager the next day. When I went to check out the manager was on the phone. I waited for 30 minutes before i had to leave because i was going to be late for school waiting for the manager. I was very upset with my stay and the customer service that the staff had.
Manager Response: Please accept our apologies that you did not enjoy your recent stay. Though your experience is definitely not the norm, we take your concerns and feedback seriously. We will research your guestroom and address any issues promptly. As a management, we truly appreciate guest feedback such as this, which tells us specifically where we need to focus our time and energies...

Summary: We had a great stay.  We actually got separated (we had two rooms) and even though it was really busy with spring break they found a way to put us together.  They were happy and accommodating.  McDonald's and a great burger place, Paul's Place shared the same parking lot so food was really easy and Target was really close too. We visited Disneyland, Six Flags and Laguna Beach on our trip from this hotel.  Definitely recommend them as a good value with great people.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback and recommendation. We are so pleased you found our hotel services and amenities more than met your needs. Regarding our location, many guests find us conveniently located just down the street from Knotts Berry Farm, just 6 miles from Disneyland and about 30 min drive from beach. We look forward to see you again during next vacation in Orange County.

Summary: Centrally located, close to the best restaurants, At good nite inn you feel like home !  Housekeeping every day, The staff here is like family. The best place for a family, very comfortable, I will suggest to all my friends.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Every time I visit I always stay at Good Nite Inn BP.  I feel safe and it's right next to the freeway, but you don't hear the loud noises of the freeway. The upgrades are great, the prices even better.  I'll see you again in October 2017
Manager Response: Thank you for the recommendation. It's great to hear from experienced travelers such as yourself. We are also pleased you found our location conveniently near the 91 freeway. We look forward to see you again in October 2017.

Summary: My friends and I go to Disneyland a LOT so we've run the gamut from ritzy to "oh heck naw" and this place was definitely a DO repeater. The sheets (and rest of the room) were REALLY clean --I checked and there were no weird stains or hairs and also I have a pretty awful dust allergy...my face didn't swell up overnight like it usually does at hotels, so they must have done a good job! The desk staff was also super friendly even at 2 AM and they don't scam you by charging you $25 a night for parking (for pete's sake). We weren't so sure, at first. When we pulled up late at night there were some sketchy looking dudes in the parking lot and one of them followed us upstairs (or just had a room upstairs, too, I guess). We ran into our room and the lights wouldn't turn on. It started
Manager Response: Thank you for your detailed review and suggestions. So glad you found our location convenient, as well as our amenities and services. We hope to see you again on a future visit.

Summary: I was very pleased with the room service . Bed made everyday, fresh towels everyday. Paul's Place and McDonalds right next door. Right off the 91 Fwy great location. The bed was very comfortable. I would highly recommend this motel.
Manager Response: We truly appreciate your detailed review and are very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us. Thank you for the recommendation and we look forward to your next visit to Orange County, California.

Summary: We were satisfied with services provided by a friendly front manager. Rooms were clean and large. Location was also convinient for travelers. Many nice diners were there including very popular bakery and farmer's market on Saturday morning. If wifi got better, we would come back again.
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback about your recent stay in our hotel on TripAdvisor! It was great to read that you enjoyed our services  and location close to nice diners. We look forward to see you again.

Summary: Brought the family down from Canada for vacation over spring break. We arrived to the hotel earlier than the check in time, but, When we checked in the receptionist was very friendly and helpful and checked us in right away and let us up to our room. We found the hotel conveniently located to where we wanted to go. Overall we had a great experience. The only downside for me was that there was no hot tub, but the pool was nice!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to review our property. I am happy to hear that your stay was great and you and your family find your room accommodations lovely. We hope to welcome you back soon and on your next visit.

Summary: We had an issue with my credit card but they happen to make it happen and we were able to get our room and I had a great experience at the good nite Inn . So I my next trip I will be going there and getting a room
Manager Response: Thank you for your recommendation and detailed review. We work very hard to exceed our guests' expectations. We hope to see you again on a future visit to the Buena Park.

Summary: The staff was amazing!  Check in process was quick and easy.  Room was clean and bathrooms were even cleaner.  It was close to everything we needed...knotts, Disneyland, going to Long Beach and starbucks down the street.
Manager Response: We appreciate your wonderful review on TripAdvisor! We're delighted that our staff was amazing! It was terrific to read how clean our hotel was and that you enjoyed our ideal location. look forward to see you again.

Summary: Clean and simple. Perfect for Disneyland trip. No refrigerator but there was an ice machine close by that worked great. Pool was clean. Stairway was clean. Close to theme parks, food, and shopping. Price was fair.
Manager Response: We appreciate your comments ! It was great to read that you enjoyed our location, clean pool and reasonable price. See you soon!

Summary: bed was super comfortable, lines were clean, how ever maid was not attentive, floor in front of sink was sticky, and in 3 days she never replaced the toilet paper. front desk told me I should have called them. I don't think you should have to do that when it comes to the basic needs. would have liked to had a in room coffee pot.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are happy to hear you like our clean room  and bed was nice and comfortable. We are very sorry that you were not happy with service you received from our maid. We had brought the issue you mention in our staff meeting. We hope you will give us another chance to serve you better during your next visit.

Summary: It was a very convenient location. I was travelling for business because of the Natural Products Expo West at Anaheim, Good price and good service. Closed enought to the convention center at Anaheim.  Nice.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the review. We are so happy to hear you found our location to be so convenient to Anaheim convention center and at good price. We want to thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. We are looking forward to your next visit with us!

Summary: Clean lobby and rooms, good location, good parking, good security, and good rates.  Rooms are too sterile looking - no color anywhere.  Could use some pictures or d√©cor of color in rooms and lobby.  Have to go to lobby for coffee or tea in the am.  Water was lukewarm.  Micro is in the outside hall.  No fruit, toast, bagels.  Staff is exceptional - very jolly and helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. It is so great to hear you were so impressed with lobby, clean room, good location and rates. We will also    consider your suggestion to improve our room and lobby. We look forward to see you again.

Summary: This was my first time staying here. I read many of the reviews ahead of time before booking the room and have to agree with what I read. My room was clean and freshly painted. The beds were comfortable. No frills. A simple 32" flat screen tv. No continental breakfast. I didn't need anything fancy but I wanted a good nights sleep. For the money, it was a great value. I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. Thank you as well for choosing to stay with us for the 1st time. We are so happy to know we exceeded your expectations and we are excited for your return!

Summary: It's a Nice hotel. It was very quiet. It's only about a 4 minute drive to Knots Berry Farm. Mcdonalds is in the parking lot. Not sure if it had a pool or not but we didn't check. Their is no breakfastbit they do offer coffee in the lobby. No microwave in the room.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are in a great location when visiting the Knott's berry farm. It is so great to hear you like our quiet location. See you again!

Summary: The people very friendly, check in and out easy and fast, the room was ok but had a cigarette smell, It goes at the third day of our stay, the cleaning was my concern poor cleaning, no realt good, but in general the stay very pleasant good value for the money.
Manager Response: We thank you for your candid feedback. We are glad to hear you like our friendly front desk staff and value for the room. We will share your comment with our housekeeping team so that they can make changes necessary to improve our services. We do hope that you'll give us another opportunity serve you and prove our dedication to providing excellence in services.

Summary: The hotel was remodeling the front office but didn't interfere in the service. Room was clean and close to everything. Good room at a good rate. The room had plenty of clean towels and actually smelled pretty clean.
Manager Response: We appreciate the feedback and thank you for posting your review. We are pleased you enjoyed our clean room at good rate and amenities. Hope to see you soon!

Summary: There is nothing fancy about Good Nite Inn.  the place is clean and well-maintained.  The rooms are plain, but comfortable.  For those with kids, there is a pool.  Free internet, although it is very slow.  Close to Knott's Berry Farm (a mile or so) and Disneyland (15 miles).
Manager Response: Thank you for your valuable feedback. We are pleased you enjoyed the majority of your stay. We are glad to hear you like our convenient location and pool. We look forward to see you again.

Summary: We stayed here for 3 nights and it was lovely, check in was a breeze even with their renovations going on. Room was clean and extremely comfortable and the staff were friendly. Close to everything we needed including Disneyland and shopping even a picture theatre. Black bear diner across the road was great for breakfast and there is also a McDonald's next door for my much needed cup of tea! I would definitely recommend this property.....5 stars.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for the recommendation and review.  We are so pleased you found our room clean and extremely comfortable and also our location met your needs. We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: This is an ok hotel in comparision nearby hotels.They have no refrigerator or microwave in the rooms.No breakfast offered .They gave me a room the phone didnt work ,I said ok went to the room the tv didnt work. I mean don't you check in advance.The staff is average in there customer service .The need to make Rickey the general manager he is exceptional.The business manager on duty had to social skills at all he acted liked he was doing us a favor.
Manager Response: Please accept our apologies that your recent stay did not meet your expectations in terms of level of service.  Please know that we do take your comments very seriously and they will be addressed with our entire team and Manager on duty. Guests should be treated like special guests, no matter what. We hope you will give us another opportunity to serve you better during your next visit.

Summary: Very Comfortable and Very Clean.  Have been  upgraded and  nicely New.  Prices are very reasonable. Near shopping areas, restaurants are close by.  I Enjoyed my stay and Would definitely recommend The Goodnight Inn Buena Park. Can.
Manager Response: Thank you for your very detailed review and kind recommendation. We are happy to hear you like our clean and nicely upgraded room at very reasonable price. We do hope to see you again on a future visit to the Los Angeles/Orange County area.

Summary: very clean. extra nice staff. very quiet. very comfortable. I have stayed at this chain previously in calabasas and was not disapointed and I was very satisfied here. close to everything. The staff are fantastic. They are currently updating the property. price is great too. I will definitley be back
Manager Response: We appreciate the feedback and thank you for posting your review. We are pleased you enjoyed our very clean room, extra nice staff and very quiet location. I will pass your comment to our entire team. We look forward to your next visit to us.

Summary Heading: Stay was good but the water....
Summary: We have stayed at the hotel  before and always have a wonderful time.  But this time in room 350, we had no water pressure in the shower.  The sink and toilet were fine. Just the shower.  We couldn't take a good shower.
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback and thank you for letting us know about the shower pressure issue in your room. We will share your comments with our maintenance engineer and resolved it immediately. Thank you for being loyal guest at Good Nite Inn.

Summary: We always book with Good Night Inn on our Disney trips. Great location and friendly staff! G.C. always helps us out and is always happy to help us. Great prices as well. It is a nice looking hotel after the renovations and definately the best bang for your buck hotel near Disneyland!
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind review and recommendation. We appreciate your trust and loyalty to Good NIte Inn - Buena Park. We will share your comments with GC. We love hearing how our team keeps our guests coming back again and again. Looking forward to your next visit!

Summary: I was a little concerned because I had heard that the Hotel was being remodeled and I didn't want the noise and interruptions. I was pleased that the rooms were done and the only remodeling area left was the lobby. The rooms were clean, freshly painted and the bathroom floors, door and counters had been replaced. A flat screen TV, new carpet, curtains, linens and towels were added. I prefer new clean towels. I am a non-smoker and I was delighted that the entire hotel is now smoke-free with a $250 fee if you light up. Many times when traveling with my small children I have been assigned to a non-smoking room that reeks of tobacco. The staff was pleasant and I didn't have any issues at all. Pleasantly surprised. I stayed two weeks on business.
Manager Response: Thank you for reviewing your recent stay at Good Nite Inn - Buena Park. We are so happy to hear your stay went well and it is also very kind of you to detail your stay so others reading our reviews can really get a feel for our hotel. We are thrilled to hear you were impressed with your remodeled accommodations and you are correct this is 100% smoke-free hotel. We thank you again for staying with us and we hope to see you back soon, and I will definitely let my staff know they are doing a great job.

Summary: I would have rated this a little higher because the room was nice, but didn't have a microwave nor refrigerator and the people a floor above us were loud around 1030 pm both nights we were there. Hotel is located in the perfect spot for food and freeway.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments. We're pleased you enjoyed your stay and found our location convenient. Please note that we do have  microwave's available in lobby area and refrigerator in some rooms. We are very sorry about the loud from guest above your room. We hope to see you again!

Summary: Checked in & out without any problem! Rebecca who checked me in was really nice. Even gave some tips for my next booking. Property and room were pretty clean and odor free. During the night it was pretty quiet. The beds were really comfy so were the pillows. Didnt get to try the pool since it was a bit cold but it looked like a nice area. Loved the elevator and paking spaces which you could see from the room. Very close to stores and restaurants.
Manager Response: We truly appreciate your detailed review and are very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us. So glad you found our location convenient, as well as our amenities and services. We will share your comments with Rebecca. We hope to see you on a future visit.

Summary: The website advertised free coffee and tea in the room. There wasn't any. The only microwave available was down by the front desk. Cleanliness was ok, not the best and no maintenance to fix our door..
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking time to review your recent stay. We are very sorry about misunderstanding about free coffee in the room. We provide it in the lobby from 6 am to noon. We hope you will give us another chance to serve you again!

Summary: We were looking for a room last minute. Tried another place not too far and it seemed like they were making up the price over the phone and when we arrived. Thank you Good Nite Inn for your nice, friendly, fast, service will definitely stay again!
Manager Response: Thank you for the recommendation and for choosing Good Nite Inn Buena Park. We're pleased we impressed you! See you soon!

Summary: Checking in and out was very easy and the staff friendly.  Room was clean but lacked a clock and there was no refrigerator.  Some reviews I read said they had a fridge.  Came home late on night and seen 3 police cars and a K-9.  Not sure what that was about.  One nice thing about the place is that it was close to things I wanted to see and do in the area.  No breakfast in the morning, so be prepared to go out.
Manager Response: Thank you for the feedback. So glad you enjoyed the majority of your stay. Though breakfast is not served we do provide free coffee and tea. We look forward to see you again.

Summary: Good effort to minimize discomfort from major remodel in lobby and rooms. Very pleasant staff. One man needs to be shown how to print a boarding pass.Overall enjoyable and we return each year for business and meet with former co workers.
Manager Response: Thank you for recommending our hotel. We are pleased you enjoyed your stay and look forward to your next visit.

Summary: Location: Convenient  There's Knott's nearby, Disneyland, lots of food places, Buena Park Mall, etc.  In the area of the inn, there's a McDonald's nearby and a restaurant called Paul's Place, which is apparently really good (didn't get to try it) according to all the reviews I've read on multiple booking websites and Yelp.   Hotel Amenities Staff: Wonderful people, they're always smiling and saying hi. I got lost a couple times trying to find my room and lobby on the first day and was always offered helped by the staff walking around and such.  Room: I booked a room for a single person and the bed was king sized. Lots of outlets throughout the room including a charging port. There were plenty of towels of a variety of sizes. Was also offered a hair dryer, an iron + ironing
Manager Response: Thank you for your detailed review and suggestions. So glad you found our location convenient, as well as our amenities and services. We hope to see you again on a future visit to the Orange County area.

Summary: This was a great place for our one night stay. It was clean and comfortable. The attendant was personable and made me feel welcome at 3:30 am. She even informed me that the price had lowered from the time we had spoken to the time I had arrived.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review. We are so pleased you enjoyed your stay, though short. It is glad to hear our staff is welcoming at any time of the day. We hope to see you again on a future visit to the Anaheim/Buena Park area.

Summary Heading: Great customer service, clean and updated hotel and a great price.
Summary: Ricky, the front desk attendant had a very cheery disposition, very accommodating and informative.  The room is very clean and updated.  You can't go wrong with the combination of the room accommodation and great and friendly staff.  Thank you, Ricky.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review and the detaild account of your experience with our front desk staff. We are glad to hear that you like our clean and renovated room.We truly appreciate your feedback and hope to see you on a future visit.

Summary: They are remodeling but very aware of customer needs.  The staff is courteous and ready to help with anything.  Apologize for any inconvenience and thank ou for your continued business.  Have recommended this hotel to family and friends.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind comments. We'll pass them along to our team. Thank you for the recommendation to your family and friends.

Summary: Me, my wife and toddler stayed here because we saw how good the hotel looked on the site. But the pictures are deceiving. The upstairs of the hall ways were ran down & it look like we were staying in a drug dealing hotel. It looked & smelled ran down once we were in the elevator & up to our room. The rooms were decent but not as it looked on google. I chose this hotel to surprise my wife and son but we didn't even want to come out the rooms cause the way it looked. The excuse on the signs said sorry for the inconvenience but we are remodeling the hotel. I felt like if you all were remodeling the hotel than don't put customers in the parts that are ran down. The only reason we stayed is because we traveled from far away, we were tired & didn't feel like searching for a new hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback in regards to your recent stay. My sincere apologies for the room quality you mentioned. We have a big goal: to provide great guest service and keep everything sparkly and clean, while we‚Äôre at it. I‚Äôm so sorry we fell short of your expectations. The reason you fill that way was due to major renovation that we are going through.The next time you‚Äôre back in town, let me know! I would love the chance to personally make sure your next stay is an all-out success. We really do want to win you over.

Summary: Best hotel amazing price friendly staff and the best service EVER!!! And will always be the best hotel !!! You will love it here. Clean room ,comfortable bed ,clean bathroom ,good wifi , good parking.
Manager Response: We appreciate the feedback and thank you for posting your review. We are pleased you enjoyed our location, amenities, clean room and parking. We are also pleased to hear that our staff did great service. We look forward to see you again.

Summary: our family of four stayed for five nights. even though there was construction going on at the hotel we were very satisfied with our stay. The room was clean, the staff friendly. We would have enjoyed breakfast or at least a fridge or microwave at the room but it was by far the best value we found in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We are happy you enjoyed your stay and our services and also best value in the area. We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: Had a great stay and good local food places nearby. Everything was awesome. Staff was very helpful with an early check in. Would definitely stay st this location again. I would just recommend vents in the bathroom and a way to lock it.
Manager Response: Thank you for your very detailed review and kind recommendation. We do hope to see you again on a future visit to the Orange County area.

Summary: This hotel has been here for quite some time I live in Buena Park and sometimes I just want to get away the mattresses are comfortable the staff are friendly the morning breakfast is great it's right in the parking lot with a McDonald's and a phenomenal restaurant called Paul's Place right on the corner within walking distance within three minutes Paul's Place is a great place to eat with that in the swimming pool and the secured area this is a good hotel for the money why spend more money to be closer to a place when you can spend less to just be a mile away I hope this helps take care of make it a great dayüëçüëçüëçüëçüòâ
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback and hope, on your next visit, you'll be able to stay longer and enjoy all we have to offer, including our location near so many restaurants.

Summary Heading: Excellent stay at an affordable price.
Summary: This time we got an excellent room with new carpet, sliding doors and paint. It was definitely a huge improvement from my other stays. I would rate it 5/5 only if I knew that the mattresses were also new. Good nite inn in Buena Park is my only choice when traveling to either Disneyland or the beach.
Manager Response: Thank you for your very detailed review. We appreciate your comments as they help us to know what we are doing right... and what areas we can work on to continue improving our services to best meet the needs of our guests. Thank you again for being our guest every time you visiting Disneyland.

Summary: A little bit run down, but perfectly adequate:  slept there for 4 hours (2am -> 6am) from LAX on my way to work A bed, a shower, a warm room: that's what the doctor ordered ;-) Friendly service, good value
Manager Response: Thank you for reviewing your recent stay at Good Nite Inn - Buena Park. We are so happy to hear your stay well and it is also very kind of you to detail about friendly staff and value of the room. We are doing renovation right now so when you stop by next time you will get brand new room!

Summary Heading: Close to Disney, cheap, huge bed!!
Summary: We selected this hotel for an overnight stay because we wanted to be close to disneyland. The service provided by GC was really good. She was very attentive and cared for us. Plenty of free parking. The room is comfy with a really huge bed.
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 star review! We will certainly pass along your comments to GC. We appreciate you letting us know what made your trip to comfortable.

Summary: Room was ready upon arrival.  It was like brand new, as it had just been completely redecorated.  Wife and I (both alone and together) have stayed at Buena Park facility for at least the last ten years.
Manager Response: Thank you Fred for being such a loyal guest for last 10 years. we are glad to hear that you and your wife like our new room. we hope to see you soon!

Summary: The room was overall really nice and the staff was friendly as well. The location was not very close to major areas, but it was very close to Disneyland and it was really convenient to walk to foods and such. The room was very clean and the room was very spacious and comfortable. Also got it for a very good price!
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We are so pleased you enjoyed your stay and we will definitely share your feedback with our staff.

Summary: just a 10-15 min drive to disney and its always afforable. The beds are big and comfy and very clean for the price. The staff has always been very nice the 3 times i have stayed. Food super close by cant ask for more!
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback and comments. We are so pleased you found our hotel services and amenities more than met your needs. Also we are glad to hear that you like our clean comfortable room at reasonable price. Regarding our location, many guests find us conveniently located just down the street from Knotts Berry Farm and about 6 miles from Disneyland.

Summary: Had an excellent experience in this hotel. I would book a room here again and would recommend to my family and friends to come here to have an excellent experience .Guest Services was really nice and it was easy to check-in and check-out out .
Manager Response: We truly appreciate your detailed review and are very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us. Thank you for the recommendation and we look forward to your next visit to Buena Park, California.

Summary: Value for money.  Good location, clean and remodeled room condition, friendly staff and great deal for money. It was good for us because we just needed clean room.   Overall outstanding compare to same level hotels.
Manager Response: I really appreciate you staying with us -- this review really means a lot to all of us here. I'm so glad you enjoyed everything and would love to have you back again whenever you're in town.

Summary: We had a great experience staying in Goodnite Inn Buena Park.  GC from Front Desk was really helpful and friendly in answering any of our inquiries.  Will definitely stay here again! Room was big.  Free coffee in the lobby!
Manager Response: We certainly appreciate you taking the time to give us your positive feed back from your recent stay.  We appreciate it when our guests mention what we are doing well and especially when our employees are mentioned by name.  We will certainly share this review with GC.

Summary Heading: Clean and comfy place to stay...
Summary: Best place to stay on a budget that i've found in O.C. The staff (Natalie, GC, Rebecca, Ricky, David) are all nice and helpful with any issues or concerns. It's clean, and comfy. There's a McDonalds in the adjacent parking lot. It's six miles to Disney. Half that to Knotts. Pretty quiet at night. I recommend.
Manager Response: We thank you for recent positive review.  Our team strives to offer the best possible guest service as well as a clean and neat room.  We are thankful that your experience with us is meeting all of your expectations.

Summary: Stayed at this location because the low price and close to conference I was attending. The staff was friendly and bed was comfortable. Would come again on next business trip. All I did was sleep on the bed, and the bathroom was clean for shower in morning. Got a cup of coffee by front desk and morning and checked out.
Manager Response: Thank you for 5 star review. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay and  our friendly staff. We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: the staff was very helpful in change my room (3) times.  the first room looked like it was ready but when I pulled back the blankets the bottom sheet was dirty and it looked like someone laid down with dirty cloths on, the second room had a very bad smell in it that gave me a headache.  The third room was Ok, but had the smell of fresh paint, I know you are remodeling the hotel, but you should hold off giving these rooms to guest until all of the construction smells are gone.
Manager Response: Please accept our apologies that your recent stay did not meet expectations. We are sharing your comments with our management team and hope you'll give us another chance to change your perception.

Summary: Very nice comfortable rooms at a great price. Lots of places to eat next door or across the street. Front Desk staff always very friendly.  Easy to book on line or in person.  Only 5 minutes from the freeway.
Manager Response: Thank you for 5 star review. We are pleased you enjoyed your stay and our convenient location to freeway, restaurant and theme parks. We will pass your kind words to our friendly staff. We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: For anyone staying in the area, this hotel is an affordable option. It's close to the freeway, restaurants & theme parks. The room was clean for the most part, had an unexpected fridg in the room & a window that opened. I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for recommending our hotel. We are pleased you enjoyed your stay and our convenient location to freeway, restaurant and theme parks. We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: The room was clean and stocked with what we needed. The toiletries were not enough for two people one very small tube of shampoo and one tiny bar of soap that crumbled upon use. So make sure you bring your own, We forgot shampoo, conditioner and soap so to have that available was a life saver.  The room didn't have a micro or frig or coffee machine, but we just needed a place to sleep for the night so that didn't bother us. The battery in the fire alarm was low and a chirping sound began but i called the front desk and maintenance came right away and fixed it.There was no continental breakfast but they did offer free coffee. So if you hoping for a muffin in the morning along with your coffee bring your own,
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time to review your recent stay with us. Overall you like the property except some amenities. We do provide extra toiletries at front desk that guest forget to bring in their travel kit. Also we provide free coffee in lobby form 6 AM to Noon. We will let our maintenance department know about battery issue that you mention. We hope to see you again!

Summary: GC, at the front desk,  did a fine job , making sure I was comfortable and all was well with my room. the re decorated , refinished rooms are very nice. I am definitely returning to Good Nite Inn Buena Park, on my next trip. Thank you !
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments! We've passed them along to GC, who made your stay comfortable! Looking forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: Nosy b/c of construction but everything was wonderful.
Summary: Rooms go away fast and that says a lot about a Hotel. Especially in Buena Park but the employee were very nice and open and made room for me to receive the last room for the 3 nights I was there. I recommend!
Manager Response: Thank you for recommending our hotel. We are pleased you enjoyed your stay and look forward to your next visit.

Summary: the front desk Staff was so kind and friendly GC , rooms are clean and with walking distance restaurants,Paul's , Mc Donalds, and a very affordable hotel and close to all attractions like knotts berry farms and disneyland, I will definitely be staying in this Hotel again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. It is great to hear they were so friendly and helpful during you stay with us. We are always delighted when we exceed our guest's expectations. We look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: This is a small motel that is good if you just plan to sleep for the night and be out all day like at Disneyland. Currently going through renovations and no breakfast offerred. Close to the Highway and next door to 24 hr Mcdonalds.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to give our hotel a favorable review.  We certainly look forward to seeing you on your next visit to our area.  We hope to exceed our expectations with our upcoming room renovations.

Summary: This trip was from my children for beating cancer, I picked this property because we had stayed here a year before, and was very happy with it at that time also.  The people are very kind and helpful, the beds were very comfortable, the rooms are clean, they are remodling the rooms, can't wait to see them when they are done. there are two places to eat at right by the parking lot, Paul's Place is the best, and not too expensive.  We are planning another trip for next November, and will definitely be staying here, I love this place.
Manager Response: We are so happy for you in beating cancer.  We are also happy that we were part of the celebration for you and your family.  Thank you so much for taking the time to express your very favorable review.  We look forward to seeing you again on your next visit to our area.

Summary: Check inn is very fast and very approachable.  FontDesk GC and Rebecca.  They are both very helpful. I am very pleased with the assistance given to me by GC. She s from the Philippines and im glad meeting her here in GoodNite inn Buena Park.a Thank you so much.  Malou Tabuzo Philippines
Manager Response: We certainly appreciate you taking the time to give us a positive review about our hotel and especially our staff.  We do take pride in our ability to give the highest guest service possible.  GC and Rebecca are both exceptional team members and they also thank you for mentioning them by name.  We look forward to seeing you again on your next visit to our area.

Summary: natalie was great she was very friendly and efficient,thank you i will most likely come back and stay,it was nice and quiet and clean environment so I will recommend other family and friends thank you once again :)
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your positive review.  We always appreciate when a guest mentions an employee by name and gives us feed back on their excellent service.  We hope to see you again on your next visit to our area.

Summary: I had to attend a conference in Anaheim and needed a more affordable place than the conference hotel. I was nervous about the Good Nite Inn because the rate was so low and I didn't know the area, but was very relieved to find the place well maintained, well lit, quiet, safe, and with very polite and helpful staff. While the room was minimal (no fridge/microwave or coffee maker) and there was no free breakfast, and the free wifi was quite slow (you can pay for faster wifi), this place met my expectations and needs and I would definitely come back again whenever I'm in the area. The only really annoying thing was that my phone was constantly blinking as though I had a message, while the front desk staff said they had cleared it. Convenient location to the 91 freeway, and Stater
Manager Response: Thank you for your positive comments on your recent stay with us here at the Buena Park Good Nite Inn.  We are very thankful that you gave us the opportunity to deliver the service you expected from our reviews.  We strive to offer all of our guests a clean and quiet stay with a friendly atmosphere.  We certainly look forward to seeing you again the next time you are in our area.  Again, thank you, for taking the time to write your review.

Summary: This was a very enjoyable stay for my grandkids, my son and myself. We had a very time. They enjoyed looking at the different tv shows. I enjoyed the quietness. The personnel were very warm and friendly, very polite.  Thank you
Manager Response: Thank you very much for expressing your enjoyable stay with us at the Good Nite Inn Buena Park.  It is especially nice to hear your grand children enjoyed their stay and vacation as well.  We certainly look forward to seeing you again on your next visit to our area.

Summary: We usually stay at this Hotel when we come here. Great prices...clean.. always recommend this Hotel...they were having construction while we're there and on Wednesday they shut the water off.... didn't know that when booked... the good thing was that they refunded me a night for the inconvenience...still Happy
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. It is wonderful to know that you are a loyal customer of Good Nite Inn and you found us to be such a great value. We are sorry for the inconvenience of the renovation but when it is done the rooms are going to be even nicer. We will see you soon!

Summary: This was cheaper than trying to get a hotel in Anaheim. For the price, you get a pretty decent hotel room. It's close to Knotts, Disney, and the Anaheim Convention Center. The front desk lady, G.C., was awesome!
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We are in a perfect location for visiting the Disneyland park, the Anaheim Convention Center and Knott's Berry farm. Thank you as well for the compliments to GC. It is great to know she was so nice and helpful. We are looking forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: We found Good Night Inn to be a very comfortable place to stay at a very reasonable rate for themetro L.A. Area. Would definitely stay here again if the opportunity presented itself. We arrived late because of traffic and found the desk clerk to be very accomodating
Manager Response: Thank you for the review, we are so glad to hear you found us so affordable and we fit into your budget so well. We do look forward to your next visit with us!

Summary: I stay at this hotel every time we are in Orange County. This is not a luxury hotel. This is a great place to stay and be comfy while staying on a budget. The staff is friendly; Maria and G C are very pleasant and accommodating. The hotel is currently undergoing a complete renovation. I had booked 4 rooms for my party of 9 and we were never inconvenienced. I will be staying again in December and requested a room that has been renovated so I can contrast and compare. I was enthusiastically accommodated. I look forward to my next stay!
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review. It is our goal to exceed our guest's expectations. It is so wonderful that this was indeed the case! Thanks for the compliments to our staff. We are delighted to hear they were so friendly and helpful. We do look forward to your next visit with us!

Summary: I have been staying at this hotel off and on several weeks at a time sence 2015. At times instead of saying at a hotel near jobs item I'll make the extra drive to stay here knowing I'll get the rest and quite I need, I've always gotten excellent service from front Desk, Clean rooms, Never a issue with reservation or rooms not being ready. Will continue staying here when I work or travel in the area.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It is always great to hear from repeat guests! Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff and clean rooms. We are delighted to know you are such a loyal customer!

Summary: I stayed here from 31/10 to 3/11 while I was visiting Disneyland. While I found the room to be quite basic (no fridge, coffee maker etc - although free coffee is available in the lobby) it was clean and the bed was incredibly comfy - I slept very well. The room had a TV, iron and ironing board, and soap and shampoo were provided. It was a good price and close to Disney. Also very close to Knott's Berry Farm which I didn't visit.  They are updating the rooms at the moment I believe, I saw a notice saying that works will only take place between 9am and 5pm, so if you're planning to be out and about, they will not bother you.  All in all, I was very happy with my stay and would stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time to review your recent stay with us. We are so excited to hear you had such a great family vacation and you found our service to be so great. We are so excited to hear you will be returning!

Summary Heading: Good Nite Inn BP - Always a Pleasant Stay
Summary: We stay regularly at this property in Buena Park. GC & staff is always friendly and helpful. Always clean and safe and a Good Nite's Sleep! GNI BP please Keep your prices affordable and we'll keep staying! Thank you!
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 star review! We will certainly pass along your comments to GC and our team. We appreciate you being loyal customer of GNI BP. See you soon!

Summary: The rooms were very nice and spacious. The staff was also very helpful and polite. Try to travel during the week if you can because the prices are a bit cheaper. But anytime you travel its still affordable.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. It is so awesome to know you are recommending us to others! We look forward to seeing you again next time you are in Buena Park.

Summary: I booked my room online a few days before my visit.  I was able to get a room with 2 queen beds on Mon-Wed for $50 one night and $52 the other night.  This was in October.  The room was clean and very satisfactory.  I had breakfast at the very nearby McDonald's.  This was conveniently located.  I just wish they offered coffee in the rooms, instead of the lobby.
Manager Response: Thank you for reviewing your recent stay with us. We are so happy to hear we fit into your budget and your found us so affordable. We are also happy to hear our room was clean and very satisfactory. We do hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Clean and at the right price
Summary: Look, it's not the Ritz, but it's not charging you Ritz prices either. I stayed here many years ago when this hotel was a Fairfield Inn, and it still has that same flavor. Good clean rooms, excellent staff, and fantastic location near Knott's Berry Farm and the freeways (but not next to the freeway!). This is my go-to hotel when staying in the OC/So. Cal area!
Manager Response: We want to thank you for your review. It is so awesome to know you are such a loyal customer since it was Fairfield Inn and even more important that you will be back! Glad to hear you like our clean room, excellent staff and fantastic location in OC. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: I'd like to first start off by thanking G.C for the wonderful service during our stay. The reason why I gave 4 stars and not 5 is because first of all the restroom door was broken on our first night and when we walked in it felt like the room was sorta dusty and had a musty smell to it like it had been left unoccupied for days and had to sleep through that. We voiced our concern about the restroom door to G.C and she got the door fixed the next day and our room was actually cleaned out and got new bedsheets so that made up for it. Overall I would definitely reccomend this place for the great service and accomodation.
Manager Response: Thank you for your very detailed review and recommendation. We truly appreciate it. If little 'niggles' arise, we love being able to correct them quickly and allow guests to fully enjoy their stay with us. I will pass your comments to GC. We look forward to see you soon!

Summary: It was my 1st time staying at this hotel. I drove in from Phoenix. I stayed two nights (Tues/Wed) and I liked the price and location of the hotel. It is exactly what you expect for this type of hotel. No extra bells or whistles but the room was clean, smelled good and the hotel itself has a nice curb appeal to it. I loved that there was a McDonalds (since they only provide free coffee in the AM)in the same parking area as the hotel and also a burger place so you don't have to go far to get a quick bite to eat. The parking  lot was very well lit at night so not to worried about getting my car vandalized. Also I prefer staying at hotels that are also inns so I can get a room that has to be accessed from the inside of the hotel. At this location the 3rd floor of the hotel is the
Manager Response: We want to thank you for the review. It is great to hear you had a overall great stay. We do apologize for any inconvenience you may have experienced during your stay due to guest next door for a day. We are glad to heat that you like our clean room, nice curb appeal and location close to restaurants. We do hope to see you again on your next visit to Buena Park.

Summary: We stay here twice a year every year. Very nice hotel. Wonderful staff.  Very helpful and attentive. Would like to be able to get some sort of recognition for return customer like better pricing but am never alloeed to speak to a manager for that.  But the staff does know whuch rooms we like to stay in
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the review. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. We are delighted to know you will be returning!

Summary: I spent 2  days at this hotel. I found the staff really amazing, specially Rebecca, who went above the call of duty to give us directions to a meeting I had at TBN, and this help us to be on time and beat the traffic.  The room was clean and bedding was great. The location is unbeatable. There are fast-food restaurants in walking distance from the property as well as  grocery store, and highway.   I understand that with the renovation, all the windows will be replaced to prevent any noise from the street. Price is also reasonable.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your very kind review. We'll pass along your kudos and comments to Rebecca. We are so pleased that you found our hotel a 'nice, clean and friendly place and at unbeatable location. We look forward to see you during your next visit to BuenaPark.

Summary: this is our second stay here. i found this hotel through booking.com and it was reasonably priced. not too far from disneyland, freeway entrances down the street, and most important, mcdonalds shares the same parking lot. BREAKFAST! Good Nite Inn does serve coffee and tea in the morning to get you going. Both visits, our rooms were clean and comfy. The customer service was great. Both times we did a late check in and both times they were very accommodating. When checking out after our second visit, I was told that they were remodeling (Oct. 24, 2016). In my head I'm thinking "wow, the place is still nice. I wonder what it'll look like after the remodel."   Overall, I recommend this hotel. Definitely coming back any time I visit SoCal.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, but we will look for ways to 'WOW' you on your next visit. Our goal is not just to meet guests expectations of a 'standard  Inn experience,' but to exceed all expectations. We look forward to welcome you in your next visit to SoCal.

Summary Heading: Very bazaar incident - My reservation was cancelled
Summary: i have not yet stayed at this hotel but, after positive reviews here i decided to give this hotel a try and reserve for 7 days starting 31st October 2016. Being from the Caribbean and will travel a very long way from home i decided to call the hotel today to ensure that the reservation i made for 3 persons online was in fact confirmed. The strangest thing however happen, one which has me worried. instead of confirming my reservation the hotel agent cancelled my reservation, as she assumed that i said to cancel. I speak English however i know that my Caribbean accent may be difficult for some persons in the US to understand, however if this was the problem she made no attempt to ask for me to repeat, or clarify, she simply assumed and cancelled.  I was only asked to give my last
Manager Response: Please accept our apologies that your phone conversation with our team-member resulted in confusion regarding the reservation. It was an error on her part and, though she attempted to correct it with a follow up e mail, we do understand the frustration. Your comments have lead to extensive training, not only for her but with our entire team on reservations and service expectations. We look forward to welcome you on your date of arrival.

Summary Heading: Very good and clean room for the price
Summary: I stay here every time I'm in the area and don't want to drive home after a couple cocktails. The room is clean and the bed is comfortable and the gentleman at the front desk is helpful and courteous. I will be back
Manager Response: Thank you for the recommendation and the detailed account of your experience with our front desk staff. We truly appreciate your feedback and hope to see you on a future visit.
