Summary: This hotel is really clean comfortable and affordable. The desk lady GC was really helpful and nice. The bed was really comfortable :) the hotel is really quiet no one is loud and the AC works perfect! They will be remodeling this hotel soon I am looking forward for that since I will be booking my hotel with them every time I come to California
Manager Response: We truly appreciate your detailed review and are very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us. I will let GC know about your kind words. Thank you for the recommendation and we look forward to your next visit to Orange County, California.

Summary: We had a late check-in, and the desk was run by one person that was working as fast as she could, I spent more than 30 minutes just checking in. We got the Handicap accessible room, that has plenty of room, quiet on the back of the hotel. The bathroom door would need a tractor to close it. Breakfast should be listed as coffee only, good thing McDonalds was across the parking lot. I would stay again, not in that room. Our room was clean and we got a good night sleep. Very affordable and you can't beat the location to everything in Buena Park. I needed the WiFi, it was present but slow.
Manager Response: Thank you for the recommendation and the detailed account of your experience with our hotel. We are glad you enjoy our great location. We truly appreciate your feedback and hope to see you on a future visit.

Summary Heading: enjoyed our stay here, very affordable, excellent customer service
Summary: this place is worth the price, and my father and I greatly enjoyed our stay here  this hotel is what you would call average, nothing too fancy, definitely not the greatest perks, but what makes this a 5/5 star hotel is the service!  Ricky and rebecca were excellent hotel staff who always attended to our needs. We felt right at home.  Customer service greatly makes a difference. I thank the Good Nite Inn staff always attending to out needs and requests.  Room service always came everyday, even on days when we didn't want any room service, they still offered! thanks elisa :)  go here, you won't be dissappointed. there's a paul's place and mcdonalds conveniently placed in the same lot, that's a 4 second walk from the hotel. you will never be hungry!  go here and feel right at home.
Manager Response: Thank you for your very detailed review and recommendation. We truly appreciate it. We are so pleased you and your father enjoyed your stay and we will definitely share your feedback with our staff. We hope to see you again on a future visit to the Anaheim/Buena Park area.

Summary: Since we do not spend alot of time in hotels during out trips to Disneyland we looked into this hotel and it is a great location and hotel for the money! It is only 5-10 min away from Disney and customer service is GREAT it beats paying hundreds a night at the disney hotels.
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay with us! We take pride with providing excellent customer service and we are very pleased that it was shown during your stay. We are located in such a wonderful spot and we are thrilled to hear you took advantage of it. We look forward to see you again.

Summary: Everything was very clean and neat. The management was super friendly. It's a great price for a great value and I will definitely come here again. Recommend to anyone looming for a cheap place in a great location.
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind review and recommendation. We truly appreciate the feedback and acknowledgement. We are pleased you found our great location at very affordable price. Look forward to see you soon!

Summary Heading: I always stay here when I'm in town
Summary: Every time I visit, I stay here. The prices are very reasonable and the rooms are clean. I highly recommend this hotel. They're just a 20 min ride to Disneyland and 5 min drive to Knott's Berry Farm.  I will always stay here...
Manager Response: Thank you! We are glad you enjoy our location, clean room and reasonable price. We appreciate the recommendation and thank you for continuing to choose Good Nite Inn Buena Park.

Summary: Very clean, quiet, affordable with the best staff! Shout out to G.C. for an exemplary customer service by making my stay as comfortable as it can get. This is my favorite place to stay when in this area.
Manager Response: Thank you! We appreciate the recommendation and thank you for continuing to choose Good Nite Inn Buena Park. I will pass your comment to GC.

Summary: Whole building Needs to be refreshed.  Why not have complimentary continental breakfast. Good location.Need ice machine on all floors. If you had one on the 3rd floor I did not see any signs. Brighten the rooms and carpeting.
Manager Response: Please accept our apologies that your recent stay did not meet expectations. We are sharing your comments with our management team and hope you'll give us another chance to change your perception.

Summary: Although the room was decently priced and not a bad area. I left the room and forgot my expensive macbook charger on the sink and when I called to come back and get it, they said it wasn't there. They stole it and I have called multiple times since. So not okay!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time and review your recent stay. We are sorry that you lost your charger. Our housekeeping staff is experienced and trained to report items left by guest in the room. It is quite common in our experience for guests to be concerned about lost items and to then recover them, realizing they were misplaced. This may be the case.

Summary: Rebecca has always gone out of her way to be helpful. Always treating people with a smile and helping in any way she can. I have never had a bad night there. And I will use this hotel as often as I can, when I am in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 star review! We will certainly pass along your comments to Rebecca. We appreciate you letting us know what made your trip so special. We look forward to see you soon.

Summary: I have returned so many times to this hotel since the first time I reviewed it. It has always been excellent. The staffs are always friendly and helpful. It seems like I'm home because some of the staffs regonized me already. They seems to go extra mile for their guest to make their stay memorable. I really appreciate the good service that I received. I experienced it so many times, especially from their staff GC. The room was always nice, clean and quiet, and the location is very convenient. Feels like everything I need is all in one place. Exceeds my expectation. Thanks Goon Nite Inn.
Manager Response: Thank you! We are so pleased you found our location nice,clean, quite, convenient and amenities and services exceeded your expectations. We know you have a choice in hotels when you visit the Orange County area and we truly appreciate you choosing Good Nite  Inn Buena Park. I will pass your appreciation of service to entire team and GC. Thank you again for taking time and review your recent stay with us.

Summary: Ricky at the front was extremely helpful in EVERY ASPECTS!  He helped me print my boarding pass and save me valuable time.  My husband has headache and the other front desk lady helped us check in early.  Room was clean and tidy.  Thanks Ricky!
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We will share your comments with Ricky. We love hearing how our team keeps our guests coming back again and again. Look forward to see you soon!

Summary: My stay was great the room was nice, spacious, and very clean. Its very close to knotts berry farm and Disneyland. The price is more affordable than the other surrounding hotels. Staff is very polite and helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback and for choosing Good Nite Inn Buena Park. We are pleased you found our location clean, convenient and affordable in the area.

Summary: This room was clean n very excellent n quite place to go and visit. I have stayed here multiple times and every time is a good stay. I would stay here again next time in the area for business. The check in was very good and quick.
Manager Response: Thank you! We appreciate the recommendation and thank you for continuing to choose Good Nite Inn Buena Park.

Summary: Nice and clean rooms very friendly staff, fast service and affordable rates. Convenient location near parks. No breakfast serve only coffee. Front desk GC was very knowledgeable and hospitable on giving service.
Manager Response: We're so pleased you enjoyed your stay with us! It was great to read that our location was convenient, nice and clean room and friendly staff. I will pass your kind  word to GC . We look forward to see you soon.

Summary: We stayed here for JCCS 2016, and really didn't want to dish out a lot of coin on an hotel room. This place has a very well maintained exterior and our room was across from the pool...it is a 3 level building, so those of you with bad knees...ask for the lower level. My only complaints: 1) the wall facing the outside is insulated with paper, cause you can hear everything that is outside of your room...from birds to footsteps of a passers-by. 2) the beds are super soft, so I slept on the floor.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to express your thoughts about your stay with us! We sincerely apologize that your stay was below average. However, we are pleased to hear that you did like place for the price. We hope to see you again!

Summary: I came here a couple times already & it's been really great and simple. GC was the one that helped us in the front desk and she did a great job. Went above and beyond by accommodating us within the city of what we can do. Definitely my spot now since I would come down to SoCal often. The price is great too! I would say it's a lot better than Motel 6 or any other Motel or Inn that I've stayed in.
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 star review and for continuing to choose Good Nite Inn Buena Park. We will pass along your comments to GC. We do look forward to your next visit.

Summary: Check in was fast and easy.  Room was nice for the price we paid. I think the only thing that I MIGHT recommend is a better breakfast but they would have to charge more. The beds were comfy and clean.  Good place for your buck!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to review our property. I am happy to hear that your stay was great at a very reasonable price. We hope to welcome you back soon and on your next visit, We thank you again for staying with us.

Summary: alot to do near by. good staff. will always try to stay again. environment feels safe. the customer service was good and they care about your stay. our room only had a half used toilet paper roll and since we werent there that much it lasted however it would have been nice to have more
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 star review! We will certainly pass along your comments to our staff. We appreciate you letting us know what made your trip so special. We look forward to see you soon!

Summary: Nothing special but nothing to disappoint. Clean room with a bed, a tv and a shower close by to where I needed to be. Solid front desk help and it was clear that the local management keeps things clean and inviting. In need of some updating but if I had to pick between a clean place that needed updating and an updated place that needed cleaning I'd pick the clean place every time.
Manager Response: Thank you for the feedback. We are pleased you found our front desk very helpful as well as our rooms very clean. We look forward to see you soon!

Summary Heading: Nice stay with nice and helpfull people at the desk.
Summary: Good quality for a good price at a nice central and safe location. Good service and decent rooms. People who care for their business. One block from freeway but on a quiet location. No noise in the rooms. Pool is nice in  the summer to cool off.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback and comments. We are so pleased you found our hotel services and amenities more than met your needs. Regarding our location, many guests find us conveniently located just down the street from Knotts Berry Farm, just 6 miles from Disneyland and closed to interstate 5 and 91. And you are right we have a best rate in the area. We look forward to see you again soon!

Summary: We arrived a bit late, around 2am, the staff greeted us kindly and the check in was swift so we could rest immediately.  The room decoration is a bit dated, but that doesn't mean it's not clean and completely functional. You have a bathtub, an iron and the surface to iron your clothes, you can ask for a hairdryer on the front desk if needed (they are very kind and will try to help you out with anything), a desk, a flat screen tv with cable, AC, and the bed is really comfortable.  One thing about the internet, you have a complementary WiFi that's a bit slow and can connect 2 devices per room and for a small fee you can connect up to 4 devices.  Overall we were very happy to have stayed here, we visited Soak City and it's a great spot to visit anything near the I-5.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to review our property. I am happy to hear that your overall stay was great and you find your room accommodations and our staff satisfying. We look forward to welcome you back soon and on your next visit!

Summary: I needed a cheap, decent hotel to crash that wasn't too far from LAX. This hotel fit the bill. A little further from LAX than I wanted to be. But everything worked out. Staff was very approachable, helpful and nice.
Manager Response: Thank you for reviewing your recent stay at Good Nite Inn - Buena Park. We are so happy to hear that our hotel fit in your budget and it is also very kind of you to acknowledge our approachable, helpful and nice staff.  I will let the  our staff know about how great they were.. We thank you again for staying with us and we hope to see you back soon.

Summary: This place was very clean and nice considering how much you have to pay for the stay. The best part of this place was the attentive and kind staff. GC at the front desk was not only tending to her many customers but she also doubled as house keeping making sure that the Inn was at it's best.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review and the detaild account of your experience with our front desk staff. We truly appreciate your feedback and hope to see you on a future visit. I will pass your comment to GC.

Summary: Close to prime theme Parks. Excellent for vacations. Enjoyable place to stay, near to Market stores. Bus station close to main entrance. Easy to arrive to the Hotel. Excellent hostes and very friendly people.
Manager Response: Thank you for your detailed review. So glad you found our location convenient and very friendly staff. We hope to see you again on a future visit to the Orange County area.

Summary: I have to say this is a nice hotel and service was great.G.C works there she is awesome. The room was nice and the bathroom are all nice and big. The parking was easy especially at night. The price was great and free WIFI. Overall this hotel is a 5 star to me and my family. I will be coming back here again.
Manager Response: Thank you! We are so pleased you found our location convenient and clean room and services exceeded your expectations. We will share your comments with GC. Thank you again for 5 star review and we look forward to see you soon!

Summary Heading: Clean, quiet and perfectly located for lots of local fun activity.
Summary: Brought the kids to town for an end of summer/start of school last family trip.  Visited Knotts Berry Farm, the water park, and on our last day, Huntington Beach.  Spent great family time in the clean, perfectly lit pool on our last night and even ordered pizza delivery!  We will definitely be back.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback and for choosing Good Nite Inn Buena Park. We are pleased you found our location convenient and you have a great time at our perfectly lit clean pool! We look forward to see you and your family in winter break.

Summary: Good Nite is centrally located with Big Bear restaurant and others walking distance.  No breakfast or extras to offer.  Even the luggage cart needs your drivers license to borrow.  But overall we were happy with the location close to Knott's Berry Farms.  Water pressure good. Clean rooms, nice pool.
Manager Response: Thank you! We are so pleased you found our location clean,convenient and amenities and services to your expectations. Only reason to get ID for the cart is to get cart back at the front desk for the next guest! We are sorry for the inconvenient! Hope to see you again.

Summary: The location was great!  It was near restaurants, malls and freeways.  We were there for a softball tournament and stayed in a king room.  There was room for a blowup mattress on the floor, but the room was out dated with stained carpet.  There was no fridge or coffee maker in the room, but everything else worked. Everyone was friendly, however I think the motel was over priced. You are basically paying for the location.
Manager Response: Thank you for the feedback. We are pleased you found our location convenient as well as  friendly staff. Although our rates are lower in the area, Note that the best rates can be found by booking direct and booking early especially during the very busy summer months. Hope to see you again!

Summary: Great place, practical and very comfortable, they can add more for breakfast in the morning, aside from the complimentary coffee . The location is key, it is midway to San Diego and a short 20 minute drive to downtown LA or Hollywood.  I will make sure I get to stay again in this hotel
Manager Response: Thank you for your detailed review and suggestions. So glad you found our location convenient. We look forward to see you again on a future visit to the Orange County area.

Summary: This hotel was an excellent value for the price. It was very clean. The beds were fair (I've had worse at more expensive hotels). The staff was very nice. No breakfast, but there are several restaurants nearby, a few within walking distance. The only real negative is that there is only free wifi for 2 devices, and at times it was VERY slow. But that didn't really bother us and we could have paid a small fee to have more device access - although I don't know if that would have been any faster. It was a perfect place to stay for a trip to Knotts Berry Farm.
Manager Response: We truly appreciate your detailed review and are very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us and value for the price and convenient location . Thank you for the again and we look forward to your next visit to Orange County, California.

Summary: In a complex job transition, I have found the staff @ this hotel willing & helpful.  GC @ the front counter was responsible for several special requests; Maria as well & the maintenance staff all were warm & accommodating!  I believe this hotel to be unique in the land of 1,000 theme parks!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Friendly staff. Nice clean room and air conditioner worked very well. Bed was a little uncomfortable and pressure from shower and sink were too low. My daughters enjoyed the pool aswell. I definitely will return.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This place was nothing more than professional and attentive. For the price that you're paying you really getting a great deal. The rooms were clean and Smelled good. The staff was friendly and helpful, made our visit feel welcome. we will definitely be coming back to stay in the near future.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback! So glad you enjoyed your stay and our clean room and friendly staff. Look forward to see you soon!

Summary: I stay here a lot, probably 24 times for at least a week each time, so I feel at home when I come here. The staff is great. The ladies that clean are wonderful. Maintenance is great.The only real drawback I have at all is the water pressure in the showers is terrible. It's not a whole lot more than a tricke, so by the time I've been there a week or more I really look forward to a fullfilling invigorating shower.
Manager Response: Thank you for posting your review. We truly appreciate the feedback and acknowledgement of our staff. Please let me know if you come up with same issue during your next visit.Thank you for continuing to choose Good Nite Inn Buena Park.

Summary: The room was passable, but the carpet looked dirty when we arrived.  Nothing terrible about it, but nothing to commend it either.  Seemed too highly priced for what we got.  No breakfast to speak of.  Convenient location.
Manager Response: Please accept our apologies for the carpet issue that you mention. I will let our maintenance department know  to perfect those areas. During busy season we do have little higher rate but our rate are lower in the area. Check our web site for the best rate. Thank you for the feedback.

Summary: I called into the hotel at 3pm requesting for a late check-in(8pm) which they said that my room was already reserved regardless of the time I checked in.  My son and I have severe allergies and when I booked the room in advance I requested a smoke-free room.  Upon my arrival there was only one attendant working and was busy juggling phone calls and the two customers inquiring about towels for the pool.  It took nearly 20 minutes before she was able to attend to me.  When I received the room keys, I moved the car to where the room would be on the other side of the building right across from the pool.  When I opened the door to our room the smell of the room reeked cigarettes.  My 6 years old started wheezing so I told him to stay outside the room with my sister.  The cigarette
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback in regards to your recent stay. My sincere apologies for the time that you have to wait during this busy season. Some time it do happen that many guest comes to check at the same time. We have a big goal: to provide great guest service and keep everything sparkly and clean, while we‚Äôre at it. I‚Äôm so sorry we fell short of your expectations. I hope you will give us another opportunity.

Summary: The room was perfect the front desk was very felixable i would defintely recommend it will be staying here again  thanks to the front desk (G.E) my trip was perfect.The staff was amazing were able to give us to beds at the end i cant wait to stay here again hotel was clean and nice and very spacious.
Manager Response: We are all thrilled to learn that you enjoyed such a pleasant experience with us. I have shared your compliments with our staff and thank you for giving me the opportunity to recognize them for a job well done! We're very pleased to hear your positive feedback regarding our hospitality and accommodations and we can't wait for your next visit.

Summary: Over all our stay was good every one at the front desk was nice and in good Spirts we had a large party and needed  four rooms which they keep together for us pool was clean and open which was nice to use
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review and for choosing the Good Nite Inn Buena Park for your family vacation. We love hearing how our team goes above and beyond. Safe travels until you return to the Orange County area.

Summary: Nice rooms. Staff was always polite. Given the location so close to tourist attractions the price was right. They advertise as a "no frills" hotel so don't expect a mini fridge, coffee pot or things of that nature.  But if you need a place to sleep/shower for a good price this is it. There was even a discount offer. P.S.  There is an iron in room but hairdryers at the front desk. I took my own though.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback and for choosing Good Nite Inn Buena Park. We are pleased you found our location convenient and worth the price. I will pass your comment to my staff. Hope to see you soon!

Summary: I have stayed at the Good Nite Inn, Buena Park many times while volunteering at the International Printing Museum over in Carson, CA. Knowledgeable staff and very helpful, free basic wifi and a morning coffee. The pool is great too!
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback and comments. We are so pleased you found our hotel services and amenities more than met your needs. We look forward to see you soon!

Summary Heading: Overcharged and time for an overhall
Summary: We booked the room at one price, but when we checked in, we were hit with another price. When we got into our room, we were disappointed and found it hard to sleep. If the floor is dirty, carpet is torn, there are dips in the floor, and cracked tile, are they really washing the towels and bedding? Plus, the A/C was so close to one of the beds, that we thought the room at one time might have been just for one bed. The room was crowded, the carpet was dirty, the refrigerator had rust on top, and it was not worth the price. They need to rip out the carpet, fix the dips, the tile...just remodel the place period.
Manager Response: Please accept our apologies for the unpleasant experience you had with us. I will let our housekeeping and maintenance department know about the issues you mentioned to perfect those areas. We hope you will give us another opportunity to better serve you in the near future.

Summary: This was our 2nd time staying here and we enjoy this hotel. First time we stayed for 3 days for a Disneyland trip which worked out great because it is near by. Rooms are clean, I didn't hear any noisey neighbors, staff is friendly. I think for being as close as it is to amusement parks, pricing is fairly decent and it's not a run down hotel either. Defintely beneficial for Disney stay compared to those 300 dollar rooms close by. We will definitely be staying here for 3rd time if we make our way back out there
Manager Response: We truly appreciate your detailed review and are very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us. Thank you for the recommendation and we look forward to your next visit to Orange County, California.

Summary: Room smelled like cigarettes but overall i liked the size and space.  No mini fridge though, which was a big bummer.  Close to 91 and 5, with food within 1 block or less like McDonald's and a diner on the same corner.  Good size pool for the kids or adults.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. I'm sorry to hear about smelled in your room. We do have some room with mini fridge in it. Please let us know in advance during your future reservation. we look forward to see you again.

Summary: Maybe our room was older - we were downstairs close to the office.  But I did not like this motel.  I did not see the great value as others.  I felt it was overpriced for what it was and did not feel it was clean.  Our socks got dirty from walking around on rug.  Bathroom was run down and in need of some TLC.  I most likely would not stay here again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Good value place to stay. The rooms were clean and spacious. The room was a bit noisy at night as close to a busy road. The staff were friendly and there was plenty of parking. The wifi worked really well, and the morning coffee was appreciated. The windows do not open and could do with a clean, as they were grubby. The air conditioning unit worked well.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I stayed at Good Nite Inn in Buena Park California in April of 2016.  I liked that even though I arrived in the middle of the night there was an actual person there to greet me. Check in was fast and the receptionist was nice. It was clean. They had coffee in the lobby and vending machines. They also had a pool which we never used, because we were always out. Good place to sleep at if you're not looking for anything fancy.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I knew I would not be getting the ritz for the price, however, the room was dirty,bobby pins on the bathroom floor and hairs on the sink and bed pillows. Stained towels. hallways and carpets are gross. Extremely loud neighbors with small children running up and down the halls that had two rooms next to us and nothing was done, bum sleeping on the bench outside...maintenence needed to fix a broken pocket door...the front desk agent was rude from the minute we walked in through our entire stay. RUN...from this place...do NOT stay here!
Manager Response: Please accept our apologies for the unpleasant experience you had with us. I will let our housekeeping and maintenance department know about the issues you mentioned to perfect those areas. We hope you will give us another opportunity to better serve you in the future.

Summary Heading: Very Great Service and Excellent Value!!!
Summary: I like how the front desk deal with their customers ...well discussed the rules and regulaions of the hotel. One experienced i had ..we are still  with our friends and unable to come early and my daughterr arrived at the reception of the hotel .my daughter called me .we are not ready to go back to the hotel because we are  far from the  hotel.what i did i called the hotel informing them my daughter"s problem. i spoke to the front desk on duty named GC when she answered the phone  by introducing herself first ..phone courtesy is the best ..i relayed to her that my daughter alredy at te hotel  ..she told me after getting my necessary information she let my daughter get in  to our room  and when we arrived ..she's asleep bec. she's tired for she came from other county. Please
Manager Response: none

Summary: My wife and I stayed here on June 12 along with another couple. Both rooms were clean. Motel was quiet. We did not swim but there was an outdoor pool that looked taken care of. Nearby gas station and McDonald's across the parking lot for late night snacks or breakfast. About 15 minutes from Disney. Would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I loved the fact that the hotel was clean and super close to Disneyland. since I'm such a big Disneyland goer this hotel is definitely my go to. way more affordable then hotels walking distance from the parks the 10 min drive is no big deal at all! this was my second time staying here, the first time was when I spent a week in SoCal it was a great and comfortable stay felt very home away from home kinda thing.  only downfall was there was no free wifi at the time but that wasn't a big deal. This time was just a quick over night stay I booked the room real last minute and got there pretty late but despite how tired I was driving there G.C at the front desk was really nice and very helpful. she was helping a really difficult guest ahead of me but I saw how calm and patient she
Manager Response: none

Summary: I love the friendly staff, the location, the comfortable rooms and the free parking. Breakfast isn't provided but with MacDonalds next door it doesn't need to be - I prefer that they keep costs down by not having it available. I will use this Inn anytime that I'm in the area.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great place to stay if you are going to the amusement parks. II have stayed here many times.  Not fancy but like the frig in the room and microwave in lobby. Lots of stores and restaurants close by. They try their best to be a smoke free place but many people have broken this rule.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stayed here for a night. Was a place to lay before the drive back up north. Simple room. I can't recall the person that helped us, but she was great. Two fast food places within walking distant. Not fancy, yet not horrible. I will use this place again in future trips.
Manager Response: Thank you for the feedback! We're so pleased you enjoyed your stay! We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: rooms clean...everything was great.....my parents were comfortable, my kids loved it  I was satisfied with this stay and will return again on another family vacation thank you for the great costumer service and room service.
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 star review! We truly appreciate your feedback and are so happy you enjoyed your vacation! We'll look forward to seeing you again on a future visit!

Summary: Not sure if this place is also rents monthly but after staying in the 2nd floor and having to hear the people above me stomp the entire night I wouldn't stay here again.  It almost seemed like they were doing it on purpose. I had to take a Xanax so that I could sleep and not hear one damn thing.
Manager Response: Please accept our apologies for the unpleasant experience you had with us. Sorry to hear you did not get a good night sleep during your stay. I wish you would had called the front desk about the noise. We could have asked them to quiet down. We do not have weekly or monthly rental. I hope you will give us another chance during your future visit to Orange county.

Summary: We got to the hotel at 1 am and the staff in front was very helpful and kind. Checked us in quick. We just needed to sleep there and both my kids and I felt comfortable to sleep the night. Room was clean, just needed a blow dryer.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time to review your recent stay and the detailed account of your experience with our front desk staff. We truly appreciate your feedback and hope to see you on a future visit.

Summary Heading: The most bang for your buck!
Summary: I recently stayed at this hotel with my family on a visit to Disneyland. We arrived at nearly midnight and the night front desk attendant was very accommodating and friendly. When checking in I had mentioned that we had just driven almost 8 hours and my husband was still in the car with our sleeping daughter. To my surprise when I got my room keys I realized that we were assigned a ground for room right in front of where we were parked. I really appreciated that. It made unloading a sleeping child and all the luggage very easy. The room was very clean, and the carpets freshly shampooed. The beds were the most comfortable hotel beds I've ever slept in, and they were very clean as well. The only drawbacks to our stay were 1) there was no hairdryer, microwave, fridge, or
Manager Response: Thank you for reviewing your recent stay at Howard Johnson - Buena Park. We are so happy to hear your stay went well and it is also very kind of you to detail your stay so others reading our reviews can really get a feel for our hotel. We thank you again for staying with us and we look forward to see you back soon.

Summary: Every time were traveling to California we always stay at Goodnite Inn Buena Park, always get an excellent service from G.C. she always accommodate our needs, very efficient, always with a smile. The room is clean, nice place to stay and affordable.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing this wonderful review with the tripadvisor community. We do appreciate all your comments and the rating given, I will let my G.C. know she did a great job at providing service. Thank you again for choosing our hotel as your travel destination. We are looking forward to welcome you back soon!

Summary: Nice place to stay the night. Clean place, great rooms. Great service from G.C. she had an excellent friendly personality. She had great room rates. I would definitely recommend this place & will be going back too.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and recommendation. We truly appreciate it.  We'll pass along your kind word to GC.  We'll look forward to seeing you again on a future visit!

Summary: Good value for money motel. Rooms looked a bit dated but were clean. Stayed here our first night in Los Angeles before travelling east so the location (not too far from LAX and on the freeway) was convenient. Several restaurants close to the motel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback and for choosing Good Nite Inn Buena Park before travelling to East. Hope to see you again when you come back!

Summary: The front desk staffs are very accomodating and helpful. The room is spacious and very clean. The location is very convenient and safe. They are very prompt in addressing your concern. The front desk staff, GC,  was very helpful to me and you can see her enthusiasm in helping the guest. You can tell that she really likes her job. I would definitely recommend  this place to my friends and family. My stay was very comfortable and peaceful.
Manager Response: Thank you for your very detailed review and recommendation. We truly appreciate it. We are so pleased you found our location convenient and services exceeded your expectations. I will pass your kind word to GC and hope to see you soon!

Summary: Great staff, fantastic beds! Nice pool, plenty of parking. Surrounded by restaurants within walking or a short dive (5-10 minutes). Close to freeways but not so close you could hear any traffic. 15 minutes drive from Disneyland. Coffee was some of the best we had on our trip. Very clean room and no noise at night!! Will stay here again on our next trip.
Manager Response: We appreciate your review. So glad you found our location convenient to Disneyland and to the freeways with easy access to go everywhere in the LA and Orange County areas. We look forward to see you soon!

Summary: The staff is really good and the service is awesome. The beds are comfortable and the washrooms are clean. The washroom door was heavy with no handle and no lock, also the carpet on the third floor needs a real good scrub.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The staff here are superb. They are caring, courteous, polite and efficient. The rooms are clean and not run down. Housekeeping is always ready to assist, to give extra towels if needed. The grounds are always clean. The hotel is quiet. A good value for your money. I like staying here as does my family. Stay here you will not be sorry.
Manager Response: Thank you for the recommendation and the detaild account of your experience with our staff. We truly appreciate your feedback and hope to see you on a future visit.

Summary: I was happily surprised. Comfy beds, great service, friendly people. Very much enjoyed my stay (6 days, 5 nights). Very close to restaurants, a mall, Knotts Berry Farms and Disney Land. If I am ever in the area I will absolutely stay here again. Only con was you had to jiggle the toilet handle so it wouldn't keep running.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recommendation and feedback. We are so pleased you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again on a future visit to Orange County, CA area.

Summary: carpet,walls,windows,mirrors and bathroom floors need to be cleaned. The curtains where dirty also the chair in the room should be cleaned or replaced. Felt uncomfortable being there. I would not recommend staying here.
Manager Response: Please accept our apologies for the unpleasant experience you had with us. I will let our housekeeping and maintenance department know about the issues you mentioned to perfect those areas. We hope you will give us another opportunity to better serve you in the near future.

Summary: Excellent  great place to stay will refer people . We enjoyed ourself close to fun places  and had a great time while we were staying there. I would refer people to this clean location it was excellent for family and friends
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to review our property. I am happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and you find your room accommodations clean. Thank you for referring our motel to your family and friends. We hope to welcome you back soon!

Summary: Courteous front desk personnel and housekkeepers.  Good value for the money, tried to accommodate my needs for disabled access.  Clean, comfortable and with plenty of parking.  Location is desirable.  Appreciate non-smoking rooms.
Manager Response: We are really proud to hear that we were able to accommodate your travel needs and service was as you expected. Thank you for choosing The Good Nite Inn for your travel destination and we are looking forward to welcome you again near future.

Summary: This hotel has comfortable and clean beds, great friendly staff.  The hotel is close  to Knott's Berry Farm and lots of resturants within a 5 mile radius and the best part it is close to the freeway,  I will book a room at this hotel again.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to review our property. I am happy to hear that your stay was great and you find our location convenient.  We look forward to see you soon.

Summary: Stayed in May 2016. The hotel is situated in a good location, is great value for money and all staff are really friendly and helpful.  On the downside; it is quite dated/basic (but what can you expect for such a great price), and at first glance, does look a little like the beginning of a horror film...
Manager Response: none

Summary: Very courteous and helpful. It's nice to see someone love to do their job. By the way her name is GC. Good asset to your team. Its close to knott's  berry farm and right next to the freeway... price is good, I will definitely come back here.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed here so we can go to disneyland and it was just 6 minutes away. The staff doesn't bother you but are there if you needed something. I would stay again when we're in that part of town. Enjoyed my stay.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We were traveling with other family members and had reservations that we made on Good Nite Inn's website for two nights.  At check in we were confused as were told that there was only one room left of the type we had booked which didn't make sense since we had to use a credit card to book our rooms.  Our room was very nice.  Everything appeared to have been newly remodeled.  The other family's room had torn and stained carpet and wallpaper.  There was a huge difference between the two rooms!  The front desk staff members were very friendly and helpful.  The lobby area is large with vending machines, an ice machine, and free coffee in the morning.  There are two terrific restaurants within walking distance.  They are The Black Bear Diner and Paul's Place.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Watch out for bees, staff was kinda rude
Summary: They demanded to have the rooms clean every three days, if you don't let em clean every three days, they threaten to kick you out and keep any future money you paid to stay (or at least thats what they told me when I stayed there.) There was also a bee problem a few doors down. That was kinda unnerving, cause I'm scared of bees.  Their version of the free breakfast was muffins and milk and coffee. I dont do coffee so I got milk and 3 big muffins. No eggs, no sausage, no pancakes. Thankfully at the time there was a McDonalds right next door. The bus that got me in the direction of the hotel, didn't get me to the hotel so it was like a mile walk pulling suitcases. So don't stay here if you don't have a car. I did a lot of walking while here since I didn't have a car.  There was
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback in regards to your recent stay. A hotel is defined by the quality of service that it provides to its guests. We like to clean our rooms every day to provide nice clean room, towels and sheets to all our guest. We provide only free coffee in the morning from 6 am till noon. And I understand that it is very difficulty to travel without car. I am so sorry that bus you took to come to the hotel did not drop you near our hotel.

Summary: Rick the night manager was excellent, he gave us excellent customer service. He was kind, considerate, and compassionate. He made sure that we had a room that was clean, comfortable, and warm. He promptly checked us in and wished us good night with the biggest smile you could imagine. He made us feel at home and we really appreciate how caring he is. Every hotel experience should be like this and we will definitely be staying here again. He deserves a raise because he goes above and beyond to make his guests happy.
Manager Response: Thank you for the recommendation and the detaild account of your experience with our front desk staff. We truly appreciate your feedback and hope to see you on a future visit.

Summary: Lady taking care of the check-in was very helpful and friendly. I needed to have an email attachment printed out and she addressed it promptly and courteously. Check out was just as efficient and courteous. Restaurants nearby. Easy access to Ca 91.
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback and thank you for taking the time to post your review. We'll share your comments with our staff.

Summary Heading: Reasonable Hotel for Buena Park Attractions
Summary: Visited on Saturday to be close to Knott's Berry Farm for the Fabulous Fords Forever Car Show.  The rates were very reasonable for the weekend. It's a good hotel if you plan on visiting the area for the attractions and need a bed and shower for the night.  The room are average and they have complementary coffee in the morning.  If your wanting to save money and not spend a lot for a short stay this is a great place to stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for the recommendation. We appreciate your comments, both positive and constructive. Looking forward to your next stay.

Summary Heading: Nice place to stay for a short trip
Summary: I had short trip to CA for a vacation and Buena Park is not that far from the places we want to go.  The hotel staff was nice and helpful. The room with 2 queen bed is nice. We were offered to take the room with fridge which is nice. All in  we have a good time at Good Nite Inn.
Manager Response: We appreciate your review. So glad you found our location convenient to go everywhere in the LA and Orange County areas. Hope to see you for your next vacation to CA.

Summary Heading: Clean rooms and close to freeway
Summary: Very good service. Staff was friendly and live the coffee until noon. Rooms were clean but a bit old and worn but not a deal breaker. I love the close location to the freeway, would come stay again. Breakfast would have been nice.

Summary: very warm welcome, clean room, employees are helpful, quiet environment, near knotts berry, good coffee, clean pool, good attendant, friendly staff and crew, i will recommend and visit again and again.

Summary Heading: YOU GET WHAT YOU PAY FOR
Summary: was comming in on a super long haul. NorCal to SoCal. left at 3pm, in order tpo hit Los Angeles around 10pm. All to avoid nightmareish traffic. arrived at 11pm. And was quickly assigned a room. The woman; Rebecca was very pleasant, at that late hour.  I had booked the reservation directly on GoodNite.com  Not glamourous by any means. Not classy or with any real  personsality or style. it is a very well-worn motel. It is about 1inch from being completely run-down. But for $48  ($54.76 with tax)  it worked.  The bed was okay, it doidn't smell too bad. There were coffee and other dark stains on the industrial fabric'd carpeting. tri-colored striped wallpaper in the bathroom, reminded me if my own bathroom, as a child in 1975! And the retro-pocket door?   This place is "okay"   I

Summary Heading: good for the price and the GC at the front desk was awesome
Summary: For the price I do not think you can beat it - go to there websites for they often have deals. The rooms are clean but nothing special. The beds are comfortable and this a great location for Knotts. The free internet service is spotty. No hair dryers. They do have a pool and parking is free. I have been really impressed by GC. I have been coming here for a while and she has been very helpful. If you are looking for a good deal, with a pool and close to Knotts this is a good choice.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recommendation and feedback. We are so pleased you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again on a future visit to the Orange County, CA area.

Summary: Our stay was great. The only issue was the bed was rather hard. Housekeeping were great days we slept in later they came later even though they were cleaning rooms on that floor. Desk service was friendly and always helpful.

Summary: It was well worth the price. Good location close to good restaurants and Knotts Berry and Disneyland. Right off the freeway and centrally located. Only issue the pol wasn't heated. Overall a great deal!

Summary: The best place to stay in Buena Park. The manager and the counter personnel are super professional. But I can't say enough about this place and the people. I love this place. So if you ever in the Buena Park area you can't miss this place.

Summary: Front desk ladies were very friendly & helpful. Good room space even with king size bed. Very close to freeway, fast food & resturants, gas stations & Knott's Berry Farm. Will be booking here again soon.

Summary: Easy to find, comfortable and helpful. Left a very important piece behind and they protected it until I was able to retrieve it. No breakfast offered but great restaurant across the street with McDonalds and another Breakfast/lunch place in connecting parking lots.

Summary: the stay was good, comfy beds. The restroom shower was leaking and appeared to have been for a while, closed the bathroom door and it was okay. I will stay there again when visiting the area. Many choices of food within walking distance.

Summary: We came here on a family trip and I must say I had an incredible stay at the Good Nite Inn. The staff was amazing and the rooms were very clean. I am very glad me and my family chose Good Nite Inn. I would definitely choose to stay here again
Manager Response: none

Summary: I always stay here. Love the staff. Treat me like family. They know which rooms I prefer and do their best to be accommodating. Wherever anything needs to be fixed it gets done in a timely manner. I've been coming here for several years now. Feels like home.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: No better place to stay on a budget
Summary: I've stayed here several times over the last year. The staff is friendly, and attentive to the needs of the guest. The rooms are clean, and comfortable. The noise at night is usually non-existent, because of the hotel policy after 10pm. The rates are very competitive. Ten minutes to Disney, and five to Knotts. Not much more to say, really. Give it a try, I don't think you will be disappointed.   Oh, and the area is pretty good too. I've never had any problem parking out front. 24-hour McDonald's in the adjacent parking lot, if you get the munchies.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Drove from our home in Henderson, Nevada on Thursday morning with an early a.m. Doctor's appointment for Friday.  Arrived at 12:30pm and Maria (who I've dealt with for several years) checked me in and gave me a ground floor , non-smoking room as requested.  The room was one of the recently refurbished ones and was in complete order and equipped with everything needed.  It was quiet and comfortable.  As per my request I received a wake-up call at 6:00am Friday, which gave me plenty of time to drive to City of Orange and have a leisurely breakfast before my appointment.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Close to everything, close to the 91fwy and the 5 fwy and shopping & Entertainment, knots Berry Farm just half a mile away, Buena Park Downtown very close to. Mcdonalds next door for some quick breakfast. great Location
Manager Response: We appreciate your review. So glad you found our location convenient to Disneyland and to the freeways with easy access to go everywhere in the  Orange County areas.

Summary: This hotel is conveniently located near Disney as well as shopping and entertainment in the Buena Park area. This is an off brand motel so don't expect a luxury stay. The rooms are spacious and clean, working AC/heat, coffee in the lobby and free parking. The staff is nice and I would recommend staying here to any seasoned traveler. If you are looking for luxury or are a first time traveler, I wouldn't recommend.

Summary: We went there with my family and GC the front desk was very friendly and accommodating.The room was clean and the place is very close to everything.The wifi is good and the parking area is very spacious.The housekeeping staffs did a very good job.

Summary: Hotel is in a great location,close to Knotts berry farm and Disney. Lots of places to eat and only minutes walk from the hotel.Hotel is clean and comfortable and great value for the money. Just on the north side a couple blocks at Knott's and Orangethorpe.  Very quiet and peaceful, staff checked us in quickly and cheerfully.  We were on the 3rd floor and being a Saturday night I think they were fully booked but it was still peacefully quiet.  We had 2 queen beds (nice mattresses) and a mini frig that really kept things Cold- not one of those mini frigs that just cool, this one was great.  Ice machine by the elevator. Manager Response: Thank you for reviewing your recent stay at Good Nite Inn - Buena Park. Summary: I had a good experience checking in.  The lady was very helpful.  She chatted and was very entertaining.  Although it was busy, she was able to do all tasks and at the same time tried to do her customer service.  Room was good but the room could have used more towels.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time and review your recent stay with us and the detailed account of your experience with our front desk staff. We truly appreciate your feedback and hope to see you on a future visit.

Summary: You definitely get what you paid for. Perfect for the price. A great place to stay after a long day at Disneyland for Knotts Berry Farm. Doesn't have breakfast like the website mentioned, however, there was a McDonald's and another breakfast place practically in the parking lot. The bed wasn't the most comfy, but again, you get what you paid for. The staff was extremely helpful and friendly. Would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing this wonderful review and recommending our hotel. Summary: The ratings were high when I was initially looking for a hotel, and it was close to the location I was going to. The staff was very friendly, but the rooms were so old and run-down. We both felt gross even after using their shower. The wall paper was peeling off the walls, the bathtub/shower siding was coming off the wall, the caulking was peeling off, the shower head was broke, and the sink faucet was also broke. There was even a hotel party a few doors down from our room. Just overall a run-down, old, very uncomfortable rooms. The price they charge is very high for the standards of the room.
Manager Response: Please accept our apologies for the unpleasant experience you had with us. I will let our housekeeping and maintenance department know about the issues you mentioned to perfect those areas. We hope you will give us another opportunity to better serve you in the near future.

Summary: This was a perfect place to stay on a budget. Centrally located for all the fun places we went during our stay. Staff was wonderful and accommodating. We will return.

Summary Heading: I was impressed with how quiet the motel and the neighborhood was.
Summary: I had a good stay for three days. My room was without a fridge which was not too big a problem since they have an ice machine. I didn't notice this when I booked (if you use insulin be sure to check) The staff was friendly and there were no hassles with my reservation or payment details.

Summary: Stayed here with my girlfriend. Staff was very friendly and attentive. We loved the central location of the hotel, it was only 5 mins from two main freeways. Room was clean and fresh. Everyday it was cleaned and made up.

Summary: Very customer friendly and helpful, I would have to say that I think they should have microwave and fridge in each room, as we stood a few nights and my hubby is on medications that needed these services , that was the only thing that was a minus.

Summary: Checking in was easy, you were greeted with a smile and welcomed. The room was clean, bed comfy and had room to put your things. The only downside was the faucet was small so hard to wash your hands without making a mess. If you are looking for a nice basic hotel this one met our needs

Summary: Rooms were a little dingy but we always bring our own blankets and pillows, it was a great place to lay our heads, perfect location to freeway.  Centrally located from Disney, knotts berry farms. It was exactly what we expected!

Summary: Family of four (two adults, two kids) stayed here while going to Disneyland for a few days.  Booked this hotel specifically because of the price. Shampoo/soap was so small, one or maybe two people could use it before it ran out.    Sink is outside the bathroom, which is nice, so others can use the sink when someone is taking a shower.  WiFi is free, but you have to pay if you want faster WiFi, and the free only lets two devices sign in.  The paid lets 4.  The beds were very hard, firm, and uncomfortable.  We also had a room that faced one of the two main streets, and it was VERY noisy all night long!  Car noise was constant.

Summary: Stayed here 2 nights. It was a great hotel with friendly staff. They even printed my boarding passes for me. Very clean and spaciousness room. It was a safe neighborhood. Free parking. Close to Disney. Walking distance to fast food, restuarants and convenient store. Will stay here again.

Summary: Very clean. Nice employees. Great Customer Service. McDonald's is next door for a great breakfast. Black Bear Diner is on the corner. Convenient location to Knotts Berry Farm and Disneyland. I really enjoyed my two night stay.

Summary: This was a great stay for a trip to Disneyland.  It was not expecting much due to the cost of the rooms, but they were clean and not too shabby. Summary: I stayed at good nite inn to go to knott's scary farm. It was a great stay. Friendly staff great price. Rooms are clean. Location is great Paul place, Mc donalds, black bear dinner are within walking distance. I will go back again next year!!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: great out of town work room.
Summary: Not for the family stay here a week every few months pool side is the ghetto side where u can see prostitutes and cars coming and going most the night, other than cheap towels an stain tile in bathroom I will say they improved alot over the last 3 years beds seem new they also put new furniture and flat tvs they need a little more out of room amenities but hey I prefer Hampton Inn and suites when with the family, but this place is fine while I'm out here for work a week every couple months.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We take our guest comments very seriously and strive to provide the best guest experience at our property. We provide comfortable and friendly accommodations at a good value for all our guests and we are sorry we fell below your expectations in some areas. We will address and review these points  to provide the best customer service experience and I can assure you these issues will be addressed and rectified. We do hope you will give us a chance in the future to show you how great our hotel truly is.

Summary: I like staying at Good nite inn because the hotel is quiet and there is room for parking. It is in perfect distance for Knott's Berry farm and Disneyland. Great Customer service by the Front Desk. I recommend this hotel. Great place to stay at!!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Me and my three children stayed here one night for a visit to Knotts. Staff was friendly at the front desk. We got a room on the 3rd floor, two beds (not sure if they are queens or doubles), rooms are spacious and bathrooms are big compared to other economy places I've stayed at. Room was clean and our room had a fridge...there is also a flatscreen, ironing board and iron...ice downstairs along with microwaves, morning coffee, vending machines and there is a pool. I can honestly say I felt safe here. There is a $25 dollar hold, which is refunded. As far as dirty carpets I've always just told my kids to wear socks when we're in hotels but I honestly didn't notice a big problem with that. We didn't have any problems during our stay.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We had a horrific bed bug incident here. The staff was totally unapologetic and minimally helpful, and it took us months of fighting with corporate customer service to even get the cost of our stay refunded -- and they ultimately still refused to reimburse us for our clothes and other merchandise that were damaged as a result of having to be put through the dryer to kill the bed bugs (which was a couple hundred dollars at least). The whole saga wasted an entire day, ruined our vacation, and traumatized me to the point that I'm now extremely paranoid about hotels.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great Service Not So Great Hotel
Summary: First I want to say that the customer service here was exceptional and they were very accomodating. I found this out because I needed to switch rooms a couple times. The first room we got into was near the busy street, Orangethorpe, and I am a light sleeper so I asked that we be moved. When we got into our room it was at the back of the hotel near the pool so the setting was much nicer than the first room. I initially booked this hotel because it was a decent price and had pretty good ratings, but I won't stay here again because I just wasn't comfortable here. It was pretty dirty. The carpet was so dirty that my kids would get out of the shower and within 10 minutes their feet would be black on the bottom worse than if they were running outside. The hotel really needs to shampoo
Manager Response: none

Summary: I booked this hotel online unfortunately when I arrived they had a 25$ credit card hold I only had cash on me I payed for the room ahead of time and the attendant was very rude and told me to go to the bank and deposit 25 it was 10 o'clock when I arrived driving from San Diego with my husband and two small children in the car she was very rude and told me she couldn't book me into a room I payed for I ended up getting to a bank and when I finally got to my room it was dirty the towels were stained and it was dusty all over just the nastiest hotel I have ever stayed in do not stay here!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback on your recent stay at Good Nit Inn Buena Park. We apologize for any inconvenience that has cause dew to our credit card policies. All on line wholesaler web site has a hotel policies that mention about credit card requirement at check in even though reservation is prepaid. Again I apologize for the situation.

Summary Heading: Good Nite Inn is a winner
Summary: Stayed here for 2 nights while visiting my daughter who was at outpatient facility in Downey, Ca.  Room was clean, had two double beds, nice larger bathroom.  There was even a refrigerator in the room.  Hotel staff was very friendly and helpful (...my daughters bags didn't make it on the flight and had to be delivered to the hotel..).  I recommend this hotel to any family looking for good place to stay with kids while visiting the Anaheim area.

Summary: Our family was in town for a wedding/reunion and we stayed at the Good Nite Inn in Buena Park.  It's conveniently located for Knott's and Disneyland.  Everyone was happy with their rooms, they have great beds, good air conditioning, and great service from all of the staff.  Rooms were cleaned and linens changed every day.  The pool area was great too!!  The restaurants are in walking distance and have amazing food!  Will definately stay here again!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Room is very clean, but no microwave or mini fridge :( Bed is comfy, but no foam topper, grrr  Ac works great, water is hot and has tub/shower combo. Lots of parking and a swimming pool. Freeway access and diners close by, plus mickey dees, and a grocery store close by. Knotts is only a few miles away.

Summary Heading: Good Nite Inn at Buena Park
Summary: Great value for the location. Clean rooms and courteous staff. Rooms are very clean and the location is not far from most major theme parks. The pool is nice and not loud as other hotels in the area. There is an amazing diner with in walking distance... they serve a great breakfast with big portions.

Summary: Great room, comfortable beds, friendly office staff. Will come back to this location again. Freeway access to Disney land was so convenient restaurants in walking distance. Clean facility overall. Family friendly.

Summary Heading: Very good value and close to Disneyland
Summary: We needed a place to stay for a night since we already booked in another place with some friends closer to Disney. Parking is free, they didn't charge us for wifi and there was morning coffee. It is not fancy but they provided all the basics. The place feels safe and service is great.

Summary: Top notch! Excellent staff! Beautiful grounds! Great prices, close to Disneyland!  I will be staying here again!  I have traveled here the past it's my favorite place to stay when in California! Thank you!

Summary: We stayed here as part of a SoCal trip.  The room was a good size.  We had two queen beds and there was still room to fit around the beds.  Near several restaurants and very near fast food for a quick breakfast before heading to Knotts Berry Farm.  Front desk staff was very nice.  I would stay here again.

Summary: Good Nite Inn in Buena Park provides the best in customer service, affordable rates, and is located close to every necessary venue.  They are always readily available to provide for the needs of its customers and offer friendly advice concerning amenities, directions, or just simply listening. It is by far the BEST economical choice!!! :)

Summary: My visit was very pleasant. Very clean hotel, bathroom was spotless, nice area and the service was amazing. The staff, especially the supervisor, truly went up and beyond to help me. I  would  definitely recommend this hotel to anyone. We will be back :)

Summary: This was our second time staying here.  They now have free wifi.  Staff is friendly.  The room was good.  The bed was comfortable.  The bathroom is out of date.  We love that it is close to Knott's Berry and it is nice to have McDonalds across the parking lot.

Summary: Room is clean and comfortable, staffs are nice, and the location is perfect: it located between Disneyland and Hollywood, so you can save gas to stay at the middle. I had a good time there. Worth it the money.

Summary: We stayed overnight in this hotel during our road trip. Excellent hotel I must stay. Very nice and clean rooms. Checked in late night. The front desk rep was quick and cooperative. The Manager also helped us in the morning for printing our flight tickets. Especially recommend for families.

Summary: Got a Room here to stay because I was going to Knotts and a baseball game the next day! I had two queen beds in the room. The beds were kinda hard and I had to ask for more pillows, they were kinda flat. TV channels are ok in the room.  The staff here was really nice though during check in and out. Really friendly and welcoming unlike some other places that don't care. So I really appreciated that. The rooms were clean & slept good. It was quiet in the area. Morning time was kinda noisy and check out lady came really early knocking on the door before check out but told her we were still sleeping and she didn't come back to bug us. Overall it's a lot better then other places around for the price. Will be back again when in area :)

Summary: If you are use to only staying in 4 star hotels with $200/night rates this is not for you. But if you're like me and refuse to pay more than $100/night for a safe bed and shower, I recommend the Good Nite Inn Buena Park. The owner/manager responded personally to a concern I had about my reservation prior to our stay, made a special note to get us one of the quietest rooms, gave me his cell phone number with an invitation to contact him if needed and followed up by email after our departure.

Summary Heading: The party  goes on , and On , and ON

Summary: I would like to say that's a continental breakfast in the morning for this hotel is really well put together. I live in Buena Park and need some times to get away from the house and I stay here the only thing I would say is they should make more room deals for the locals. If you are visiting Buena park that would be a good place to stay the Holiday Inn and other hotels are way overpriced

Summary: Everything about our last stay was what anyone would expect from a much more expensive property. The check in with my reservation went perfectly. Friendly front desk staff members. The support staff we met very friendly, and helpful.

Summary: We had a great time after the tour that you can go back to the hotel and feel the comfort. The bed was relaxing; during our two days of stay, we were provided a fridge to stay cool and have cold drinks, I always stayed there every time at least three times a year. Thanks!

Summary: Do not miss eating at Paula Place on the corner of Knott and Orngethorpe right next to the horel. Breakfast bt 10 is crazy good and have a variety from mexican, sandwiches, and salads for under 10 bucks.

Summary: Went to Disneyland and stayed here. Great price, great customer service. The rooms are pretty average but only slept there. They prices were fantastic! The location was close to Disneyland. If you are looking for a great price to stay in Aneheim this is a great place for the price.

Summary: My daughter has a 3day event at Anaheim Convention Center and I couldn't find one close to it.Well this place is a nice and pleasant place to stay.The receptionist at the front desk Ricky,GC and Maria were friendly and accommodating,even  Cathy and Claudia (not sure if this is her name)  from housekeeping.Ricky has to call me twice to follow up on my case why I was charge with WIFI when in fact it was free.Smart City WIFI Service charged me for 2 days 23rd and 24th.The only thing I could ask for is, it could be better if the room has a small refrigerator and a microwave.My warmest thanks to the staff

Summary: We have family close by and stay here a few times during the year. The room is comfortable, pool is clean and the location is great. They do not offer breakfast but there are many place to eat.  We will stay again.

Summary Heading: small hotel chain made a great impression !
Summary: Well this place is a nice and pleasant place to stay when visiting knotts Berry Farm or Disneyland or just when visiting the area..... it is an older property and it doesn't provide a continental breakfast but its clean and the workers are friendly and accommodating and its right next door to a mcdonalds as well as Pauls probably the best selection of food you can ask for and the portions are huge for the price so you can always expect to have left overs and good nite inn has microwaves in the lobby and the upstairs 3rd floor rooms have refridgerators so its very convenient and the hotel provides morning coffee , but my husband usually goes and gets me a coffee the night before at mickey dee's and he just warms it up in the morning for me.  This hotel isn't for the nitpickers

Summary Heading: Great stay and will not break the bank to stay
Summary: Good Nite Inn is classified as a 2 star hotel.  It meets those requirements, and in my opinion exceeds them in many areas.  It is a property where a family who wants to go Knott Berry farm will not have to break the bank for a nights rest.  The staff at the hotel, from the house keeping to the front desk, maintenance and all the other members of the team are great.  I would advise if you want a $100 plus hotel, they are up the road, if you want a hotel to enjoy the pool, and have a good nights sleep stay here.  There is coffee in the lobby till 12:00pm everyday and a microwave in the lobby.  Plenty of free parking, internet is $3.95 per day per device.  The only thing I would ask the management of good night inn, take a look at improving you booking site, it is not the most

Summary: We paid $120. for a room with 2 queen beds. $75. would have been a fair price for a 2 star but we had a last minute booking on hotels.com so, can't really complain. Summary: Seeking a basic place with a good proximity to Disneyland, I found Good Nite Inn on Orangethorpe Avenue in Buena Park near Knott's Berry Farm, and it proved to be the perfect property to meet our needs, and a remarkable value for the dollar.  If you are looking for clean, well-located lodging in the Disneyland and Knott's Berry Farm vicinity, I feel, as a former hospitality manager myself, that Good Nite Inn is an excellent way for you to go.

Summary Heading: You get what you pay for
Summary: We stayed in this hotel for one night after our flight into LAX, the place was about 30min away with no traffic.   Pros Even though we arrived after hours, there was an attendant at the desk to check us in, which was nice.  Check out was easy and seamless.  Cons Our room was really muggy (although the AC did help remedy that). The floor felt damp, there was water damage all over the walls, and the carpet was filthy with dark stains. The shower head had horrible pressure and the towels were extremely scratchy. In the morning I could hear the upstairs neighbors walking around.  Overall, the most important part was that I did get a good nights sleep, which is all I could ask for the price I paid.

Summary: My wife and I like everything super clean so this wasn't the cleanest place around. But wasn't bad for the price we paid. The best part is the location of this motel. Super easy to go anywhere from this location.

Summary: What a great place! No it is not the Ritz but for the awesome price it is a great place to lay your head. Went out there with my girls and booked this motel since it was close to Disneyland and right off the freeway. Was nice and clean. I need to give a shout out to the night clerk G.C. who was very friendly and extremely helpful when we decided to extend our stay a couple of nights. They do not serve breakfast but we knew that when we booked. If you want there is a restaurant and a McDonald's right there in the parking lot. You can also order in room service that has wonderful options and is greatly priced. If needed we will definitely be staying here again.

Its location is next to McDonalds, Paul's Place (great food selections) and Black Bear Diner so all food choices are within walking distance. It is truly a good value for what you get!

We had a little problem with our door not closing properly but when I called that night, the next morning it was fixed. Would be nice if there was a fridge in the room. Summary Heading: great place to stay, clean and friendly staff
