Summary: I booked 3 nights via hotwire with a good price. The room was clean. The staff were nice and helpful mostly.  My wife didn't get a good sleep the first night due to the guest upstairs. We asked for a room change next day and they were willing to help. The 3rd floor room was equipped with 2 Queen beds and small refrigerator. (Originally, we booked a King bed room.)  The swimming pool was properly maintained. I saw a pool maintenance contractor worked on it. Coffee and tea were offered only in the morning. There is $3.95 internet access fee for 24 hours/device.  The only unpleasant experience was the lady (G.C.) who handled our check-in. She was not so willing to help us. Except this, mostly service was great!
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and for sharing about your experience. We truly appreciate the feedback about your experience as we are continuously seeking ways to improve our service and product to bring the best value to our guest.

Summary Heading: Yes check it out great place great price!
Summary: I was very impressed with the management KP so concerned about meeting all are needs. The rooms were clean and large at a great price! We were treated very well. One of us  lost a wallet and the staff went above and beyond to help. We needed downstairs rooms and they worked hard to find them. The beds, pillows and tv were great and it was close to everything!!
Manager Response: How kind of you to take the time and share your experience with the hotel and TripAdvisor as well. We are very pleased to see that you had a great time during your recent stay. We hope we can duplicate the same experience on your return stay.

Summary: It is old, outdated and dirty.  It is cheaper than most but the pictures posted does not come close to the actual room.  Anyone can come up to your room as there no security to access to get to the rooms.
Manager Response: Guest satisfaction is very important to us, we‚Äôre sorry to hear your stay was not a pleasant one. All guest comments are important in our constant strive to bring the best value and service to our guest. Thank you for sharing your experience and for being our guest.

Summary Heading: you get what you pay for.
Summary: Our room was extremely stuffy. There was not a vent in the bathroom and the window wasn't fitted to open at all. Not even a crack. I know that's for safety reasons but the room was almost unbearable. We bought an air freshener to help some. The beds are cheap and out dated. I don't think anyone slept well. I think some renovations would do this hotel a world of good. Great location from Disneyland and Knotts. We've stayed here many times before, but I'm afraid this was our last stay. It seems to have gotten worse over the years.
Manager Response: We're so sorry your stay was not an enjoyable one, this is definitely not the experience we want any of our guest to have. We appreciate your feedback, we're constantly working to improve our product and service and guest comments assist us in our efforts. Again, our sincerest apologies.

Summary: This motel beats them all! And the fact the price is less ... to FAR less than other motels that can't even compare to how nice this place is ... is just icing on the cake! The rooms are LARGE, they have flat screens, They have ironing boards. It's quiet for being so close to a freeway! The beds are new, and COMFORTABLE!!  The bathrooms are CLEAN CLEAN CLEAN, and have cheery wallpaper!! They have an elevator which helps tremendously!! There's a McDonald's in the parking lot within walking distance ... the front desk staff is courteous and NICE!!  Very very pleasant place to stay!! I would HIGHLY recommend Good Nite to anyone!!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post about your stay at Good Nite Inn. We are happy to hear that the room was up to our rigorous cleanliness standards and you had a great stay and will be our guest, again, the next time you're in our area. :)

Summary: The staff was really friendly and helpful. Property is in good condition and the rooms are clean. They even have a pool!. Hotel is really close to knotts berry farm and not too far from Disneyland.Can't beat the price and location. We will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: So pleased to hear your stay was a comfortable one and that you found it to be a great value. Guest satisfaction is so important to us, we share guest comments with all of our team so they can see the positive impact they‚Äôve had on a guests stay. We look forward to see you soon.

Summary Heading: Good and not too expensive rooms.Friendly staff and excellent hotel
Summary: This was a good and not too expensive hotel. It was a good  place to stay and I loved it. The Staff is very friendly and get room service. It  is close to malls and restaurants in Buena park and lots of good  places to eat. I went for a family reunion and it was a good choice for our family.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review! We are so pleased you enjoyed not only our services , but our convenient location near all restaurant and mall in Buena Park. We look forward to see you again when you visit Buena Park.

Summary: our hotel albeit cheap was exceptional grounds very well cared for. staff was very friendly, area was very quiet.room was a bit outdated but we were only there to shower and sleep and the shower had good pressure and hot although was always getting attacked by the shower curtain. the room seem very clean and we slept awesome in the beds albeit we were very worn out at the end of every day we were there.we needed special accomadations which we asked for on our reservation and they were met. overall good motel to stay at. the only downfall was no free wifi.
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback, we‚Äôre pleased to know you found it to be clean and quiet, and we hope you got some good rest. Thank you for taking the time to share your experience, we hope to see you, again, the next time you‚Äôre in the Buena Park area. Warm regards.

Summary: This place is located 5MIN away from knotts berry farms, and is around the corner form places to eat and stores to shop(target, Walmart, fresh & easy) Heck there is a McDonalds  in the same parking lot. If you get directions to the nearest fresh & easy, you'll go down a road that has just about everything =) The nearest beach was huntington beach (30min) & if you wanted to explore Chinatown and LA like we did it's about an hour way. Anyway not to the hotel.  Pros: Location, Mini fridge in all 3rd floor rooms, free parking, friendly staff. (all but one) Maria was amazing as well as C.G? G.C? I can't recall the exact name. When problem with the beds came up they let me check out other rooms to find one that worked for us =)   Cons: Beds are a hit or miss, the first two nights we
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind comments. We'll pass them along to our team. We thank you for allowing us to be a part of your extended vacation.

Summary: Over the last few years we have stayed here for over 30 nights.  And we keep coming back.  Its price is unbeatable.  And the few times we have tried others near in price they have been dirty and disgusting.  Good Nite inn is always clean, friendly, and a great experiance.  Being Disney Annual passholders we visit often and want to save money and get to the park fast.  Its location is super easy to get to and from the park.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your nice words! We‚Äôre so happy your stays have been enjoyable and that you‚Äôve noticed the service and quality we provide at lower price then other hotel in the area.  We‚Äôve been making in an effort to bring even more comfort and satisfaction to our guests. We look forward to seeing you, again, the next time you‚Äôre in town. Once again thank you for being our loyal guest.

Summary: I have stayed here many times and always enjoyed our stay with them. The only down side to this trip was the towel rack kept falling off when you tried to take the towel off. They were pleasant when we checked in and upon check out, the receptionist remembered who I was without seeing who I was! This was a most pleasant stay and recommend the location to all my friends/family!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. We greatly appreciate your being our guest when you‚Äôre in town for business and for giving us the kind recommendation. We‚Äôll see you, again, the next time when you visit  Buena Park. Warm regards.

Summary: We just needed a place to stay for one night as we were here to watch the L.A. Kings at Staples. We feel Buena Park is safer than staying right next to Staples so we booked this hotel based on the reviews. Overall the place is decent but nothing to write home about.  The beds were very hard and the pillows were so thin that even folding them didn't help, and the towels were small and thin, however, for the price point it's what you expect. A few of the reviews stated that it was noisy and smelled of weed, we didn't encounter any of that, in fact it was very quiet throughout the night.  The tub enclosure felt as if the wood below was rotting which is dangerous and we brought that to managements attention and they said they would check into right away.  There is a Black Bear Diner
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and for sharing about your experience. We really appreciate your choosing the Good Nite Inn for your stay on this trip and are pleased to hear that, overall, you had a nice stay while in our care. Warm regards!

Summary: All I can say is that this hotel is very convenient either for a family or  couple getaway or business stay. It's very clean and a friendly, the staff there are very helpful. They will take that that extra mile to help you on any questions you have in regards to what the area has to offer. Also it's a quite place which that counts a lot. I'm  definitely  staying here again. See you guys soon.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and for staying with us! We appreciate your choosing Good Nite Inn Buena Park and are delighted your stays with us have been convenient and  comfortable. We look forward to having you as our guest again soon! :)

Summary: Excellent service..Friendly Staff, Nice comfortable clean rooms reasonable prices..close to freeways...... very accommodating..Thank You to all the Housekeeping made our stay more even more pleasent...
Manager Response: Very happy to hear your stay with us was a comfortable one and that you found it to be a good value. Thank you for taking the time to share your experience and also to recognize  our housekeeping staff for giving great service. We hope you will be our guest again the next time you‚Äôre in the Buena Park...

Summary: Get Delicious Patty Melts @ Paul's Place... Have a Feast @ Medieval Times... or Grab Food in the Park @ Knott's Berry Farm...   I will be advising on this trip to wear sunscreen and always bring water to drink...  Above all this property has value for its bracket. Something I need when traveling frequently.
Manager Response: We‚Äôre so happy to hear your stay was an enjoyable one! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience, we hope you‚Äôll be our guest, again, the next time you visit Buena Park.

Summary: Spent an enjoyable 7 days at hotel with my 3 children.  The rooms were spacious with 2 queen beds (not doubles) and the staff was very friendly and accommodating.  The rooms are a bit dated but clean and our room appeared to have new carpeting which is nice with 3 kids.  You do have to pay for internet in your room but that seems reasonable considering the very reasonable room rates.  Also there are some great restaurants (Paul's Place) right next door and a grocery store (Stater Bro's) 4 blocks away.  The trip to Disney is less than 10 minutes away as there is a high occupancy vehicle (HOV) lane that takes you all the way to Disney (including a separate HOV exit to Disney Way!
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback and are glad you found the hotel convenient to the Anaheim/Orange County Attractions. We look forward to welcome you again at Good Nite Inn Buena Park.

Summary: very clean,staff were very pleasant & helpful. this was my 2nd time there i will stay here everytime in california !!!!keep up the good work,  Eating establishments in walking distance (great food ) fran from pennsylvania
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind comments; it is so appreciated when the investment made in the hotel is so acknowledged but even more so on the team's performance. We will look forward to welcoming you back to the Good Nite Inn Buena Park.

Summary Heading: Fantastic staff, great 2 star rooms with new beds, flat screens & furniture, nice pool.
Summary: Maria, Jeina, GC, Frank, Josh, Carlos are all very accommodating & always friendly. The room is dated, but they are busy updating furniture & beds & new flat screen tv's with 64 channels is nice. The pool area is nice & clean. This is the best reasonably priced 2 star hotel in LA & OC.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind comments; it is so appreciated when the investment made in the hotel is so acknowledged but even more so on the team's performance. We will look forward to welcoming you back to the Good Nite Inn Buena Park.

Summary: I couldn't expect for more. As you arrive you walk into this clean and wonderful hotel. The staff are awesome and friendly,  they always take that extra mile to try and help u in whatever you need. The thing I like about this hotel is that nothing is far restaurants, markets and theme parks are nearby.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for the compliments on the staff. It was great to see, you had a wonderful stay. We hope to see you here soon.

Summary: Maria at the front delete gracious and friendly.   Room is spacious and very clean.  Like being on the backside very quiet.  Exceptional value as extended stay.   Flat tv with plenty of channels.   Only thing would make it 100 percent if it had a fridge and microwave.   They do have microwave in lobby but that is a little inconvenient.   Otherwise would recommend to anyone!!!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review the Good Nite Inn Buena Park. We are so glad that you enjoyed your stay . We are happy to hear that the room was up to our rigorous cleanliness standards. Please come join us again for next trip in the area.

Summary Heading: Clean, quiet, & lots to do in the area
Summary: Found a great deal for an extended stay here.  Read several reviews and they were true. Staff helpful, and knowledgeable.  Maintenance always on top of 'issues', if any.  Rooms were clean, comfortable and secure.  Beds (now new) were comfortable and decor modern.  Wished there was a microwave in room, but there are two available in lobby when needed.  Privacy curtains would be nice, and 3rd floor rooms facing front of hotel get pretty warm in the afternoon.  A/C's probably need a tune up.  60 felt like.... more.  Free coffee until noon if needed, and a private pool when open.  There area is 5-10 minutes away from Knott's BF, and the Buena Park Mall area that offers a great variety of restaurants.  You NEED to hit Portillo's for a lunch, as it has always provided the best Italian
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to make a review of your recent stay and we do appreciate your kind comments and have passed them on to the team. We are proud of our team at the Good Nite Inn and do try to deliver great service. And like you said we conveniently located near good restaurant.Hope to see you soon.

Summary: Front desk was extremely helpful and nice. Room is decent clean. Morning coffee is complimentary, suggest including muffins, bagel or bread which are not a too costly items to throw in. We had issue with bathroom door and was repaired the very next morning. Will recommend or come back again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write your review of our property, your comments are very much valued. We really appreciate your comments regarding our customer service.  Our staff members take their roles very seriously and try, every day, to provide that quality customer service, that our guests expect.Thank you again, and we look forward to seeing you on your next trip to Good Nite Inn Buena Park, Orange County, California, soon! Best Regards,

Summary: Im a corporate business traveler. I stay at the Good Nite Inn  FREQUENTLY. Maria the reservationist, is always the most helpful when I need to extend my stays, or if Im in need of something she is who I go to. Today, I thought because of the holiday weekend I may need to check out of my room because I hadnt extended prior and the hotel is completely booked. She was able to help me out and found a way for me to stay. Maria, Thank you so much!
Manager Response: Thank you for continuing to stay at the Good Nite Inn - Buena Park. We are so proud to be your host hotel .  All of our associates work hard to ensure that you and all our other guests enjoy their stay at our hotel. I will pass your kind  comments to Maria. We look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: The staff was very helpful, and nice. We stayed three nights, and the 2nd night there our neighbors had a big dog that barked all night, as it's not a pet friendly hotel the staff took care of it as soon as it was brought to their attention. There was not a lot of bells and whistles, but for the price it was a perfect hotel. The diner next door, had awesome food for a great price! We will for sure be staying here again, it was clean and affordable!
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind comments which have been passed to all the team. We do try to offer an efficient but friendly service and are very proud of our hotel. We hope it won't be too long before we welcome you back to the Good Nite Inn -  Buena Park.

Summary Heading: G.C. and staff for a Great Good Nite!
Summary: I found Good Nite Inn in Buena Park on the web searching for a place to crash before taking my DRE (Department of Real Estate) Exam, it's located 10 mins. from DRE and I was treated like a King, had a great nights sleep, good studying time and great morning coffee. Thanks G.C. and every other employee who was so helpful. Also Check out Paul's Gourmet Fast Food next door...insanely good!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your recent experience. Your comments have been shared with our entire team including GC. They will serve to strengthen our ongoing commitment to offer exceptional customer service and clean and comfortable rooms at an affordable price. We are very happy to hear that you had a great night sleep.

Summary: This was our 8th year staying at the Buena Park Good Nite Inn. Convenient for the NAMM Trade show. Many attendees stay here.   I would give a 10 for value if possible!  And great Korean restaurant next door!  JC
Manager Response: Thank you so much for such a wonderful review! I'm thrilled to see that Maria made your stay at the Good Nite Inn Buena Park a memorable one! We sincerely hope that you will give us another opportunity to extend our hospitality. Your comments have been share with our entire team.

Summary: Stayed here for 5 nights, a bit dated but clean. Friendly staff and well located, close to theme parks. Free coffee available in the lobby every morning.Two good diners adjacent, and easy access to major freeways. I would certainly stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent experience here at the Good Nite Inn Buena Park. We were pleased to hear that your stay was a pleasant one. We are always working on improving our product and overall guest experience. Your comments have been shared with our entire team as they will serve to strengthen our ongoing commitment to offer exceptional customer service and clean and comfortable rooms at an affordable price.

Summary: Room was clean and in a quiet area. Front desk was helpful in every way and they have room service?! Who knew! I didn't use it but if I had extra money I would have. Location is great, it is on a main street therefore it is near quite a bit of restaurants. This is definitely my first choice when going to Disneyland or Knotts on a budget.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and for sharing your experience, we're so happy you had a great stay! We have a great team and we appreciate your stay at Good Nite Inn Buena Park. Warm Regards.

Summary: I love the staff there..very nice and very helpful..rooms are always clean and ready to be occupied..I love the front desk staff very nice..I recommend when making reservations on the ph or walking in ask for maria shes awesome I love her..I wont ask for anyone else besides maria..shes helpful nice and knows how to treat her customers :-) im very happy with all my stays..if maria isnt there I will come back when she is so remember ask for maria..
Manager Response: Thank you for being our repeated guest and for taking the time to share about your experience.   We‚Äôre delighted that you like our customer service and that Maria was able to make even better with her great service. Warm regards.

Summary: The room I stayed in was towards the street. I had a hard time sleeping because all the noise from the cars passing by in the street. Try to get a room that is inside more.   Overall, the room was decent for the price you  pay.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review! We appreciate the feedback. Sorry for the noise from passing by car. We will accommodate you in one of the inside room during your future visit  . We look forward to seeing you in the near future!

Summary: It was a very cheap hotel. Totally worth the money. It was well maintained. The housekeeping did a great job. If you are planning to visit Disneyland I would totally recommend this hotel as it is nearby. I wish they provided daily breakfast, but it didn't matter as there was a McDonals's nearby to grab breakfast.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. We are so happy to make your stay a good one. We are happy to be the best price in the Buena Park. We can not wait until you return to visit Disneyland and stay with us. We thank you for your time. Have a great day.

Summary: Clean and well maintained for budget  hotel i'm amazed, so close to knotts berry farm and disneyland. However the furniture was old but we got flat screen TV,  ac working good so far our stay here was great.
Manager Response: Thank You for sharing your most recent experience at our Good Nite Inn Buena Park. We are conveniently located near Knott's berry farm, And just a few miles  away from Disneyland. We hope to see you soon.

Summary: We were welcomed by a very helpful hotel clerk, who was able to get us non-smoking rooms on the third floor.  (Apparently hotwire automatically booked us in smoking rooms.)  The room was decent - a very good value for what we paid.  Housekeeping did a great job.  There are fast food and other restaurants within walking distance. It was a short drive to the Disney parks. I have booked this hotel for a future stay in March.  The only reason I gave 4 and not 5 rating, is the mattresses are a little too firm for me; but I still had a very good nights sleep.  Very quiet, can't hear anyone in nearby rooms - some road noise if you open a window. Coffee available downstairs in the mornings; bring your own hair dryer.  There is a charge for wifi, but I didn't need it.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review. I will definitely share  your comment with staff. Will look forward to seeing you soon.

Summary Heading: Cheap and chearful, no cheap and awesome!!
Summary: I booked into the hotel with no knowledge of it. I spent 11 of the best days ever here. The staff were so friendly and helpful, I needed an adaptor for my laptop, phone etc and was given without question. I was new to the area and was given loads of helpful information, taxi numbers directions etc. The room was cleaned every day. I cant praise the place high enough and will be going there again!!
Manager Response: Dear guest , thank you for your review. I am glad to hear that our staff was kind and helpful. I will also share your review with my staff and I look forward to seeing you on  your next visit.

Summary: I have been very happy on all my stays at this hotel..I love the customer service I like how I get fast room service..I would always recomend this hotel to Ppl.I've stay for more then a year and very happy with the location wouldn't change this hotel at all..great pricesüëç ask for maria when checking in she's awesome and has very great customer service..
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your recent experience. We are pleased to hear that we met your expectations and you enjoyed your overall stay with the facility and its surroundings. We hope to see you again real soon. I will share your kind words to my staff.

Summary Heading: You Get More Than You Pay For Here
Summary: This is a cheap hotel.  What do you expect at a cheap hotel?  Here you get more than expected.  Clean rooms, attentive staff, well maintained pool.  No breakfast but hot water all day so you can slip downstairs and make a cup-o-soup.  You can walk a few steps and you are at McDonalds, or two other places to eat.  I often travel on the cheap and experience the gamut, this is definitely a nicer cheap hotel.  Still a cheap hotel, but what do you expect for their prices?  Here you get a step up than you expect.
Manager Response: Hello, Thank you so much for taking the time in letting everyone know about your stay with us. We are happy to make your stay a good one and we will pass on your comments to our staff.

Summary Heading: Family Transition Made Easy By Goodnite Staff.
Summary: What can I say about this hotel and it's staff?  My family and I had to stay here due to moving issues. Upon our arrival I was greeted by GC and her comforting smile. I explained my situation to her and she told me not worry. Within a couple of days I met and conversed with Maria. I found her to be a beautiful person with a great professional attitude.....lookout corporate america! Housekeepers are great and they do a wonderful job keeping everything nice, neat and tidy. Even though their english is limited we still manage to have great communication as they are always smiling and happy. The maintenance staff are the busiest people in the world. Always working, but smiling and being friendly. The grounds are well kept and trash free. Let me not forget to mention Josh by name...a
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review! We are glad that my staff was able to make a great impression on you while you stayed with us. I will pass on your praising words to my staff. Thank you again.

Summary: I thought I would give it a shot because the rates were ridiculously cheap. If you are on a strict budget this may work for you but bring bleach wipes and be prepared to clean your bathroom.  Let me list the cons and pros.  I won't return!  1. Tons of hair crusted in bathroom drain. Luckily I travel with bleach wipes so I cleared it out. 2.  Floors in bathrooms not moped.  3.  Thin sheets with thin blanket. 4. Outside window had not been cleaned in a month and had grime looking outside. Also the window doesn't open at all. Not even a crack to let fresh air in. 5. Third floor room was located next to exit door and maintenance room. In asked for a quiet room.  6. Maids had long loud chats in front of my door each morning even though it had a do not disturb sign on it.  Also
Manager Response: Hello, Sorry for your experience with us. I will address it with our staff and see on how we can improve. I will review with them your comments. Thanks for letting us know.

Summary: Won't bore you with the nitty-gritty.  The hotel is OK.  It is older, but mostly clean.  Some major water spots on our ceiling and general dirt and dust you wouldn't find at nicer hotels...but, the beds are fine and the TV works.  A lot of wear in the bathroom and furnishings, but for the price...you get what you pay for.  No breakfast or even free internet...but, the hotel is located next to several places to eat and a store.  I'm not used to paying for internet...and that fact alone kinda defines a hotel in my eyes.  I would probably not return, but for budget travelers it works.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. We are sorry you room was not up to par. We  will replace carpets and furniture in all the rooms soon. We will also re-paint all the rooms. Thank you for letting us know and we will improve. Thank you.

Summary: I gave it a 2 for these pros:  1. It kept the drizzle off my head. 2. It was cheap. 3. The manager actually called me. 4. Friendly staff. 5. They offered shampoo, which usually does not happen in a motel.  I gave it a 2 for these cons:  1. You might as well sleep on a board. 2. The internet is slower than a cow on a freeway trying to get hit by a car. 3. The TV does not work. You get 1/2 the channels, and then they tell you it is Time Warner, and Time Warner Warner says their are no outages, so it must be the TV. 4. They charge for the cow on a freeway. 5. When I got home my whole house smelled like that place. I had to air out my suitcase, and wash all the clothes, that I did not even wear. (Non Smoking) 6. The blankets are about 2mm thick, and who wants them to not even cover
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is my fourth stay. Again very quiet, enjoyable stay. Rooms are clean. Sure there may be little stain on the floor or wallpaper, or other little imperfections, but overall the Hotel is good shape and the value high with the low rates. Book online at the Good Nite Inn Buena Park for the best rates. I had reserved online a 2 Queen Beds Non smoking room, and when checking in the employee said, "Queen Bed" room. Oops??? I booked 2 Queens on the third floor since those rooms have fridges. She politely gave us the room. Gotta wonder about the accuracy of their reservation system.  Parking is ample and free. There are spaces all around the property so you can park close to your room. There area few free Ice machines scattered around and Microwave in the lobby. We just hung the "Do
Manager Response: none

Summary: Can't beat the price of $45 per night so don't expect too much more than that. Furniture a bit old and worn but everything seemed clean. Stayed on the first floor and there is some traffic noise, but if you keep the wall fan going it isn't that bad. Stayed for several days. There is a McDonalds on the same lot as well as Paul's Place restaurant on the corner. The Buena Park PD must love that place since they seem to go there often. Consequently, the hotel is a fairly safe place to stay. I'd take the tradeoff for the old and tired for the less than $50 any day.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Was awake all night because of crack heads up all night in next room. Noisy traffic area. Did not like the room. Hard to find check in. Sliding door to bathroom. Didn't like fact that room was not in hall way and opened to the street. We made a reservation well in advance. When we got there they said you are lucky there is one room left.  Would not stay there again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Was In town specifically to Visit Knotts Berry Farm. The hotel is a small chain, and basic. Not SPOTLESS, yet not scummy. There is a fee $3.99 for Wi-Fi.  It could stand a re-decoration. However I ended up partying all night, so sleep did not occur. I can tell you there is plenty of parking, and is quiet at night. I have nothing abnormal to report. I paid $49 on my regular travel website.It's right in a "hub" of restaurants/businesses. Very near the crossing of the "91" and "5" fwys.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Excellent price & location.  Friendly, helpful staff.  But like they say, you do get what you pay for.  The entire hotel is on the dirtier side.  The beds were very uncomfortable (hard, old, evidence of bugs, etc.)  And the sliding door to our bathroom was very heavy & loud.  The location is worth mentioning twice.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I was not expecting luxury when booking this hotel. I have realistic expectations when booking a budget hotel. What I do expect is a clean room. I didn't expect hairballs in my sheets. I didn't expect random stray hairs in the restroom on the floor and in the sink. The hotel does provide a small refrigerator. The two redeeming qualities about this hotel were: Locations and check-in. If you are looking for a place that is close to Knott's, Wax Museum, etc. this is the place. GC checked us in and made us feel welcome and showed extremely friendly service.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The rooms were pretty decent. The price was great! Two queen beds, TV, and air conditioning. It served our purpose. We were there for a long weekend. Great location, close to Knott, and Disney. Will definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I've stayed here several time and the staff is awesome!!!.. I do not care to have my room clean everyday but when I do, housekeeping staff gets a thumbs up with me. the place is going through renovation I think?. They have upgraded the TVs..no longer do the have the fatbacks. One thing I do not agree with is the  smoking area... it is located at the front entrance, I think this is a bad place to have it. Overall "IT IS A GREAT PLACE TO STAY!!!"
Manager Response: none

Summary: My S/O and i always stay in Buena Park when we go to Dianeyland. This time the cheapest deal on Orbitz was the Good Nite Inn. We called ahead to let them know we we were going to be coming in early. They didnt have a room ready, instead of accommodating us they charged us a $5 upgrade fee for another room per night. It came with a mini fridge so thats ok. Despite the pictures online our room was pretty clean. The only major downside was there was no blow dryer in our room. The pool was nice but would have been nicer to have a hot tub too. I'd stay here again but only if it was the best deal.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great place to stay for Disneyland, Knott's Berry Farm, etc.
Summary: Make this your choice of lodging if you go to Disneyland  We all know that not all hotels in a franchise are the same. And we have liked the Good Nite Inns we've stayed at in several cities. But this one is hands down the best. We chose it for the price and location, both unbeatable (really really convenient for Disneyland), but we loved it for the amazing service provided by the management and the staff. The small things added up to a wonderful experience, and we're definitely going back next time!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your wonderful review of our property and staff. Rest assured I will definitely share your feedback with all employees. I am happy to see that we won you over with our customer service. Our staff really enjoys helping our guests and they love to provide an outstanding Guest Service Experience!! Most hotels have forgotten about the most important thing, the Guest!!!  I have gone through great lengths to instill in my staff that building great relationships with our customers really goes a long way.  I really felt that your review was rather genuine and from the heart.  We look forward to serving you again during your next visit to Southern California.

Summary Heading: it was a perfect and quite stay.
Summary: I recommend this hotel because the staff are nice and polite. The rooms are clean and affordable. The location is perfect, stores and restaurants are in walking distance. Your able to do family activities that are near by like knotts Berry farm, Disneyland, John's Incredible Pizza and the beach is just 20mins away.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your wonderful review of our property and staff. Rest assured I will definitely share your feedback with all employees. I am happy to see that we won you over with our customer service. Our staff really enjoys helping our guests and they love to provide an outstanding Guest Service Experience!!  I have to agree with you that are hotel is in the middle of just about everything including Knott's Berry Farm and Disneyland.  There are also several wonderful restaurants within walking distance. We look forward to serving you again during your next visit to beautiful Orange County.

Summary Heading: You get what you pay for.
Summary: Got this hotel last minute for 1 night because we didn't want to drive home. We stayed on the third floor which was very hot inside the hallway. When we got into our room the a/c unit had Cheerios left in it from previous guest. The carpet had stains all over it. There was mold around the window and the a/c unit would rattle horribly and the only way we could fix it was for my husband to hold it down. Which caused for a horrible night sleep. The only good thing about this hotel was the front desk clerk was very nice and we got a really good deal for the night.
Manager Response: I would like to start off by apologizing for some of the issues in which you experienced during your stay.  I was a bit surprised as your experience is definitely not consistent with what a guest is accustomed to while staying at our hotel.  I do understand that cheerios in the ac and dirty carpet is not acceptable and we have no excuse.  I would really like if you would give our property another chance during your next visit to Buena Park and I believe that you will be delightfully surprised.  I appreciate the honesty and we will use your experience  as a learning tool for my staff.

Summary: Stayed in room 234.  Room was too cold, so I turned on the heater, but the heater made a strong metallic stench, so I turned off the heater, and opened the door for a few minutes to warm up the room.  The bathroom sink did not have hot water.  The dirty shower curtain kept sticking to my body because it does not have magnets on the bottom of it.  The room was not worth the price I paid.
Manager Response: I am very sorry that you had a less than enjoyable stay at our property.  We at the Good Nite Inn of Buena Park pride ourselves on having clean, comfortable rooms at affordable prices.  In response to the heater, we have had a really long and hot summer where heat wasn't necessary, therefore the smell you experienced was a dust burn off due to inactivity.  We have been replacing shower curtains on a monthly basis so I do apologize that you had an older one that was in definite need of changing.  I do not want to make excuses, but I feel that it is important to explain why things were out of the norm for our property.  I do hope that you decide to visit us again during your next trip as your experience wasn't a true representation of our property.  We will definitely use your comments as a learning tool in order to better our property for new and existing customers.

Summary Heading: Excellent hotel, affordable and an excellent staff.
Summary: The goodnight inn is a affordable hotel with clean rooms they will meet your accommodations and Maria is really nice and can make checking in really easy as well as help with any accommodations. Check in is quick and easy with little to no hassle. The same goes for checking out of the hotel just leave the keys and your on your way. They always have rooms at reasonable prices, for rooms that for the most part are really tidy and clean. I recommend this hotel because of it's price and it's really close to major entertainment places such as knotts berry farm.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your wonderful review of our property and staff. Rest assured I will definitely share your feedback with all employees. I am happy to see that we won you over with our customer service. I am excited to see that you have recognized Maria as someone who provided you with an outstanding Guest Service Experience.  She is truly a valuable asset for us and she takes great pride in everything she does and represents the company well.  We look forward to serving you again during your next visit to Buena Park.

Summary: My girlfriend and I stayed here to go to Disneyland for our anniversary. The location was great for that. The first night was very bad. We were facing the highway and the people above us were very loud. The bed was very hard and the furnishings were very old and outdated. The room seemed clean enough. The service was fine. The outside looks very nice and no issue parking. Overall it works great if you're on a budget and just want very basic lodging at a cheap rate. Personally I would rather spend a little extra money to stay somewhere nicer. It's also close to some good restaurants as well!
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback in regards to your recent stay with us.  I would like to apologize for a few of the issues that you have brought to light in your review of our hotel.  We try to go above and beyond for every customer that stays with us.  We are not always able to live up to everyone's expectations, however we continue to strive for excellence.  We will definitely use your comments as a training tool to motivate our staff.  We hope to possibly retain your business and would gladly look forward to serving you during your next visit to Buena park.

Summary: Great place to stay, staff are very friendly and very quiet. :D My girlfriend and I stayed here over the weekend just to get away from work and have a nice romantic few days. Would definitely recommend it and I give kudos to G.C., she was very nice and very helpful with everything.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your wonderful review of our property and staff. Rest assured I will definitely share your feedback with all employees. I am happy to see that we won you over with our customer service. GC in particular is a pleasure to work with and she really enjoys helping our guests. We look forward to serving you again during your next visit to beautiful Orange County.

Summary: Recently stayed here for four nights (2 adults & 1 child) while taking my daughter to Disneyland & Universal Studios.  Very good value, I paid about $50 per night and saved enough to include Legoland tickets for my daughter.    The location is excellent, only about 10-15 minutes from Disneyland (Knott‚Äôs Berry Farm was only 5 mins away but it wasn‚Äôt part of our plan this time).  It‚Äôs near the freeway on and off ramps so we used it for a home base while we explored the LA / Orange County area.    We got a room with 2 queen beds on the non-smoking third floor.  The room had a small refrigerator and iron and ironing board but no hair dryer.  That wasn‚Äôt a problem cuz we brought our own hair dryer.  The AC worked very well. The room showed normal wear and tear but was clean and
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your in depth feedback of your stay with us.  I really enjoyed your comments regarding our staff and facilities.  We genuinely care about our guests and based on your review it was well noticed.  I believe that many people share your thoughts, however are reluctant to write about them.  Your comment about replacing the microwaves in the lobby was priceless.  I personally thought the other microwaves were rather tired and needed to be upgraded. We are grateful to have you as a guest and we look forward to serving you the next time you decide to visit Orange County.

Summary: Fast friendly check in. The rooms are clean. The pool is also nice and kept maintained. The location is quiet and a good area. Housekeeping is great, if you need anything else or extra supplies they will accommodate you in a timely manner.  .
Manager Response: Thank you Francis for your warm comments regarding your recent stay at our hotel.  It is always great to hear positive feedback from a guest that truly enjoyed their stay.  Our employees greatly appreciate your feedback and look forward to serving you again during your next visit to Buena Park.

Summary: I am a repeat customer. Clean property with friendly service. More than satisfied. In the heart of the Knott's Berry Farm area with easy access to major freeways.Plenty of nearby restaurants and shopping. Minimal charge for wi-fi. Good connection.
Manager Response: Thank you very much Benjamin for your positive review of our property.  I will gladly share your comments with the entire staff as they enjoy positive feedback.  We pride ourselves on having clean, comfortable rooms at an affordable price.  We definitely look forward to greeting you during your next visit to Buena Park.

Summary: We stay here fairly regularly, just to have a night out to ourselves with no kids waking us up in the middle of the night or early in the morning!  Very friendly front desk staff and never had any complaints!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your positive review of our property.  I will gladly share your comments with the entire staff as they enjoy positive feedback.  We pride ourselves on having clean, comfortable rooms at an affordable price.  I am glad that you consider us your home away from home!!  We definitely look forward to greeting you during your next visit to Buena Park.

Summary Heading: Frequent stayer of Good Nite Inn
Summary: Let's put it this way, if you want to save money and save at the most basic hotel, this is it. I have been a very frequent stayer because I need a place to stay while working out of state.   You get what you pay for though, sometimes they forget to refill your shampoo or whatever for multiple nights, and the Wifi is painfully slow. Other than that, clean bed, nice and helpful front desk peeps. Oh, and don't forget to ask them for a blow dryer upon checking in.
Manager Response: Thank you very much James for your positive review of our property.  I will gladly share your comments with the entire staff as they enjoy positive feedback.  We pride ourselves on having clean, comfortable rooms at an affordable price.  Please feel free to stop by the desk anytime during your next stay to voice your concerns or opinions and we will gladly make sure that every stay is an enjoyable one.  We definitely look forward to greeting you during your next visit to Buena Park.

Summary: Very nice clerk at check in. Clean room. Safe area of town. Comfortable bed. Near to restaurants and shopping. Easy on off from freeway. Plenty of shady parking. Very close to knotts. Short drive to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you very much Victoria for your positive review of our property.  I will gladly share your comments with the entire staff as they enjoy positive feedback.  We pride ourselves on having clean, comfortable rooms at an affordable price.  I am pleased to know that you find our property safe and in close proximity to many Southern California attractions.  We definitely look forward to greeting you during your next visit to Buena Park.

Summary Heading: Extremely affordable and I was happy with my stay.
Summary: I was a little worried to choose a hotel based on just reviews plus you don't expect a lot from a really low priced hotel. But for the price this place was perfect. Quiet, clean and didn't feel unsafe. Lots of parking. Free wifi. Perfect to crash after a long day of shopping or disney. Definitely will come back. Great value!
Manager Response: Thank you very much Ms. Disneyfangirl for your positive review of our property.  I will gladly share your comments with the entire staff as they enjoy positive feedback.  We pride ourselves on having clean, comfortable rooms at an affordable price. I am happy that you enjoy our property and the ample parking and low price will keep you coming back. We definitely look forward to greeting you during your next visit to Buena Park.

Summary: I stay here 2-3 nites a week. The staff helpful and personable. They know what I prefer and do everything possible to accommodate me. The staff know me by name and go above and beyond to make me comfortable and are some of the most friendliest people I know. I have stayed at other motels in the area and have always returned here because if the staff.
Manager Response: Thank you very much BernieAngel for your positive review of our property.  I will gladly share your comments with the entire staff as they enjoy positive feedback.  We pride ourselves on having clean, comfortable rooms at an affordable price.  Its good to hear that you enjoy are friendly staff.  Your comments are very kind.  Please feel free to review our property anytime.  We definitely look forward to greeting you during your next visit to Buena Park.

Summary: My family has stayed at this property 8 different times, beginning in Oct. 2012.  Each visit has been what we expected, just a room with a bed and bathroom, television free Wi-Fi, etc. My last visit before July 3rd was in January of this year. My wife and I stayed on July 3rd and we were very disappointed and even felt like we were an imposition rather than guests. I had been in the lobby, speaking with the desk employees at least 3 different times when we arrived and through out the afternoon after we arrived, regarding locations of the closest market, etc.  I decided to take a brief swim in their appealing outdoor pool that is assessable through the lobby.  As we walked through the lobby, the desk clerk, whom we had interacted with before, asked "are you looking for something?
Manager Response: Thank you James for taking the time to write a review of our property.  I am sorry that you felt your stay was less than favorable.  Please let us know what we can do better in the future to improve and possibly retain your business.  Your concerns are a top priority of ours and rest assured they will not be overlooked.

Summary: My room was on the first floor and somewhat dated, but was clean and comfortable. I was pleasantly suprised that even the bathroom was clean and had fresh towels.  The staff was friendly and the hotel was located in a good spot. Had no problems getting around and slept well both nights I was there. I would certainly stay again.    Floradora 16
Manager Response: none

Summary: Sorry but they are rude and dirty. I could not get a good night rest because I was too uncomfortable. To say the least it is in a great location and close to everything. There were sketchy people walking around the area. I just didn't feel safe at all.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Very basic, but everything I needed
Summary: The room is very basic--few amenities and only coffee in the lobby in the morning.  However, the staff was kind and accommodating and the room was fine.  It was clean, comfortable, adequate and included a mini-fridge.  I didn't need anything else and the price was right.  The only problem was that every space in the parking lot was full when I arrived.  I asked the desk clerk about the parking situation and she said, "Yes, we're pretty close to 'full up' tonight."  Hmm...that means that when they are completely full, there aren't enough parking spaces.  This is of course a problem only for the few stragglers like me who arrive close to midnight.  If you arrive by early evening, you should be fine.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I recently stayed at the Good Nite inn to take my children to Knott's Berry Farm. We arrived there at 9am and the staff went out of there way to find us a clean room. Maria was very informative and really rolled out the red carpet for us!!! We received a room on the 1st floor near the pool and the kids were able to swim for about 3 hours before we left for the park. When we came back GC was able to find us 3 extra pillows and additional towels as we mistakenly used our room towels for the pool. Overall great stay and the price was ridiculously low! Best hotel in Buena Park.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Room smelled like something died in it. During the night a man kept banging on our door wanting me to open. I called front desk nothing was done. The sheet slipped off the corner of the bed exposing the mattress only to find about a foot of the mattress corner was soaked in old dried blood. I have stayed at older properties before, they can be old but they DO NOT have to be filthy. I hurried up and checked out early. The only response from the front desk agent was OH I will let the manager know. She didn't seemed surprised at all.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The beds in my room were so comfortable I had to stay two nights to avoid booking a hotel with less than decent beds. The price was low and easily affordable and as expected the hotel was dated, peeling wallpaper, tile in bathroom in need of repair but I knew for the price I paid I can't expect all the amenities. I got much more than expected in the quiet I received at night. The comfort of the beds was excellent and the cleanliness of the room was unmatched to even some hotels I pay twice the price at. I will definitely stay again. You can't expect a palace for the price of a shack so do keep that in mind. I look for a place to rest my head after a long day and this works perfectly and comfortably!
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed here 6 days for our spring break. The hotel was a great price. The room and bathroom were very spatious. Carpet was kinda stained and could of used a good vacuming but nothing major. Sheets and towels were clean and free from stains. We had a fridge which was a nice surprise, worked well. The room provided a iron, ironing board, hangers and rack for clothes and also a full body mirror which was nice. AC worked really well, kept the room cool during the 85/90 degree weather. The parking was good. Lots of trees so we had nice shade. The property was clean and freshly mowed. The properties elevator was very useful, didn't have to carry luggage up three flights of stairs. Very close to Knott's and good restaurants. Not too far from Disneyland. Staff was pleasant.
Manager Response: none

Summary: If you stay here you will be eaten alive by BED BUGGGGGGGGGGGGGSSSSSSS... I moved to two different rooms and got bitten in both... Please save your money and your health... The staff was ok but the rooms are dirty and unhealthy...
Manager Response: none

Summary: This place is fine if you understand what you are getting and are ok with that.  It is old and much of the place needs updated.  The carpet is a bit stained, but clean, it passes the white sock test.  The wallpaper is old and faded, has peeled a little in a couple spots and been glued back in place.  The wallpaper is not loose, just not in perfect shape.  The mattress is very hard and a little uncomfortable.  The walls seem a little thin, we can hear the people walking around upstairs and next door if they get a little loud.  The tv is a tube tv rather than high def flat screen.  The place does not smell and is very clean.  The neighborhood seems fine, does not seem like a high crime area, we have seen mothers walking from place to place with children, so it does not seem like a
Manager Response: none

Summary: I have been coming here for about 4 years from 1 to 4 times per month.  All the people that work here are the greatest. I deal with Maria the most and I can honestly say she is the GREATEST. This place has it all. People, location, next to restaurants, Price. Did I mention Maria?
Manager Response: none

Summary: Checking in was fine, parking was annoying! The rooms were roomy, but the beds were horrible! Shower head had no pressure and barely any hot water. Need I keep going when I just would not recommend it.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I choose this hotel for my wedding guests and I also spend 2 nights there with my weddingparty! I liked the rooms, but wished the windows would open! It was clean but when my parents spend 3 more nights about 2 weeks later the new room wasn't as good! The blinds were ripped and it smelled like smoke!
Manager Response: none

Summary: I have stayed at the Inn several times.  The staff is very friendly.  They are in close walking distance to several restaurants.  I'm always amazed at what I get for my bucks!  There is only one thing, the room windows do not open so that you can get some fresh air. Other than that, it is a great place to stay.
Manager Response: none

Summary: When we got to this motel we stood at the reception looking at all the awards thinking it must be better than it looks if they have all of these. We ended up waiting 20 minutes in the dingy reception as the receptionist was answering phone calls almost completely ignoring us. We finally got to our room to find out that the key didn't work so my husband went back to reception. 5 minutes later he returned with a key that worked. The room stank of cigarettes even though it was no smoking. Basically this hotel is very run down and not very clean. The location is good for Disney & knots and there are a lot of good restaurants nearby particularly the Indian round the corner. There are also a lot of other hotels around there though and if we come back to Disney we will go to one of
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: The only plus is the PRICE...
Summary: This was originally booked for 3 nights based on the incredibly low rate in combination with the 3.5+ star reviews and close proximity to Disneyland.  I didn't expect much but I did expect basic cleanliness and working facilities.  After arriving in our room, we first noticed the door didn't close properly.  The carpets were slightly stained and not clean in corners and near the furniture corners.  The whole room smelled of smoke in a NON-smoking room.  The bath faucet had a small leaky drip.  The wallpaper was coming off the wall partially.  The bathroom sliding door would jam whenever trying to open and close it. Upon turning around and looking at the door, we found a splatter of red spots on the top of the door! Seriously, how was this not seen or cleaned.  I notified the
Manager Response: none

Summary: This budget motel offers the bare bones minimum as far as amenities. I knew it was a budget motel so my expectations were not high at all, and I was not disappointed when I walked into my spartan room. I needed a fridge in the room, so I had to pay $20 extra for an "upgrade" which was actually an downgrade from a king size bed to two queen size beds. I also paid extra for the internet which I really did not mind, but it would have been nice to have free internet. Check in was a breeze, and the person checking me in was very efficient, professional, and friendly.   There is a McDonald's and a diner right across the way which was very convenient. Knott's Berry Farm is not anywhere within walking distance from the motel.  I spent 4 nights there and there was one day when my room
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Looks great from outside, inside not so much.
Summary: The building looks great from outside, promising. The inside is not great. Every single carpet I saw was old and very stained. The lobby is huge and under utilized. No continental breakfast only cheap coffee. Staff at front desk was brisk and not very friendly. My room was kind of clean, but again carpet is very stained and furniture was old and scuffed and broken in areas. Bathroom had tons of mold, horrible water pressure in the shower and the toilet pitched forward every time you sit down. And the toilet water kept running all the time. Outlets by the bed are close to the floor and behind the nightstand so it's a pain to plug anything in, like a cell phone charger. Beds are very hard and uncomfortable. Only nice amenity is the pool area, but the gate is stupid and hard to get
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Wireless internet costs money! Ceiling leaked from the bathroom above!
Summary: Even McDonalds offers their customers free wifi! I can't believe they charge nearly $4 per device for internet! I would not have shelled out the cash if I did not have important paperwork to do for work and school!  Also, I discovered a puddle of water in the bathroom the next morning having no idea how it got there! As I was cleaning it up, the room above me flushed their toilet and a flood of water came shooting out the vents! Grossed me out. Luckily, I only spent one night here. I would not recommend staying here.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Had a great stay at this hotel  Front desk very professional  Room clean  Bed good  No breakfast-but coffee in the lobby in the morning   Will stay here again  (disregard this-had to have 200 characters to post this-Dumb)
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Fair price, but could be cleaner
Summary: Stayed a couple nights with my wife and mother-in-law during May 2013 while visiting Disneyland. The location is excellent -- a short drive from the park, and easy to find from the interstate. The staff was very friendly, and the beds, linens, and blankets were all very clean. The beds were not the most comfortable, but not the worst either.  Unfortunately, the room had quite a few gross stains on the carpet; worse, there was evidence of black mold in the bathroom. There were some spots of mold in the shower, but it was the bathroom door that was the worst. The room also didn't smell so great.  I will say that for the price (especially compared to the inflated prices of all the other resorts/hotels in the area) it was a good value -- but I think they could pay better attention
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: I had a good night @ Good Nite
Summary: My entire stay superceeded my expectaions. The staff there are friendly and very helpful. From the minute we checked in we were welcomed with great hospitality. Check in clerk was fast and friendly, also making sure all out needs were met. The locaion was awesome. Didn't need to worry about food, Paul's Place and Mc Donalds were in walking distance. We always pick this place to stay. We discovered the Good Nite Inn around 2006, and we stay here at least once a year or have family here. We have stayed in the rooms on the 1st floor, 2nd floor, and 3rd floor. No matter what they are all great. swimming pool is clean and there are plenty of towels..Parking is great you can park your car where you can see it. Theres an elevator and stairs as well. Over all this place is great for my
Manager Response: none

Summary: Whenever possible I stay at a Good Nite Inn because I know the people who run it are normal and the accommodations will be clean.  This last stay was as expected.  The staff is friendly. Even the maintenance guy is nice.  Good location.  A good choice (again) on my part.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Nice nite at the Good Nite Inn
Summary: I have been staying here for the last 2 years during the week.  The crew is the best.   2 very professional managers and the employees are what makes this place nice.  They are always pleasant and very courteious.  Ask for something and they get it for you right away.  There is nothing extra fancy about the Inn, but you can always count on a clean room and a nice stay.  I have recommended this place to others that I work with, in case they might need a place for a nite or two.  I always get a nice room on the 3rd floor, usually one of the handicap rooms.  They are a little bigger and have a little different bathroom arrangement.  I like staying at the Inn.  They treat me right and I always look forward to arriving and checking in.  Since I work all day until late, I don't have a
Manager Response: none

Summary: When my friends and I visit buena park, we always stay at the good nite inn. And every time we go, I always request room 301 or 318, and they always give me either room. 301 is great because it is noticeably bigger than 318 and much bigger than the downstairs rooms, and if youre a smoker, it is right next to the staircase where you can smoke all you want. All of the 3rd floor rooms come with fridges. The TVs were old tube style but I was at least able to connect my PS3 and use the wifi to watch netflix. In both rooms, the A/C cooled down the room quick, the beds are comfy, the water pressure is very good, and they are always clean when I go. The staff is very friendly and attentive, and the price is not bad compared to the HoJo across the street, which I have stayed at before
Manager Response: none

Summary: This place is listyed as "Walking Distance" to Knotts Berry Farm. NOT!!! Unless you want to walk for 30 or more minutes. Don't bring any small children with ya! Cracked & peeling ceiling, wallpaper. The room was o.k. but the beds were as hard as a rock. Woke up each day with a back ache. Good price so I guess ya get what cha pay for!!! Plan on "Driving" to Knotts though...
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience at our property.  I am sorry that we did not measure up to your expectations, but your feedback is valuable to us as it points out areas where we can improve for future guests.  I have reviewed your comments and I am working with our website host to update the information about our proximity to Knott‚Äôs.  We will be changing the verbiage to ‚Äúminutes from Knott‚Äôs‚Äù because, as your point out, it would be a long walk.  We are currently reviewing our needs for 2014 and bedding is high on the list of priorities.  A good night‚Äôs rest is certainly a basic expectation and your experience is evidence that upgrades are needed.  We are always happy to hear from our guests and learn how we can improve our product and service for the future.  I hope in the future if your travels bring you to Buena Park, we have an opportunity to win you back.

Summary Heading: NOT a great place to stay
Summary: I friend and I stayed her for one night and boy am I glad it was only one. The place had been booked with a non-refundable price or we would have went elsewhere.   The place was pretty busy and while checking in we overheard that they were full. We were given our key and headed to our room. We had trouble getting in the door but didn't realize until coming back after dinner that it was because the top bracket that is suppose to be holding the door to the door frame was NOT attached to the door at all. What in the world were they thinking to still rent this room.   The room did seem fairly clean but there was mold on the walls and ceiling in the bathroom.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience at our property.  I am sorry that we did not measure up to your expectations, but your feedback is valuable to us as it points out areas where we can improve for future guests.  I have reviewed your comments and the condition that you reported about the door has been repaired and the door is functioning properly now.  We are always happy to hear from our guests and learn how we can improve our product and service for the future.  I hope in the future if your travels bring you to Buena Park, we have an opportunity to win you back.

Summary: This hotel is such a great value in the Knotts Berry Farm area.  We stayed at the Good Nite Inn for  4 nights (our longest stay with them so far).   As I mentioned in my other reviews, we have found the property a clean and safe option for the Buena Park area.  The bed in our room on the first floor was a bit firm for our taste, but the front desk happily provided a few extra pillows to compensate.  We will certainly stay here again when in the area.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: You get what you pay for
Summary: Small room, no clock, no blow dryer, no free Wi-Fi, no shampoo. Clean room, great bed and pillows, plenty of hot water for showers, great a/c, quiet, easy access to anywhere you want to spend the day.  Front desk was Very friendly and helpful.  We had a great night's sleep.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Good value for the money and location.
Summary: I experienced what others have said, regarding one staff member having to deal with many customers.  The rooms were simple and met our needs and for the money I can't complain.  There can tend to be people hanging outside the rooms smoking and possibly drinking as the evening wears on, but I didn't feel that the place was too bad.  Someone who was staying a while and had done so in this area before said that the area is ok, but not to stay any further south, as it starts to be more of a long beach party atmosphere.  Microwave in the lobby, hot water and or coffee machine, ice and vending machines as well.  No fridge in room. No continental breakfast, but a decent simple place to stay, a close enough drive to Disney and inexpensive.
Manager Response: none

Summary: My sister and I travel once a year to LA and Orange County, and typically choose Buena Park for its closeness to attractions as well as small-town feel. We stayed at the Good Nite Inn, because we had some good experiences with the San Diego one. The front desk was a little slow because there was only one person manning the counter and phones, but she was very cordial and nice. The other staff were very helpful in recommending places to eat and shop, and they were great at getting us to the beach since our directions were sketchy. The room was in good shape, the bed was super comfortable which came in handy after a long day of walking around Knott's Berry Farm. They say it is walking distance to the park, but it is better to drive because it is a couple blocks and you will be
Manager Response: none

Summary: Let's start by acknowledging the things that one must accept when coupled with the hotel's <$60 pricetag: no complimentary wifi, no breakfast, 80's decor, box T.V.'s with mostly Spanish channels, flat pillows, no counter space in the bathroom, and not a ton of square footage. There's the bad. But there's a lot of good here too.  We had booked a non-smoking room, and were pleasantly surprised to see (or more smell) we had gotten just that. The room itself, although small, had a nice large king bed and an absolutely huge bathroom. Both the main space and the bathroom were very clean, and, although the carpet had a few stains, it was obvious that it too was regularly cleaned. In terms of location, the hotel is right off the freeway and in perfect walking location of the strip (wax
Manager Response: none

Summary: This place absolutely sucks.    Upon checking in at 2:30am into what I thought was a nonsmoking room, I asked to be moved.  The smell of smoke was nasty, not to mention finding cigarette butts on the floor next to the bed.  at 3am I was moved to another room, only to be woken up at 8am and told that I needed to move because the room I was in was sold out and that they needed it.  I managed to be moved 3 times in the course of 6 hours!!! After a long day at Disney, while walking back to my room I caught a glimpse of my neighbors......should I say having fun.  I should also mention that the walls are paper thin, making it difficult to sleep  When I checked out I informed to staff of my dismay, and she said she would credit me back.  Needless to say this never happened!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience at our property.  I am sorry that we did not measure up to your expectations, but your feedback is valuable to us as it points out areas where we can improve for future guests.  I have reviewed your comments and I sincerely apologize for the poor service and cleanliness problems you reported.  We strive to provide positive service and a clean room for our guests and your comments illustrate that we have to double our efforts to improve and meet expectations.  Regarding the credit that you did not receive, if you contact me I will be happy to look into the matter and resolve it to your satisfaction.  We are always happy to hear from our guests and learn how we can improve our product and service for the future.  I hope in the future if your travels bring you to Buena Park, we have an opportunity to win you back.

Summary: We stayed here for one night  when visiting Knotts Berry Farm. You get what you pay for. The room was your standard room. I got a good nights sleep and the location to the park was good. I'd definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: My husband and I stayed there with our 2 year old daughter. I have no complaints about the hotel's cleanliness since you get what you pay for. It is pretty dirty, but my main concern was lack of security or in my case... breach of security. I checked in on a Saturday night, went to bed around 10 PM. Then around 11 PM, we were awaken by someone walking into our room. A very dangerous situation...I started screaming at the person and he ran out. Then the phone rang and it was the front desk calling to tell me that they had given my room to someone else by mistake. So they didn't bother to run after this man and tell him the mistake. Instead, they let him walk in on us sleeping and then called us. Horrible situation to be caught up in. And to top it all off... the next morning I
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience at our property.  I am sorry that we did not measure up to your expectations, but your feedback is valuable to us as it points out areas where we can improve for future guests.  I have reviewed your comments and I cannot apologize enough about the security issue you had.  Clearly we made a mistake, but this type of error is VERY distressing.   I have reviewed rooming and security procedures with all of our front desk personnel and emphasized that greater care and concern must be practiced.  I have also reviewed with the staff proper response to problems that are reported and to focus on an appropriate acknowledgement and resolution that satisfies the guest. We are always happy to hear from our guests and learn how we can improve our product and service for the future.  I hope in the future if your travels bring you to Buena Park, we have an opportunity to win you back.

Summary: Met up here with family for a trip to Disneyland and other sight seeing. The lady at the desk during check-in was so nice but... I needed a late check-in and when I called to let them know they wanted a time from me.I ended up extending again because I'm not familiar with the area and didn't know the Santa Monica pier was almost an hour away. In the end I checked in just fine. The room was average. Soap but no shampoo/cond, loud AC, not great beds. Found a motorized inflator for air mattress under bed. Left it there  for next lucky guy. Coffee only plus vending machines Iinstead of continental breakfast, but McDonalds next door. I was slightly worried about my car due to a few suspicious people around, but apparently no trouble.  Good location for knotts and Disneyland but
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Quiet no frills close to Knott's Berry Farm
Summary: This is a great value hotel to stay at if you're going to Knott's Berry Farm or other activities nearby. It's quiet with plenty of options to eat nearby. The rooms were clean and the staff was friendly. When we checked in, there were no ice machines working but the staff brought it up and had ice available by asking at the desk. They were also doing some construction (all that was noticeable was some recently painted walls/door jams and it didn't impact us whatsoever. Property is quiet and we had zero problems. Perfectly fine affordable alternative to other places nearby. Three stories with an elevator in addition to stairwells.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The check in staff was friendly.  The room a little dated, but nice sized room and bathroom.  The pool was closed.  We didn't do the breakfast offered here.  The price was great!  Very close to Knottsberry Farm.  If you are looking for a reasonably priced room close to attractions this is the place!  One of the down sides were you had to pay for wifi.
Manager Response: none

Summary: My review is not due to some unreasonable complaint, an expectation of an amenity that is beyond the price/star rating of the hotel, or a personality conflict with a random staff member.  It is due to the lack of BASIC services/product for what was paid.  I've stayed in just about all the major hotels that are rated 2-stars or higher by the major online room rental sellers in the Southbay, Cerritos, and North OC area.  This one is almost at the bottom of the list because of the following reasons:  FYI:  I stayed on the 3rd Floor twice.  When one books a hotel room, you want a clean room regardless of the condition of the furniture, the ability to have a hot shower resulting in cleanliness, and a bed in decent condition to wake up rested the following morning.  Unfortunately, I
Manager Response: none

Summary: I have been coming here at least once a week  for the last three years. The service is with a few exceptions always excellent. Maybe twice there has been a problem but it was handled promptly. I highly recommend this motel to anyone looking for good value
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is a hidden gem for those travelers heading to Disney or Knotts Berry Farm. Not a lot of amenities but clean and well located for those who do not spend much time in the hotel. I brought a group of 14 adolescents from Brazil and enjoyed our stay and especially the price.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great hotel at a Great Price
Summary: Nice clean room, floors were quiet at night, friendly staff.  There is no continental breakfast but places to eat nearby.  Coffee and tea are available in morning.  Shampoo is not in room but is provided at desk.  Good value.
Manager Response: none

Summary: we would have liked a smoking room, and having one where we could park our car directly in front of the building would have been nice. There was nothing provided for a continental breakfast. We thought there would be.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel was great for our family, we had 2 rooms for a week. The hotel was clean and the staff was very friendly. They were great at the front desk and Brenda the housekeeper was great. We had 3 kids in one room and she did a great job on both rooms each day. We will be back, the price of the room was super. On a side note Paul's which is located in the same parking lot has great food and it's very cheap. (in a good way)
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Our first room looked like a crime scene.
Summary: My husband and I stayed here with some friends, as it was very cheap and close to Knott's Berry Farm.  Well, we took one step into our room before wishing that we had spent more on a hotel.  Our room was dusty, dirty, and there was a huge yellow stain on the ceiling.  We NEVER go on vacations, so this was supposed to be a treat for us, but instead, I burst into tears and told my husband I would not stay in a room where I was afraid to touch anything.  We called the front desk, who graciously gave us another room.  Although this one did not look like a crime scene as the first one had, I still was resistant to touch anything in the room (as it was not the cleanest).  We spoke to our friends, who were disappointed in their room as well, and agreed to call around town to look for
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: THIS PLACE HAS GONE TO THE DOGS
