I checked in on a Friday afternoon and their best front desk clerk named Maria checked me in, and as usual she was great and extremely accomodating.  She gave me a room on the ground level, and as soon as I entered my room, I put the do not disturb sign so I can get the much needed rest.  A few minutes after I hear the loud banging on my door informing me that I needed to get out of my room because the carpet needed to be shampooed.  I found this ridiculous since they should not have sold this room if they wanted to shampoo the carpet.  I have never heard of full paying customers being told to
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is my 2nd time staying at this place... The reason I picked it was cause it was easter weekend and the fam bam were going to knotts berry farm. So this location is perfect. The pool was closed which was a downer! BLAH!... Had to throw the kid in the tub to make it worth its while.... The rooms are very basic... Bed, pillow, blanket... Another downer is that this joint does not serve breakfast! uuggh.....My room was on the 2nd floor and seemed quiet.. The place is allriggghhht......Nothing fancy here... If you just need a place to crash and cheap then get in on it...
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is the best Inn/motel I ever stayed. Every time I travel in LA, I choose Good Nite Inn. Their hotel room is clean, staffs are nice and the location is convenient. There have no reason why I don't choose Good Nite Inn for my trip. Also, their price are reasonable. They have several locations in LA. This is the third time I stay in Good Nite Inn. Definitely will stay in one of the other Good Nite Inn again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I can only speak for myself and on the basis of my experience, and without any intention to rebut or refute any previous comments and/or observations made by third parties.  Specifically stayed at Room 221 - located at the southeastern wing of the hotel - for two (2) weeks with my son, i.e., 17 February - 03 March 2013 (inclusive), and was more than satisfied with our accommodations. The staff, particularly those at the front/reception desk, was friendly, accommodating and service-oriented. Speaking of Room 221, there is nothing to be complained of. It was clean, odor-free and quiet. As to price, the same is out of the question. It's a real steal!!!  The hotel's proximity to the 91 Fwy., places of interest (Knotts Berry Farm, Medieval Times, Disneyland, etc.), as well as other
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Good price and location for Buena Park
Summary: Rooms were clean, quiet and fairly prices. Good value for money and close for public transport. Warning that LA buses are not very good though, and you do not feel very safe when travelling using the Metro Downtown bus. This bus going the other way is OK, traveling to Disneyland. A Taxi to Disneyland is about $30 + tip from here.   In the area, right next to McDonalds. TRY PAUL'S PLACE! Best burger on our american trip was here! Dennys is 10 Minutes walk away. And 30 Mins walk to Walmart and Mall area. We noticed not many people walk in this area. Perhaps not a very safe place to be walking at night.
Manager Response: none

Summary: 1 night stay in feb just a stop over and was the cheapest i could find for a friday night so i doubt it could be beat on price, the room was clean and average two beds, tv,air con and shower was very good but no hairdryer big let down for her. quick check in very quick indeed loads of place's to eat black angus,sizzlers,kfc,wendys, McDonald,pauls place and loads more. great location for all the parks.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This was my second stay. Again very pleasant. The rates are the lowest in the area and for your dollar, the quality of the rooms can't be beat. Wifi is $3.95 for a 24 hr period. There is a pay Internet Kiosk in the lobby as well if you don't have a portable device. For the cheapos, You can get free wifi at Mcdonalds next door. which is an easy walk (The parking lots are connected) .Buy a cheap cup of coffee and enjoy the free Wifi. For the ultra cheapos, The drive thru is open 24 hrs so you can park your car on the South side of the lot close to the doors and pick up Wifi there.   The Rooms on the 3rd floor have fridges. They have a few free ice machines scattered around the ends of the hallways and Lobby. Parking is plentiful and free, no need to worry about having to finding
Manager Response: none

Summary: The staff was not helpful at all! Needed to get ice for some drinks since the rooms do not come with a refrigerator. Both Ice machines did not work and when asked the staff ignored me and just watched as I had problems trying to get ice. The staff did not even know they had a second ice machine on their property! The rooms were filthy and the beds were really uncomfortable. The quests in other rooms were noisy all night long and each night the Police was called to their property for some type of disturbance. I made a mistake in booking this hotel for more than one night and will never go back becasuse of the way I was treated.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Awesome location but there were ROACHES!!!
Summary: They come up the drain but I didn't see any in the beds or else where. I'm blaming it on the Cali weather I think but just in case close everything up like put drain stoppers down and stuff. Super close to knotts berry farm and there is some good foods close by like elephant bar and a Korean restaurant.  For a cheap stay do it. The host guy was super nice and friendly when we checked in.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Good place, never a problem or complain, front desk was helpful, they offer wifi it was a good deal to get the place. Far enough from disneyland and there are a variety of food places nearby. Parking was easy, check-in was fast, Nothing too fancy but just right.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Seriously? This place is no longer as good as it once was. You could even say it's jumped the shark. It might still barely be a cut above the other economy motels in the area, but our last stay here was quite disappointing. Continental breakfast has also been cut out. The $4 a day WiFi is terrible. The bathroom door handle was broken, so we couldn't close it all the way. The bathroom sink stopper was stuck closed and I had to get under the sink to lift it up. I really hope that they can convince the new management that cutting back on services and skimping on maintenance might save a few bucks, but guest satisfaction plummets when they do.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay with us.  I am sorry to hear that your experience was unsatisfactory.  However, your feedback is very helpful in understanding where we need to make improvements to insure guest satisfaction.  Further to your comment regarding providing shampoo in the rooms, we are testing a pilot program limiting certain in room amenities.  We still have shampoo available at the desk, however we are testing this new initiative to rate our guest perceptions, and your feedback is certainly noted.  We have recently hired a new maintenance engineer and while he is getting up to speed, we have several on-going improvement projects in process and proposed over the coming months.  Recently we upgraded our in-room cable service to Time Warner including Showtime.  This is just an example of one of the initiatives that we have completed to upgrade and improve the guest experience at our property.  We value your feedback and I hope your next visit to our property exhibits some of the improvements we are constantly engaged in realizing.

Summary: Stay here about once a month. Always treated with respect.  I always get there early.  If room is not ready.  They tell me to go have lunch and they call me when its ready. For the price. Best place I have ever stayed. You have a customer for life.
Manager Response: We love to hear from our Raving Fans!  Thank you for your wonderful feedback.  We constantly strive to exceed expectations and create an experience that will make you our customer for life.  I am happy to hear that you are so highly satisfied with our property.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the future!

Summary: Best Economy Hotel in area. We have stayed here many times. Rooms are not luxury, but a cut above all other hotels in the class.  Room has always been clean and comfortable. Located in a nice area with great food from Paul's Place and convenient to McDonalds.  Nice area around the hotel with plenty of parking. Coffee in the morning, ironing board and iron in room and a bathtub.  Desk, chairs and sitting chair also in the room.   Front desk staff is efficient and knowledgeable.  See Faisal at the front desk for any problems or questions....he is the best in Customer Service business
Manager Response: Thank you for your positive feedback about your recent stay with us!  We strive to be the leading economy property in the area and you have done a great job detailing our quality, service, and amenities, thank you!  I will be sure to pass along your praise to Faisal; he is certainly a top associate and committed to making every guest stay memorable.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: It was unbelievable how another people rated top for this hotel. For me and my wife, it was really terrible night, fortunately only one night. When we entered to the room and tried to put our bags on the table, I saw the first roach but not only one nor only on the table but everywhere. And there are a lot of dust on the table, sofa and beds.  That was a nightmare for us.  I will never recommend this hotel to the viewers but recommend to pay a little more to stay in anothers.

Summary: the place was alright. one of the rooms smelled strongly like a smoking room, even though we asked for non smoking, but we queried it and quickly got us another room. we were just passing through, and for that it was perfectly sufficient.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback about your stay with us.  I am happy to hear that the property met your needs. Summary: Easy check in and check out. Staff was ok, neither negative or positive. Room was clean and very reasonably priced. Didn't get to use the pool. Located near restaurants and stores. Would stay here again
Manager Response: none

Summary: I have been to this hotel many times, and always stay here when I am in the area.  People like Faisal and Samantha have always been very kind to me and very helpful.   There is always someone available to assist you.  The hotel is close to the main attractions in Buena Park, and it is a great pleasure to stay here.   I would definitely return again and encourage others to do so.
Manager Response: Thank you for your glowing feedback about our property and staff. Summary Heading: Comfortable, safe, and quiet--perfect for a short stay
Summary: My husband and I chose the Buena Park Good Nite Inn because of its proximity to a trade show we were attending near Knott's Berry Farm.  Although there were hotels closer to the event, they were either much more expensive or had very poor reviews.  We were not disappointed with this property!  The staff was helpful, the room was clean, and there were plenty of restaurants (from fast food to sit-down) and a gas station within the same block.    Although we were not traveling with our cargo trailer for this trip, there would have been room for us to park--in fact a medium-large sized moving truck was parked in the lot for two of the nights we were there without any issues.  I found the property to be very clean and quiet and since I often have to travel without my husband, I would
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Definatly the best place to stay in orange county and i have stayed at hotels all over the world they should have 4 Stars
Summary: This the best hotel in OC 4stars very helpfull dont believe in bad reviews i have stayed at hotels in different countries which have alot stars and one had 5 diamonds too this stay was on top with them without the 3 digit price tag i would stay here again and would encourage everyone to pick Good Nite Inn Buena Park for their next visit to orange county
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Clean decent room for reasonable price
Summary: I  stayed here for leisure at times and the rooms are unbeatable in price.  They are clean and comfortable.  Staff is fast and efficient.  Its not a 4 star hotel or anything but will do for an overnight stay.  Did I mention its practically unbeatable in price compared to others within the price range!
Manager Response: none

Summary: The next time I am in this area, I will certainly stay here again!!  Friendly staff. And it was quiet. I would definitely recommend this hotel to my family and friends.  You can't beat the price either!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing Good Nite Inn.  I am happy to hear that you were very satisfied with your recent stay.  We are always ready to welcome you back.  Our friendly, knowledgeable and efficient staff are always at your service to make your experience memorable.  Kirt Christensen General Manager

Summary: check in quite prompt.The room is just basic.Free flow coffee ground floor near reception.Situated in rather quite neighborhood.just few steps away is a mexican restaurant or a short drive you can find a supermarket as well as chinese restaurant and laundry.very close to knotts berry farm and approximately 20minutes drive to Disneyland.I think for those who do not drive this is not an ideal stop for those heading to Disneyland
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing Good Nite Inn.  I appreciate your feedback and review of our property.  We are very conveniently located near restaurants and shopping in a quiet area of Buena Park.  Knott‚Äôs Berry Farm and Soak City are nearby and we are a short drive from Disneyland.  We are always looking to upgrade our product and service and your informative article as well as ratings allow us to identify areas we can add more value to our guests.  It is my hope that on future travels to Buena Park you will choose to stay with us again.  Kirt Christensen General Manager

Summary: The Good Nite in is a great value to go with. It is located in a good spot on orangethrope ave  clost to major attractions. The front desk night personel is great. Samantha is wonderful and very helpful and more than willing to do what it takes to give great customer service. I would recommend the Good Nite Inn to all my friends
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing Good Nite Inn.  It is always wonderful to hear about our fantastic staff!  I will be sure to pass on your kind comments to Samantha; she loves to hear from her guests!  It is our goal to exceed our guest‚Äôs expectations with great service and exceptional value in our city.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Kirt Christensen General Manager

Summary: It is a little run down when we first arrived but the room is clean the carpet is a little discolored which is gross but I wore sandals every time I touched the carpet.  The bathroom is actually really clean so that was a bonus. Also ask for a room with a fridge in the  3rd floor so you can store water bottles or even left overs there is no micro wave in the room but there is one in the lobby. I do recommend this motel as I was out most of the days and only came back at night to sleep but if you want to lounge in the motel then I recommend one that is a it nicer as it is not that nice other then to just sleep and do your activities during the day. Also the pool is really murky so we did not swim in the pool
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing Good Nite Inn.  I appreciate your straight-forward review of our property.  I am sorry to hear about your problems with the carpet; it is our goal to clean our carpets each week, I will be sure to share this feedback with our maintenance staff so we can focus on this area to improve for other guests.  Since your stay we have changed our pool service company and I am pleased to report that the pool is now sparkling clear, inviting and refreshing!   We strive to be the economy property of choice in Buena Park and your valuable feedback helps us improve the quality for all our guests.   Thank you again for your review and I hope to welcome you back in the future!    Kirt Christensen General Manager

Summary Heading: It' OK, not so bad, not so good.
Summary: After one week's 4-star hotel stay, my husband and  two kids had to go back to Canada( by the way, I'm a Chinese-Canadian), and I must stay for another week. So I chose Good Nite Inn because its price and location.   1. Staffs are nice and friendly. The front desk Maria is pretty and nice, her smile and voice impressed me. On the first day, I asked her to book a shuttle bus on next Monday. She called, then gave me a good deal: to John Wayne Airport, only $15.   2. Room is OK. My room is 106, I found  the sink a little bit leaking, so I put the bin under it. It's not a big deal, but still a problem. I told a staff, hope he could fix it later. There is no fridge in my room, and they said only the 3rd floor  which are "Standard 2 Queens Non-Smoking" rooms have. The price are almost

We will be upgrading our satellite television service to Time Warner as well as sprucing up the landscaping with tree trimming and new landscape design to enhance our property. Summary Heading: A Great Deal, Clean and good service
Summary: As a small resort owner with cottages in Key Largo (Florida Keys Ranked # 2 in my area), I know what it take to be a Good Hotel. For the very very reasonable price, Good Night inn Buena Park , CA. is a Good Deal Hotel. I stayed there wile on business by my self, they had Clean  2-star hotel rooms (over the course of my trip, I stayed in two), Nice Staff, clean Pool, food within walking distance + it is near the Buena Park Attractions for the family's . For the budget minded travelers coming to this area, book here then you can look around and compare for your self, you will see you have a deal.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing Good Nite Inn.  It was a pleasure having you as our guest during your recent trip to the area.  I enjoyed speaking with you about your property in Florida and hope I can visit you one day.  Thank you again for your kind words about our property, we strive to be the economy property of choice in Buena Park by offering great service and exceptional value to our guests.  When you travel to area again, I hope you choose to be our guest!  Kirt Christensen General Manager

Summary: I needed a room in a hurry and walked in on a Saturday afternoon with no reservation. Samantha saw I was having some type of trouble and helped me get into a room as quickly as possible. She was efficient and kind hearted, truly helping a stranger in a moment of need.    My room was clean, I felt safe walking to my car late at night and the swimming pool was nice. I felt the staff went beyond what they needed to in order to help me. When I have company from out of town, I plan to suggest they use this place. While the buildings and rooms may be showing their age slightly, the rooms I used were comfortable and the staff, especially Samantha, went out of their way to for me.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: You get EXACTLY what you pay for
Summary: I am traveling on a budget for work, so at $50 I took a chance on the Good Nite in Buena Park.  I saw it was rated higher than most BP properties.  My expectations were limited, so I was fairly happy to save the money and stay there.  All the things I can comment on would only go to show that this is indeed a 2-star property.  For example, the wear and tear on the rooms shows.  The TV is an older box style unit and is small, with poor picture quality and limited channels.  The towels have been there since the Industrial Revolution but were clean.  The air conditioner was on life support but cooled the room adequately.  You get the idea.  No frills at all, and exactly what a 2-star hotel is expected to be.  I wish there were a small fridge or microwave, but there wasn't.  My only
Manager Response: none

Summary: My family and I have been here before the Staff is very friendly and knowledgeable of surrounding areas. The rooms are clean and comfortable and the pool is nice too. It is very family friendly. I would reccemend this hotel to my family and friends needing somewhere to stay. If you stay stop in and say Hi to Samantha and new Manager Kurt they will make you feel welcomed.  Mathesons
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: ive stayed here 3 times..its just not the same
Summary: Nearly everytime ive visited California I've stayed in this hotel for at least some point during my trip. So this was my 3 or 4th stay and I have to say it was a bit disappointing. For the 30,40 and 50 rates at this hotel it may look like a bargain to some..but beware of what you are getting.  I checked into a king room this time (which was significantly smaller than the 2 queen room). My flight did arrive super early so letting me check in at 9-10am was fantastic. Although the first room I got checked into had dirty disgusting carpet that after a few minutes I just couldnt stand. So I asked to be moved to a room with cleaner carpet. I was moved into a room that had a bit cleaner carpet (still with obvious stains) but the AC in this unit had left water all over the floor by the

Summary: If you are a family or on a budget this is the place. Clean fairly big rooms. Restaurants close by. Internet is not free and no breakfast. Had plumbing problems and were very accommodating. Good neighborhood ,good Access. Fairly Close to Knotsberry and Disney. Pool. Some rooms can be a walk to carry bags, but they have a bell cart at office.

Summary Heading: Stayed for 4 days at amazing price
Summary: The hotel was surprisingly clean and comfy. The price was unbeatable. We stayed while my husband was going to a convention and have no complaints. The room was clean and there was a nice pool for the kids. Would definitely stay there again soon. I really was surprised at how nice this hotel was for the price.

Summary Heading: AC didn't work in middle of summer, found food under bed.

Most of the negative pictures on the property are posted by few guests who simply want to make their point by just capturing what they want others to see. However, in the process they have omitted many good things too.  I.e. we have a large parking lot and guest would capture one soda can and show it as if the entire parking lot was dirty.  Some guest would capture a small stain, etc make it enlarged and enhanced without showing the rest of the room.  We are not sure where some pictures were taken as they are too close to see even if that is one of our rooms.  Majority of our guests are happy with the facility and most of them if they find a defect would simply inform us so that we can correct it. We have very few guests who would take pictures as a bargaining tool to ask for comp nights and threaten to post pictures on-line if they don‚Äôt get what they asked for. We always do our best to fix any defects and maintain our facility in good condition.  This guest suggesting a another hotel in Disneyland area which charges twice as much as we do plus extra fees such as parking fees, etc.  We provide basic accommodations at affordable price and we are one of the best among comparable hotels.

Summary: We stayed here in early June 2011 for 5 Nights. Each night was $51 which is very reasonable when compared to the competition. This is not a luxury Inn but was clean and well maintained. There were a total of 5 people staying in one room (kids as well). They didn't have the "roller bed" or whatever they call it for the first 2 nights, so I had to share a bed with my brother-in-law, haha. But for the remaining nights, they gave us an extra bed on wheels.  They gave us extra soap, shampoo, and towels as requested since there were a few of us in the room. In the morning, they do offer muffins, juice, and coffee for the guests. We skipped out on that though and headed across the street to Hof's Hut for some amazing breakfast!!  If you're on a tight budget but still want something
Manager Response: Please accept our sincere thanks for taking time to submit the review. We are glad to hear that you had a great stay at our hotel. As you stated we are centrally located to major attractions and we do provide the best value in the area. I am happy to see that our staff did their best to accommodate your family. It is our goal is to make your experience a ‚Äúhome away from home" experience. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary Heading: Best value in the L.A. area
Summary: This hotel is clean, well-run, friendly, and by far the best value for the L.A. area. We came in June and paid just $43 for two beds, and came back in July (high season) and paid $65 for the same room. If you want to be near the beaches or closer to L.A.'s city center, expect to pay $80-100 more a night for the same quality hotel.  We initially booked it to be near Disneyland, but chose to come back on our return visit to L.A. even though we weren't going to revisit Disney. It was impossible to get a budget hotel near the beaches (Santa Monica, etc.), and the budget hotels in L.A. had mixed reviews. Some seemed to be in very dodgy areas. This hotel is in a very safe neighborhood and, again, is cheap, clean and friendly.  On both our visits we rented a car, which I recommend.
Manager Response: Please accept our sincere thanks for taking time to submit the review. Thank you for being such a loyal guest. We are excited to hear that you visited us twice already in just a short time. We do provide best value in the area and I am glad to hear the amount you saved by booking with us. It is true that most of the comparable hotels do charge higher rates. We are glad that we could offer best value in the area so you could enjoy more of your vacation. I will share your comments with my staff and it is great to hear that the employees went extra mile to make your stay more comfortable. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary Heading: I had a great time and will be back soon
Summary: I had a great stay at the Good Nite Inn. The staff was wonderful, even the cleaning people were all friendly. I must say that this is one of the better places I have stayed in any country that I had been to. Special kudos to Maria ,Angela ,Samantha and Adam who all made my stay a pleasant one. If I had to say anything that needed improving would be the type of Breakfast. I didnt take to the buns too well. I prefer eggs and toast. Well till the next time!  michael badal
Manager Response: Dear Michael, please accept our sincere thanks for taking time to submit the review. I am extremely happy to hear that staff did an outstanding job to make your stay a pleasant one. Thank you for mentioning the names of the employees who went above and beyond to make your stay comfortable. Your kind words will definitely motivate my staff even to do more to make our guests happy. We are excited to hear that you wanted to come back soon. We all look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: This was my second stay here in a couple years and I was happy with the room and the service again.  No complaints, it was clean and comfortable and the value is for what I paid is the best part.  I would not hesitate to stay here again.
Manager Response: Please accept our sincere thanks for taking time to submit the review. Thank you for being such a loyal guest. Our goal is always to make your experience a ‚Äúhome away from home‚Äù experience and we are glad we were able to accomplish that. We are excited to hear that you are planning another visit and looking forward to see you soon.

Summary: grreat hotel, amazing staff, comfy beds. great location
Manager Response: Please accept our sincere thanks for taking time to submit the review. Thank you for sharing your experience and in few words you showed what we are all about. We take pride in our product and our staff is always willing to go extra mile for our guests. We do provide all the basic amenities for affordable price and we are centrally located close to Knott‚Äôs, Disney, 5 and 91 freeways. Looking forward to seeing you soon.

Summary: The Hotel is clean and well kept up.  I had no functional issues with the room.  I stayed twice in the same month and had two different rooms.  Both of the rooms were in good shape.  The outside of the hotel had plenty of parking even when full for a long weekend.  Samantha was cheerful and very helpful with any questions that I had.  Excellent really.  Plenty of restaurants nearby.  Three within easy walking distance.  I would stay here again if I'm in the Orange/Fullerton/Anaheim area.
Manager Response: Please accept our sincere thanks for taking time to submit the review. We also want to thank you for being a loyal guest and using us twice this month. We really do value our guest loyalty and comments such as yours keep us motivated. Thank you for mentioning about Samantha who went above and beyond to make your stay comfortable. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: Rooms were clean great area close to everything staff is pleasent as well as helpfull.
Manager Response: Please accept our sincere thanks for sharing your great stay with us. We take pride in our product, staff and services.It is a great motivation for us to see plenty of satisfied guests such as you. We are centrally located in Orange County and this makes us an ideal and a convenient location to many of our guests.

Summary: I own a construction consulting company and travel constantly. The front desk staff remembers me, always greets me pleasantly, checks me in quickly and makes sure my room is ready. Maria (days) and Samantha (eves) are the super-stars at this property. The motel is the best value in the Buena Park area and I'll surely return.
Manager Response: Please accept our sincere thanks for taking time to submit the review. Thank you for being a loyal guest and for using our facility for your lodging needs frequently. We do have lots of corp /construction clients staying with us. We do understand the business needs and do our best to accommodate our business clients. We are aware running a business in these tough times are harder for everyone and we want to do our best that you don't have to worry about the lodging aspect. We want to make sure all your needs are promptly met and you and your employees have a worry free "home away from home"stay. Thank you for mentioning the names of the employees who went above and beyond to make your stay comfortable. Looking forward to seeing you soon.

Summary: We had 2 rooms and stayed here for 6 nights with my daughter and my son and his family while we visited the sights and Disneyland.  The place was nice and clean.  Quiet.  McDonalds was next door so it was convenient especially with a 4 year old and an 8 year old.  Dennys was a block down the street.  Close to shopping.  Short drive to Disneyland, Knotts Berry, Pirates Dinner, etc. and the price was way cheaper than those hotels on the Disney Block.  Housekeeper was wonderful.  Someone cleaning the sidewalks everyday.  Front desk receptionist (Sammy?) was wonderful and extrememly helpful when we checked in.  Handled some rude, demanding guests in front of us with much professionalism.  She helped us get big discounts to the Pirates Dinner.  The only negative thing about our
Manager Response: Please accept our sincere thanks for taking time to submit the review. We are excited to hear about your great vacation and your visits to Disney, Pirates, Knott‚Äôs, etc. I am pretty sure you and your family had a great time in the OC and we are happy to hear that you had a great stay with us. Thank you for noticing the lengths our employees go to make everyone's stay more comfortable even when they face with challenges. I am glad to hear how helpful the front desk agent was and able to get  you a big discount to pirate‚Äôs dinner.  I will look into the issue that you stated with one employee and make sure it will not happen again. Looking forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary Heading: Unfortunately, one of the worst hotels we've stayed at in California...
Summary: My fiance and I have stayed at a ton of hotels throughout California when I come up and visit him. Over my spring break from college, we decided to stay here so that we could go to Knott's Berry Farm.  The hotel itself was so dirty-looking and old. We requested a non-smoking room but got a room that had clearly been smoked in -- so we reeked of cigarettes for days. The bed was squeaky and uncomfortable. The air conditioning unit was busted. And the TV was a joke -- it must have been ten years old and had a very limited selection of channels!  The hotel was filled with annoying people -- mostly exhausted mothers and misbehaved children running around like wild monkeys! The free breakfast consisted of cheap juice, muffins, and doughnuts. When I got there, someone took the last
Manager Response: I would like to thank this guest for taking the time to post their comments. We really do value all guest feedback as it allows us to improve our operation to better suit the needs of our guests. I am extremely sorry to hear that you did not have a comfortable stay with us. I do understand the frustration you have and there may be few occasions where we could have done better. Knott's Berry Farm is about 1.3 miles from the property. We do have some guests who don't mind walking and some guests who do. I have advised the front desk staff to inform the guests the actual miles and let the guest decide if they want to walk to a certain place or attraction. I do understand a nice walk for someone may be a frustrating walk to another. However, we learn from these situations and correct ourselves as we go. If you are not satisfied with the room for whatever reason you could always move to a different room. If the room doesn't have a pleasant smell or if your AC is not working we could have gladly move you to a different room. However, calling this is the worst hotel, as you know, is a little farfetched. Orange County with many attractions such as Disney, Knott's etc. is a family friendly area, so does our hotel. We have lots of families with children visiting these attractions and calling the kids ‚Äúwild monkeys" is not something that most our guests and parents condone. We don't allow kids to run around and cause disturbance. We have lots of business/corp. clients staying with us and we always make sure all the guests can enjoy a relaxed environment. There may be occasions where you see an ‚Äúexhausted mother trying to control kids" and we should be more compassionate towards the mothers. Exhausted mothers are not annoying people. We charge a nominal fee of $ 3.95 for WI-FI and this service is provided by a leading WI-Fi company. We list what TV channels we have.  We provide breakfast from 6a.m. to 9.00 a.m. It is not served after 9.00 a.m. We advertise on our websites what we offer ,so that, our guests could make the right decision if what we are offering is what they are looking for. We still offer the best value in the area and most of our guests are satisfied with our amenities.

Summary: room was clean, Faisal and staff was very helpful and accomandating to our needs! great location. have already reserved for my next trip
Manager Response: Please accept our sincere thanks for taking time to submit the review. Thank you for being such a loyal guest and we are excited to hear that you will be visiting us soon. Thank you for mentioning the names of the employees who went above and beyond to make your stay comfortable.We look forward to seeing you soon.

Summary Heading: You get what you pay for-dirty rooms and no service
Summary: We (my fiance and I) took a trip to the grand canyon, Las Vegas and then to Disneyland over Spring Break.  We stayed at the Good Nite Inn in Buena Park for two nights at the end of April.   Upon check in we were put in room 329.  We walked in to find a huge dark stain on the ceiling, a toilet that hadn't been cleaned, windows that were covered (both panes) in crusty white stuff and an AC that hardly pumped out any air at all.  It was like a sauna in that place and you couldn't open the windows at all.  Though, you wouldn't want to touch them since the white stuff crumbled off on your fingertips.  The worst though was the floor.  There were stains everywhere and the desk area floor was covered in what looked like pickle relish. Gross!  Needless to say we barely sat things down
Manager Response: I would like to thank this guest for taking the time to post their comments. We really do value all guest feedback as it allows us to improve our operation to better suit the needs of our guests. I am extremely sorry to hear that you did not have a comfortable stay. This guest never spoke to the Management, but just assumed that management would not resolve the issues. We do understand sometimes a room that should be out of order due to a bad carpet or any other issue could be rented out accidently. We do apologize for these rare errors. However, guest was moved to a different room and there was no problem in the 2nd room. Guest is simply exaggerating the room condition and customer service. If all our rooms are the way this guest stated and if we don't take care of our guests we would not be having so many loyal guests. Guest is simply marketing for another hotel which is ranked much below to us with many bad reviews but often over-priced. I think our guests are wise enough to make the right decision and the subjective assumptions this guest made do not shared by majority of our loyal guests.

Summary: Highly recommend this hotel. Had a good night‚Äôs rest and the price I paid for the room was cheap compared to the accommodations I received. . The front desk was extremely courteous.
Manager Response: Please accept our sincere thanks for taking time to submit the review. We are all about making your stay a home away from home experience. We are glad to hear that we did well and you had a great and rested stay. We are also delighted to here that you took advantage of our spring promotional rates. Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: Over all the hotel was good for the price. Had some issues with the shower head being broken and the sheets were pretty stiff and itchy but overall good for the price. The issue actually happened after we got home. Realized they did not give me back my credit card at check in. Called it was almost impossible to get someone to answer the phone. after 10  minutes they finally answered then hung up on me. Called back luckily they answered. I asked if they had my card they stated they did. I asked them to mail it back to me and I was told they could not. That I needed to come get it. Hello the reason I stayed in a hotel is because I do not live in that town. I asked why they had not called my room or given back to me at checkout he said "i don't know." He stated we needed to come
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Good hotel if you're looking to save money
Summary: Our room was clean and staff were friendly. GREAT location if you're looking to walk to attractions such as Knott's Berry Farm and Medieval Times. Clean pool, but it was very cold when we were there! (It isn't heated).   Downside:The continental breakfast was a little skimpy with just juice, coffee, and muffins. Our bathroom door was very old and a little beat up, really hard to close all the way. Sleeping was difficult because we could hear stomping above us as well as his/her shower (was very loud). The water pressure in our shower was pretty low as well.   Basically, it's a pretty decent hotel if you want to save money. You likely won't be spending too much time at the hotel if you're there for the attractions, so the downsides won't be much of an issue.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Excellent experience!  Well kept grounds, exceptionally clean and comfortable room.  Very friendly and helpful staff!
Summary: Don't let cost fool you, it compares well above "moderately priced" hotels.  This is a well priced, comfortable, clean, totally safe and centrally located property.  Well cared for grounds, pool, rooms and several good eateries are just steps away.  I had reservations elsewhere that were problematic without resolution after two hours.  Several of us were left entirely on our own to find other rooms and that's how I came across the Goodnite Inn.    I thank front desk staff Samantha and Francisco for their professionalism, helpfulness and speedy handling of my situation. I made reservations through mid-April and recommended the Goodnite Inn to the group.  II highly recommend a visit, you'll be pleased!  Good coffee, juices and muffins to get your day going too.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: so much more than i expected for the price i payed
Summary: i went looking for something cheap but close to the attractions in califonia. not expecting much for what i had payed, in fact i was a little worried what i would find when i walked into the room. i was shocked when i found a very clean room very well taken care of. friendly staff. the long blond hair girl was so nice and friendly when we arrived on st patricks day at 10pm  it took the stress of the long drive of all of us. the bathroom was a little weird with a sketchy stain on the floor and it took 2 people to close the bathroom door half the time but nothing that we couldnt just laugh off. when we checked out faisal was very fast getting us out of there and on our way. ended the trip perfectly thanks Good night inn, we will be back for sure on all of our trips to Cali
Manager Response: none

Summary: My fiance and I adore Disneyland but are on a bit of a budget, so we chose this little motel to stay in for our vacation. I admit I was worried about cleanliness and things like mold, bedbugs, noise, etc, that you are always hearing about and reading about in cheap motels. We arrived and our reservation was canceled due to a misunderstanding a few months earlier. They were booked up for the nonsmoking rooms but managed to get us a room anyways (I can't sleep in smoking rooms, I'm allergic). It was nice and very comfortable. The furniture seemed older but in good condition, the a/c was a bit noisy but very effective, the tv was ancient but the picture and channels came in wonderfully. The shower was DIVINE- the water gets very hot and the water pressure is so good it's like
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed at the Good Nite Inn in Buena Park for 4 nights in February 2011 and upon entering our room realized what a mistake this was.  The decor is old, beds hard and stiff, windows bolted so you cannot open them, air conditioning that can be hit and miss, carpets stained and a predated TV the size of a good crate.  The bathroom has an ordinary tub that has seen its time, poor water pressure in the shower, a toilet that needs to be flushed twice to get the job done right, and a sink with rust stains.  The only nice thing about the rooms on the third floor was that they all come with a decent size mini-refrigerator. Though, there were no microwaves in the room.  There is one small microwave downstairs in the hotel lobby that is shared by everyone and not adequately cleaned
Manager Response: I would like to thank this guest for taking the time to post their comments. We really do value all guest feedback as it allows us to improve our operation to better suit the needs of our guests. We want our guests to have a home away from home experience and we do our best to reach that goal. We've been successful in making lots of guests happy while providing the best value in the area. There are many reviews posted here on how well we take care of our guests and how friendly and accommodating our staff is. If guest experienced a problem with his room he could have easily moved to a different room. He stated that he noticed all the issues as soon as he entered the room, yet he continued to stay in the room for 4 days without making any complaint during the stay.  The guest review mostly based on assumptions and exaggerations. i.e. Electronic devices such as AC units either work or not. They are not hit or miss. AC in this room works, but guest made an assumption that one day it will stop working. Our regular check-in time is at 3.00 p.m., but guest was able to check in at 1.30 p.m. This also shows that we do care about our guest and we do accommodate their needs best way we can. We provide everything that we advertise. We have pictures of our guest rooms on-line and list of amenities that we provide. We don‚Äôt advertise for sofas etc. Guest made another assumption that the hotel doesn‚Äôt honor guest privacy, yet without any specific information to back that claim. We do value guest privacy and we do not release guest information to 3rd parties. Guest privacy is paramount to us and we do everything possible to safeguard guest privacy. All the businesses including hotels may have to provide information to law enforcement if it was requested by any such authority. Guest could check with other hotels or businesses and will find this is the true for other hotels as well .If the guest experienced any particular incident that we didn‚Äôt honor his privacy guest could contact us and we would gladly investigate the matter. The subjective assumptions this guest made do not shared by majority of our loyal guests.

Summary Heading: Love this hotel very much and have been happy to return every year since my first visit three years ago.
Summary: This hotel is everything that it claims to be.  My teenagers and i have been visiting this hotel for the past three years and i absolutely enjoy coming here while being on vacation.  I look forward to coming to California every year because we have been treated like regular people here and that is very appreciated.  When we come out here (from Ohio) we like to enjoy everything that California has-beaches, shopping and etc. and we like this hotel because it is in our price range and meets all of our expectations.  My teenage kids love it here as well.  This location is wonderful because it shares a parking lot with McDonald's (got to love that) and is within five miles from Wal-Mart and Buena Park Mall.        Staff is very curtious and feel they make us feel like this is our
Manager Response: Please accept our sincere thanks for taking time to submit the review. We are delighted to hear about your great vacation and how happy you and your children were during your stay. Thank you for being such a loyal guest and for using us for your lodging needs for past three years. We take pride in our product and we are glad to see our guests notice the improvements we have made. Please let us know when you coming back and we will do our best to make your stay even more comfortable. Wonderful guests such as you are a great motivation for all of us here. Thank you.

Summary: I've been staying at the Good Nite Inn for 7 to 8 months now, monday through friday. The rooms are very clean and the staff is absolutely amazing. Samantha, Myra, Maria, and the rest of the staff I've met have made me feel at home from the beginning and on numerous occasions have gone out of their way to provide exceptional service to make sure I'm comfortable here.I've yet to find another place to compare to the standards of the Good Nite inn.The rate is more than fair, and the location is perfect! Many thanks to all of you here at the Good Nite Inn, you truly live up to your name! sincerely  Jared Rock
Manager Response: Dear Jared, please accept our sincere thanks for taking time to submit the review. We are committed to our mission of making your stay a ‚Äúhome away from home" experience and we are delighted to hear about your great stay. Thank you for mentioning names of the employee who went above and beyond to make your stay comfortable. We are glad to hear that you were able to take advantage of our promotional rates. We greatly appreciate your loyalty and using Good Nite Inn for past 7-8 months. We look forward to seeing you soon.

Summary: I¬¥ve been repeatedly staying at GNI Buena Park for the last three years.  Front desk are always helpfull and very nice, specially Faisal and Maria.  Always stay there for several days and was never disappointed.  It is always clean, and the property is well maintained. Safe for solo travelers. Easy access in and out.  Price is great.
Manager Response: Please accept our sincere thanks for taking time to submit the review. We are delighted to hear about your great stay. Thanks for mentioning about the employees who went above and beyond to make your stay comfortable. We are thrilled to hear that you used us repeatedly for past three years. Thank you for being such a loyal guest. I can assure you that we will continue to do our best and make sure our guests are happy and we are exceeding their expectations. We look forward to seeing you soon.

Summary: This place is great as far as prices but with cheap prices you get cheap service. I was rudely interupted out of my sleep by a tow truck at 8am . Apparently my vehicle was being towed because it looked suspicious and MARIA (the police officers little friend) working at the front desk claimed she knew nothing about what was going on but when i asked the officer about the situation he said she (maria) was a good friend and if she wouldve identified the car as a guests vehicle then he wouldve never towed it and he accused my guest of bein a local prostitute which he later found out he had the wrong girl. When i asked maria again she rudely put her index finger in my face because she was on the phone and finally told me yeah she was aware of what was goin on so the moral of this
Manager Response: The issue here is with the guest and the local police dept, not the hotel. Per Police guest had a 2 + years expired tag. By law your car could be towed away by police for expired tags. Hotel or its employees has no control over what local law enforcement does. Police officers informed the front desk that they will be towing the car due to expired tag and just to inform whoever inquires about the vehicle. Employee is not in a position to prevent or interfere with law enforcement from conducting their duties. This doesn't mean employee is a friend. Guest complaint is merely a personal attack on the employee who has nothing to do with the situation. Guest should contact local police dept. if he has any complaint against the police officers.

Summary: A joke, the front desk was barely nice, wouldn't give me an extra ice bucket! You have to pay for wifi, bedding uncomfortable and no fridge
Manager Response: I would like to thank this guest for taking the time to post their comments. We really do value all guest feedback as it allows us to improve our operation to better suit the needs of our guests. I am extremely sorry to hear that you did not have a comfortable stay. We have many guest comments about our friendly staff and it is hard to believe that they are barely nice. If the guest feels like the staff is barely nice we would like to know in detail why the guest feel that way. We do have ice buckets in the rooms and also available at the front desk. We provide reliable Wi-Fi service at a nominal fee of $ 3.95 per day. We offer best rates in town and even with Wi-Fi fee our rates are still competitive. All our beddings are newly replaced couple of months ago. We do provide refrigerators in some of our two queen rooms and guest could request one during check in.

Summary Heading: Had a really good stay, very accesable, at a great price.
Summary: I beleive this was a great choice, my colegues were very happy with the service. The front desk clerk, whose name is Faisal was very courtious, and helpful. I give this hotel a 5* rating.   5 * * * * *
Manager Response: Please accept our sincere thanks for taking time to submit the review. We are committed to our mission of making your stay a ‚Äúhome away from home" experience and we are delighted to hear about your great stay. Thanks for mentioning about the employee who went above and beyond to make your stay comfortable. Your kind words will definitely motivate our staff to do even better. Once again thanks for being a wonderful guest and giving us a 5 star rating. We look forward to seeing you soon.

Summary: The check in person was excellent, I  think his name was Faisal, lots of knowledge and very helpful.
Manager Response: Please accept our sincere thanks for taking time to submit the review. We are delighted to hear about your great stay. Thanks for mentioning about the employee who went above and beyond to make your stay comfortable. Front desk agents could help you a lot in finding many things for you. They know the local area very well and could help you with directions, attractions or anything else you want to know about the area. We look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary Heading: Keeps going, and going, and going...
Summary: My family loves to stay here at the GNI in Buena Park. The staff is friendly, the rooms are clean, great location to Disneyland/Knott's Berry Farm, also close to fast food/sit down restauraunts. This was our 4th time staying here in 2 years, and we are going back again in February. My previous reviews of the GNI have all been awsome, and we just don't have much more to say except: Thank you for helping to make our family vacations wonderful Good Night Inn!
Manager Response: Please accept our sincere thanks for taking time to submit the review. We are honored to have such wonderful and loyal guests like you. Thank you for continue to use us for your lodging needs when you are in the area. We are delighted to hear that you are coming back in February. Please let us know if there is anything we could do to make your stay even more comfortable.

Summary: Great location - right off the highway and close to most of the amusement parks. The staff here was very friendly and helpful, especially Maria. For a cheap motel, this is one of the better ones out there - don't take a chance on the other guys.  Any problems with dirty common areas, as seen in other reviewer's photographs, came from other guests themselves, and I can't fault the hotel with their behavior. Breakfast is muffins, OJ, and coffee, but McD's is in the same parking lot if you want more. If you're on a budget, this is definitely the place to stay.
Manager Response: Please accept our sincere thanks for taking time to submit the review. We are committed to our mission of making your stay a ‚Äúhome away from home" experience and we are delighted to hear about your great stay. Thanks for mentioning about the employee who went above and beyond to make your stay comfortable. Your kind words will definitely motivate our staff to do even better. We are centrally located and close to 5 and 91 freeways. This makes us a good location if you want to travel to other parts of Southern California i.e. Downtown LA, Hollywood, etc. Thank you for being considerate about the hotel and the surroundings. We look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: I had a great stay. Perfect location, nice room and very helpful staff. Specially Faisal. He helped me with directions, tickects, tours and so on. I stayed there 5 nights and and the housekeeping just made my bed and kept the room tidy, but not even once  replaced soap nor shampoo. So every night I had to go to front desk and get them. Would saty there again.
Manager Response: Please accept our sincere thanks for taking time to submit the review. We are committed to our mission of making your stay a ‚Äúhome away from home" experience and we are delighted to hear about your great stay. Thanks for mentioning about the employee who went above and beyond to make your stay comfortable. We provide daily housekeeping service and if we failed to provide any guest room supplies please let us know. We appreciate every feedback as it will help us to improve our service. We look forward to seeing you soon.

Summary: Very Clean Rooms! Local to many business and pleasure destinations. Excellent Price and Exceptional Service Ask for Faisal or Maria to make your stay pleasant and economical! Convinent resturants just steps away!
Manager Response: Please accept our sincere thanks for taking time to submit the review. It is great to hear that the hotel staff went above and beyond to make your stay comfortable. Thank you for mentioning the names of some of the employees who provided personalized care during your stay. This is a great motivation for my employees to even do better. It is true that we are centrally located to many attractions, freeways, and several major corporations. This makes us a perfect location for both business and leisure travelers. We are look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: I stayed in this hotel and it is a nice area but I notice the hotel is not so clean in overall. It is a cheap place, nice staff, no free internet, but not so clean place. If you are looking for a cheap place, I would recommend it with some advice.
Manager Response: I would like to thank this guest for taking the time to post their comments. We really do value all guest feedback as it allows us to improve our operation to better suit the needs of our guests. I would greatly appreciate if you could provide us more details about your stay and the specific reasons why you find the hotel is not so clean, so that, we can address such issues and take actions if necessary. I am glad you were able to take advantage of our promotional rates and hope to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: Probably would not stay here again. Can get almost the same price at nicer/newer place.
Summary: I have to say, I did not have any trouble with the service or location of this hotel.  The staff was very friendly.  But, I have to say, I will probably not be back though to this hotel for the sole reason of the bed, and linen's.  Not very clean and I was nervous to sleep on it! I had use a towel I had brought from home as my pillow because I didn't trust the pillows were clean.  I like saving money, and this definately was one of the less expensive hotels, but I am willing to pay a higher price next time for my comfort elsewhere.
Manager Response: I would like to thank this guest for taking the time to post their comments. We really do value all guest feedback as it allows us to improve our operation to better suit the needs of our guests. I would greatly appreciate if you could provide us more details about your stay and the reasons why you find the bed/linen is not clean. I am glad to hear that our staff did a good job and we always want to go extra mile for our guests. If we can find out specific reasons why you did not like the bedding we can look in to this matter further and correct any issues. Thank you for the feedback.

Summary Heading: A Great Base to explore LA
Summary: My sister and I stayed here for 4 nights whilst we explored Los Angeles.  It is conveniently located and the rooms are spacious.  OK, so it's not the Hilton but we were pleased with our accommodation and both slept very well.  The pool area is rather small but as it seems to be a base for those wanting to see LA, there are never many people using it at all.  We had no drinks facilities in the room but there is constant hot water available in the lobby.  There are a couple of restaurants close by and I can recommend Hoffs Hut.  For the purposes of our visit, this hotel more than suited our needs.  I would also like to comment on the reception staff who were very friendly and helped us with all our questions about the area.
Manager Response: Please accept our sincere thanks for taking time to submit the review. We are committed to our mission of making your stay a ‚Äúhome away from home" experience and we are delighted to hear about your great stay. Many guests choose us as we are centrally located and I agree it is a great base to explore Orange County, Los Angeles, Hollywood, etc. I am glad to hear the staff went above and beyond to make your stay even more enjoyable. We look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary Heading: Good value, great location, friendly staff
Summary: We spent 3 nights (Labor Day weekend) and at at average of $45/night, this was a good value.  The cleanliness of the hotel was fine. For the price, we were surprised to find no hair dryer in the room.  We thought that was on of the reasons for the low price.  However, it turns out you have to ask at front desk.  For 2 of the days, they never left enough towels nor shampoo (I also thought initially this was a cost-saving thing)- not that big a deal, but had to go to front desk and get them. The staff was friendly even at late night. Again, for $45/night, these were not a big deal - usually we stay near LAX for $99/night and $20/parking - free parking here. The cleanliness of the parking lot (another reviewer had a photo)  was fine - you would expect to find some leaves/debris -
Manager Response: Please accept our sincere thanks for taking time to submit the review. We are glad to hear that you were able to take advantage of our Labor Day promotions. I am glad to hear that our staff went extra mile to make your stay comfortable. We are committed to provide you outstanding service 24/7 and you will experience best service in town. We are looking forward to see again soon.

Summary: This is not Ritz, but my expections were not let down.  It was much better than I expected. We were going Disney and Knotts with my kids and we are family of four. we paid less than $ 45 a night and our room was great for that price. We had a pool view from our window which was nice. Just like one other person told before some poeople were throwing trash and soda cups whereever they feel like without using the trash cans. All in all this place is very affordable and good for the price. Staff is nice also. I will use this place again.
Manager Response: Please accept our sincere thanks for taking time to submit the review. We are committed to our mission of making your stay a ‚Äúhome away from home" experience and we are delighted to hear about your great stay. We are glad that you found our hotel as the best value in the area. It is our goal to provide comfortable accommodation for affordable price. I will share your great comments with the staff. We are looking forward to see you again soon.

Summary: I stay at this hotel almost every weekend and i must say that the staff at the hotel is incredible. Myra, Flasal, and maria are very friendly and helpful i would recommend this place to anyone.
Manager Response: Please accept our sincere thanks for taking time to submit the review. It is great to hear that the hotel staff went above and beyond to make your stay comfortable. Thank you for mentioning the names of some of the employees who provided personalized care during your stay. This is a great motivation for my employees to even do better. We are looking forward to see you again soon.

Summary: Wow. I paid n $48 on a travel website, so I was not expecting the Ritz by any means. I checked in late in the evening on August 27. I was greeted by the friendl employee through the glass window who then buzzed me into the lobby. The front walkway to the hotel was filthy, as was the parking lot. I was given my room key (#250) and headed up to the room not expecting much. I walked in, looked around and walked out. Walked down to the front desk and checked out. The room was FILTHY! Nasty, dirty bed spread, huge stains all over the carpet, etc... I refused to even set my stuff down. If you are looking for budget accomodations near Disney/Knott's, the Motel 6 at Disneyland is usually around $60 a night. It has been remodeled and is very clean. This place should be condemned. I am
Manager Response: I would like to thank this guest for taking the time to post their comments. We really do value all guest feedback as it allows us to improve our operation to better suit the needs of our guests. I am extremely sorry to hear that you did not have a comfortable stay. However, I have to inform that this guest was given a key to a room that was out or service due to a stain in the carpet. Previous guest had spilled his coffee in the carpet and this room was taken out of service. My front desk agent realized the issue and apologized to the guest and offered him a different room. We do apologize for the inconvenience and guest was not charged. We do our best to make everything right and rarely do we have issues of this nature. We swiftly corrected this issue and a new carpet was installed in the room.  We have lots of loyal guests and it is a subjective assessment to say that the hotel is bad due to one incident. Both our prospective and loyal guests share the same idea. We can assure our guests that we are committed to provide best accommodations and we will remain as the best value hotel in the area.

Summary: Stayed 9 days; 2 adults & 2 children in room with two double bedss near street at incredibly reasonable price through package with Travelocity.  Hotel staff friendly & accomodating.  Included juice & muffins in a.m.  Wifi for a smail daily fee.  Internet access in lobby for fee.   Older room badly in need of new mattresses; they were not uncomfortable but were old and stained.  Pocket door to bathroom very difficult to open/close.  They only left 2 towels, which were thin & rough; but more were available at front desk.  Quiet, although near street.  Adequate, safe parking. Walking distance to restaurants; McDonalds adjacent to parking lot. Room was cleaned well daily.  Shampoo & soap available.  Minimum perks for minimum price.  I would stay again if I were in need of a budget
Manager Response: Please accept our sincere thanks for taking time to submit the review. It is great to hear that you were able to take advantage of our discounted rates and choosing us as the hotel in your package deal. We are glad to hear that you find our hotel is the best value and enjoyed our amenities such as Wi-Fi, breakfast, daily housekeeping, free parking, etc. We are continually improving our product and service and you will find an upgraded product in your future visits. We are looking forward to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: Cheap you pay, cheap you get!
Summary: Very lumpy bed.  Dirty floors and carpets.  Dark hair in bathroom, so gross!  Patched wall paper.  TV remote wouldn't function properly.  Not very close to the freeway.  Was close to major parks.
Manager Response: I would like to thank this guest for taking the time to post their comments. We really do value all guest feedback as it allows us to improve our operation to better suit the needs of our guests. I am extremely sorry to hear that you did not have a comfortable stay. Our goal is to make your stay as comfortable as possible and if you are not happy with your room for any reason we could always find a room that meets your expectations. If the problem is not resolved to your satisfaction you can always contact the manager on duty for further assistance. We are right off of 91 freeway and 1 exit away from 5 Freeway. These are major freeways and we are extremely close to them.

Summary: This is my second stay within 2 months.  The rates were decent, the hotel is nothing fancy, no frills, but rooms were adequate and clean. The front desk people were nice.  One of the employees named "Faisal" was helpful and pleasant.  The continental breakfast is simple, just muffins,oj or coffee.  However, the money saved on the room  rates can be used for a full breakfast elsewhere.  One of the reviews stated that the water filled up in the bathtub while showering: Try lifting up the drain plug as it is a pop up style and the person probably stood on it to keep it plugged up. I had that same experience.......Duh!!! As for some other complainers: Keep in mind that you bring your noisy children, sloppy habits, hygiene,etc. to these hotels and mess it up as others have done so
Manager Response: Please accept our sincere thanks for taking time to submit the review. We are committed to our mission of making your stay a ‚Äúhome away from home" experience and we are delighted to hear about your great stay. Thank you for being concerned and respectful for other guests and the facility.  We are continuously upgrading our product to provide better accommodations to our guest. I will share your great comments with the staff as these comments will keep them motivated. We are looking forward to see you again soon.

Summary: Normally when I travel I would usually stay at a Hilton chain hotel but this time I decided to pick a cheaper budget motel so I could spend more of my money on things to do around Southern California. I was very surprised when I walked in and was greeted with a nice smile and a speedy check in. The room I was put in was spacious and looked pretty clean. The bathroom was nice to although the door to the bathroom could use some WD40. My room was cleaned everyday and I always had fresh towels and sheets to come back to after a long day. The breakfast wasn't much but you aren't paying for a 5 star breakfast. Overall, my experience here was a decent one. If you are looking for a cheap motel with friendly service this is the place to go!
Manager Response: Please accept our sincere thanks for taking time to submit the review. We are happy to hear that you had a wonderful stay at our hotel. We have lots of guests taking advantage of our promotional rates so they could spend money on many fun activities Southern California has to offer. We are committed to go extra mile for our guests and constantly upgrading our product. We are looking forward to see soon when you visit Southern California again.

Summary Heading: Good Stay for a budget hotel...
Summary: It's not a marriott or hilton so don't expect anything of that sort...but for the low price you pay per night it is a decent stay...somewhere to rest your head after a long day visiting the socal locales.  The rooms are ok (carpet probably needs replacing), decor is ok...overall an ok stay!  The weekend staff was very nice...check in was smooth and fast. We were introduced to available tour packages and tickets which helped us a big way as we were a big family and saving some money was a huge bonus(touring socal ain't cheap!) I would highly recommend asking about the Hollywood tour from the staff as it was worth it for those us who come to cali to see Hollywood!  Overall it is a good stay for the price you pay..If we ever come back, we would probably stay here again.
Manager Response: Please accept our sincere thanks for taking time to submit the review. We are happy to hear that you had a wonderful stay at our hotel and had the opportunity to visit many attractions including Hollywood. We are centrally located and lots of guests chose our hotel due to its location, easy access to major freeways, theme parks and other attractions. I am glad to hear that front desk agents went extra mile helping you out with the tours and helped you to save money. We are always committed to offer best rates and provide comfortable accommodations to our guest and we really appreciate your kind words and the feedback. We are looking forward to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: Not completely terrible, but not great either
Summary: After reviewing comments on TA and pricing hotels in the area, I chose this hotel, as it was a great price with a great location.  Staff were fairly friendly, although 1 in particular was somewhat shady and running a side business of selling used discount theme park tickets.  Don't bother arriving till at least half an hour after the first available check in time (3PM) because they will not let you in.  Kind of funny, because we got there at 2:45PM and they said the room was not ready.  Sat at the pool, which was within view of the room they eventually gave me and not one house keeper entered any of the rooms at all.  Reserved a non smoking room, but got a smoking one, as they informed me there were no non smoking rooms available.  The room smelled really bad, but a trip to the
Manager Response: none

Summary: bathroom doors are horrible too hard to close and pillows were very hard.  Also had gum under the sheets in a lump.  Other then those problems it was a very nice stay mcdonalds is right there also pauls rest is great alot of food for the price would stay here again.
Manager Response: Please accept our sincere thanks for taking time to submit the review. We will investigate the issues you mentioned. We are committed to our mission of making your stay a ‚Äúhome away from home" experience and we value your feedback. I will share your comments with my staff and looking forward to see you again soon.

Summary: My hubby and 2 small children came to bunea park to be close to disneyland when we arrived to the hotel it was around 1:30pm, check in time wasnt till 3pm. The front desk agent "fascial" told us no rooms were ready at all what so ever, we didnt even see him check... after a 7 hour drive we just wanted to relax and settle in and he didnt even try to accomodate us. We walked around the property and noticed a pool. We went back inside to see if we were able to use the pool since we didnt know what else to do not being familiar with the town and fascial was no help offering any suggestions... he told us that we were able to use it but one of us couldnt cuz we would have to go back inside to check in and he didnt want us to get the floor wet ... and he ended up only giving us 2
Manager Response: I would like to thank this guest for taking the time to post their comments. However, if you feel any of our employees are not living up to our mission and standards please speak to a supervisor and we will correct the issue. Thank you.

Summary: We are not picky 5 star people but we do like to stay in decent places. We booked through Hotwire expecting to land a Holiday Inn Express, LaQuinta Inn or something else in that realm. The Good Nite Inn did not make it. I wanted to eat the money, leave, and just go home. My lady was horrified at the lack of cleanliness. Our room was not ready and we needed to use the restroom before heading out to do some things until we could return. The Women's room in the lobby  was so dirty that she used the Men's room while I stood guard!  Later when checking in we found the bed was filthy. The blanket was covered with human hair and was just plain old and grungy. W could not stand the thought of staying even one minute in this place let alone the three nights we had booked. So after dinner
Manager Response: I would like to thank this guest for taking the time to post their comments.
